subject: [Download] 3 Perils of Dashboard-Only Decision Making
snippet: The only path to full data trust is transaction-level intelligence - here's why. x2_Three-Reasons-to-Think-Beyond-the-Dashboard Business leaders are asked to make massively impactful decisions
content:
[

The only path to full data trust is transaction-level intelligence - here's why. Incorta (1) https://go.incorta.com/ebook-3-reasons-to-think-beyond-the-dashboard?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=paid-media&utm_campaign=2021.09-Asset-Ebook-3-Reasons-to-Think-Beyond-the-Dashboard&utm_term=na&utm_content=na Business leaders are asked to make massively impactful decisions based upon top-line dashboard data. Insight-fed visualizations are indeed helpful, but they're not the reliable, rich understanding of data required to run a successful business. What you need is transaction-level intelligence about the data populating all of your dashboards - and the ability to explore, query and analyze it whenever needed, in real-time. snippet: AI in Retail Marketing Introduce AI to Level-Up Customer Engagement and Marketing Spend Beyond Traditional BI Download now Hi there, Retailers that adopt AI stand to gain a critical competitive
content:
[

Company Logo AI in Retail Marketing (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ab2760e84d&e=bfdfd73c17) Introduce AI to Level-Up Customer Engagement and Marketing Spend Beyond Traditional BI (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=98fe34deff&e=bfdfd73c17) Download now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ff48cd1032&e=bfdfd73c17) Hi there, Retailers that adopt AI stand to gain a critical competitive advantage through personalized marketing opportunities, enhanced customer engagement, and customized shopping experiences to name a few. This is especially true for retail marketing organizations. With AI-driven solutions around key metrics such as net promoter score and customer sentiment, marketers gain an automated means to adjust their campaigns, drive customer loyalty, and ensure that they are investing in the right product-focused promotional strategies. Where do you start? How do you find the best use cases for AI in retail marketing? subject: Language, Vision and Deep Learning Models - Free POC
snippet: Hi, Over at Abacus.AI we are super excited to build you a language, vision or deep learning model for FREE, as part of our free POC (Proof-of-concept) offer. We would use our end to end deep-learning
content:
[

Hi, Over at Abacus.AI we are super excited to build you a language, vision or deep learning model for FREE, as part of our free POC (Proof-of-concept) offer. We would use our end to end deep-learning platform to build a model for your use-case. Abacus.AI offers support for all enterprise AI use-cases. One of our NeurIPS-published deep learning scientists will engage with you, understand your data and build you a CUSTOM MODEL using one of the several neural network techniques we have invented. Apply online on http://abacus.ai and schedule a consultation and we will contact you within 2 business days. Alternatively, you can personally drop me an email at bindu@abacus.ai, tell me about your organization, what you are looking to build and I will respond and let you know if we can extend our free POC offer to you. content:
[

More organizations want to advance beyond dashboards to self-service analytics and more sophisticated algorithms such as machine learning. To support this trend, enterprises are moving towards a unified environment for data and analytics. This platform is often cloud-based to take advantage of scale and flexibility and support massive amounts of data and compute-intensive workloads. It is automated and augmented to help address data and analytics complexity. subject: [Download] How to get the most out of your AWS Data Lake
snippet: Dremio Logo Deploying your AWS Data Lake? Are you getting the most value for your time and investment? DOWNLOAD All types of enterprises invest in data lakes as a cost-effective, centralized repository
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ Deploying your AWS Data Lake? Are you getting the most value for your time and investment? DOWNLOAD (https://hello.dremio.com/ebook-aws-5-best-practices-to-high-performance-analytics.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-09-22-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email&utm_campaign=ebook-aws-5-best-practices-plan-design) All types of enterprises invest in data lakes as a cost-effective, centralized repository to support a wide range of analytics use cases including operational dashboards, data science, machine learning and even big data processing. Amazon Web Services (AWS) powers many of today's cloud data lakes, making them more scalable and simpler to deploy and manage-and making the data they house easy to manage and analyze. Despite these advantages, some AWS users still experience challenges related to data lake performance, data workflows and data access. But there are ways to overcome them. Read this eBook to learn: bullet The top five best practices to help data lake architects realize an optimal data architecture bullet How to accelerate queries of data stored in an AWS data lake while reducing data engineering costs bullet How to simplify data access for analysts and data scientists bullet How to complement and extend the existing capabilities of an AWS data lake READ NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/ebook-aws-5-best-practices-to-high-performance-analytics.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-09-22-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email&utm_campaign=ebook-aws-5-best-practices-plan-design) https://hello.dremio.com/ebook-aws-5-best-practices-to-high-performance-analytics.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-09-22-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email&utm_campaign=ebook-aws-5-best-practices-plan-design ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It's quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it's free! https://www.dremio.com/test-drive/?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-09-22-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email&utm_campaign=ebook-aws-5-best-practices-plan-design https://github.com/dremio https://www.facebook.com/dremio https://twitter.com/dremio https://www.linkedin.com/company/dremio/ https://www.dremio.com/ Â© 2021 Dremio. subject: Data Visualization for Scientists and Engineers
snippet: Hear from Amoolya Singh of Calico Labs on the pivotal role of data visualization in advancing scientific discovery. Register now. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ View as a web page JMP | Statistical
content:
[

Hear from Amoolya Singh of Calico Labs on the pivotal role of data visualization in advancing scientific discovery. Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/sep-23/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002Dq07QAC&utm_content=thirdparty) . ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ View as a web page (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/email/2021/q3/statistically-speaking/78381.html) https://www.jmp.com?utm_source=headerlogo&utm_medium=email https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/sep-23/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002Dq07QAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** Make breakthrough discoveries, transcend communication barriers ------------------------------------------------------------ That's the power of good data visualizations, backed by statistics and best practices. Join us on Sept. 23 to learn from a group of analytics experts in the field of life sciences. Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/sep-23/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002Dq07QAC&utm_content=thirdparty) ** About the keynote ------------------------------------------------------------ Amoolya Singh, Head of Discovery Technologies, Calico Amoolya leads the use of advanced computing capabilities, including data science and machine learning, to accelerate Calico's ability to make new scientific discoveries. Prior to joining Calico, Amoolya was Vice President of Research and Development at Amyris, where she led a 30-person bioinformatics and software engineering group whose work included innovations in genotype representation and data visualization; building mathematical and statistical models to analyze high-throughput, multivariate genotype and phenotype data; and more. https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/sep-23/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002Dq07QAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** See how you can: ------------------------------------------------------------ * Map the right graph to the right problem. * Improve graphicacy and data savvy at your organization. * Gain momentum for your ideas with shared data visualizations. * And more. ** About the panel ------------------------------------------------------------ Immediately following the keynote, join us for a discussion about how to use best practices in data visualization to democratize data access and analysis, and to increase data literacy and graphicacy at your organization. You'll hear from Amoolya Singh and: https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/sep-23/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002Dq07QAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** Kathleen Schneider ------------------------------------------------------------ Senior Research Associate II, Lundbeck https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/sep-23/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002Dq07QAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** Scott Wise ------------------------------------------------------------ Principal Analytical Training Consultant, SAS ** Who should attend? ------------------------------------------------------------ Scientists, engineers and researchers who want to gain momentum for ideas and communicate about data in an accessible, influential way. ** Details ------------------------------------------------------------ September 23 | 1:00 - 2:30 p.m. ET Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/sep-23/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002Dq07QAC&utm_content=thirdparty) https://www.facebook.com/JMPsoftware https://twitter.com/JMP_software https://www.linkedin.com/company/jmp https://www.youtube.com/user/JMPSoftwareFromSAS Don't miss JMP updates: Please add jmp.com and sas.com as domains to your safe sender (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/about/email-safe-sender.html?utm_source=footerlink&utm_medium=email) list. To contact JMP via postal address: SAS Institute Inc., JMP Software, SAS Campus Drive, Cary, NC 27513 USA ATTN: Legal Division/Privacy Manager. SAS and all other SAS Institute Inc. product or service names are registered trademarks or trademarks of SAS Institute Inc. in the USA and other countries. ® indicates USA registration. Other brand and product names are trademarks of their respective companies. Copyright © SAS Institute Inc. All rights reserved. subject: The key to maximizing your AI efforts
snippet: AI Cloud Launch Event September 23, 2021 Join Us Hi there, Are your AI efforts meeting their full potential? Are you dealing with scarce resources? Are your data scientists spread thin? Attend our
content:
[

Company Logo AI Cloud Launch Event (https://www.draicloudlaunchevent.com/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=AICLOUD21-KDN) September 23, 2021 Join Us (https://www.draicloudlaunchevent.com/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=AICLOUD21-KDN) Hi there, Are your AI efforts meeting their full potential? Are you dealing with scarce resources? Are your data scientists spread thin? Attend our upcoming virtual event on September 23rd (https://www.draicloudlaunchevent.com/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=AICLOUD21-KDN) to learn how our AI Cloud Platform can accelerate the delivery of AI to production for every organization, while driving business impact with a consolidated, single system of record. content:

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=6226337bb4&e=bfdfd73c17 Once upon a time, there was a company that dreamed of changing the world with machine learning. The brilliant data team labeled away day and night but it was never enough to data. The models just weren't performing correctly. They longed for the blissful days of data analysis and innovation. Sound familiar? You might be ready to outsource your data labeling. Your dream of changing the world can come true with a little help from some strangers across the globe. If this is your first time working with outsourced teams, it might seem daunting. This free guide (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2ae45d703&e=bfdfd73c17) will help you confidently start that part of your innovation journey. • Tips for successfully outsourcing AI and ML projects and ensuring quality datasets • Common data labeling terminology, technology, and best practices • Questions you should ask a prospective data labeling service provider Start Your Journey (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=9d2e1e3bd2&e=bfdfd73c17) P.S. subject: [Register] Modern Data Pipelines for Analytics in the Cloud
snippet: Modernizing data architectures with a complete, end-to-end unified data analytics platform Live_Building-Modern-Data-Pipelines-for-Agile-Analytics-in-the-Cloud_1200x702 (1) The urgency to compete on
content:
[

Modernizing data architectures with a complete, end-to-end unified data analytics platform incorta-logo-127x27 http://www.dbta.com/webinars/incorta/15sep2021/inc1 The urgency to compete on analytics is driving digital transformation projects across industries. Many enterprises are revamping ERP systems and moving their analytics to the cloud to achieve greater speed and scalability. However, most are still using the same cumbersome data transformation processes. As a result, business users are left scrambling to manually integrate data across multiple siloed repositories. What's more, businesses are unable to leverage innovation in application development. From data lakes and enterprise data warehouses to data fabrics and data meshes, the architectural choices today can be overwhelming. Join us (http://www.dbta.com/webinars/incorta/15sep2021/inc1) to learn about the shortfalls of "just rebuilding it" in the cloud and how you can: * Build a modern data architecture with a complete, end-to-end unified data analytics platform * Move from ETL/ELT to data pipelines while leveraging open standards and file formats * Go from raw data to reports in minutes no matter where your data resides with automated data transformation REGISTER NOW (http://www.dbta.com/webinars/incorta/15sep2021/inc1) subject: Success stories in cloud data modernization
snippet: View in Browser Hi there, Join our upcoming event to hear how Databricks customers are achieving success with tech stack modernization, ask your questions in the live Q&A, and get hands-on training
content:
[

View in Browser (https://www.kdnuggets.com/em/2021/databricks-0910.html) Databricks Hi there, Join our upcoming event to hear how Databricks customers are achieving success with tech stack modernization, ask your questions in the live Q&A, and get hands-on training to help you build your own lakehouse. Data management is hard. Modernizing it is even harder. Here is your chance to learn from others who have already achieved success tackling both data management and modernizing their tech stack to gain better performance, reliability and security. Join us on September 14 at 10 AM PT to hear customers share their data management use cases. They will share best practices and how to avoid common pitfalls. Register Today > (https://databricks.com/p/webinar/modernize-to-mobilize?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000cXzAAAU&utm_content=email) Webinar topics include: * How Columbia Sportswear has modernized their tech stack to enable more real-time data processing to manage purchase orders and generate accurate consumer demand forecasts * How Scribd migrated from on-prem Hadoop to a modern cloud architecture to enable the world's largest digital library * How Directly democratized reliable, real-time data to enhance cross-team productivity Date: September 14th, 2021 Time: 10:00 AM PT Register Now (https://databricks.com/p/webinar/modernize-to-mobilize?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000cXzAAAU&utm_content=email) https://databricks.com/p/webinar/modernize-to-mobilize?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000cXzAAAU&utm_content=email 160 Spear Street 13th floor, San Francisco CA 94105 Â© Databricks 2021. KDnuggets News 21:n34, Sep 8, 2021 issue (read online (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/n34.html) ) https://www.kdnuggets.com/index.html KDnuggets™ News 21:n34 (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/n34.html) , Sep 8 Features (#feat) | Products (#prod) | Tutorials (#tuto) | Opinions (#opin) | Tops (#tops) | Jobs (#jobs) Submit a blog (https://www.kdnuggets.com/news/submissions.html) | Image of the week (#imag) This week on KDnuggets: Do You Read Excel Files with Python? There is a 1000x Faster Way; Hypothesis Testing Explained; Data Science Cheat Sheet 2.0; 6 Cool Python Libraries That I Came Across Recently; Best Resources to Learn Natural Language Processing in 2021; and much, much more. Our new KDnuggets Top Blogs Reward Program (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/kdnuggets-top-authors-reward-program.html) will pay to the authors of top blogs - check details here (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/kdnuggets-top-authors-reward-program.html) . Reposts accepted, but we love original submissions, rewarded at 3 times the rate of reposts. Features * Do You Read Excel Files with Python? subject: Join Europe’s Top Financial CDAOs at CDAO Financial Services Europe 2021
snippet: Join Europe's CDAO's & CDO's on 28-29th September to learn best practice to advance your data strategy and maximise ROI. CDAO FS EU Hi there, You're invited to CDAO Financial
content:
[

Join Europe's CDAO's & CDO's on 28-29th September to learn best practice to advance your data strategy and maximise ROI. https://cdao-fs-eu.coriniumintelligence.com/vip-registration?utm_campaign=0696%20-%20CDAO%20FS%20Europe&utm_source=KdNuggets-%20Eblast-%20Register%20page&utm_content=Register Hi there, You're invited to CDAO Financial Services Live 2021 (https://cdao-fs-eu.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0696%20-%20CDAO%20FS%20Europe&utm_source=KdNugeets-%20Ebalst-%20Homepage&utm_content=Homepage) , the leading virtual summit for data & analytics professionals working in financial services taking place 28-29th September 2021. As a KDNuggets subscriber, we are excited to offer a Complimentary VIP pass (https://cdao-fs-eu.coriniumintelligence.com/vip-registration?utm_campaign=0696%20-%20CDAO%20FS%20Europe&utm_source=FintechFinance-%20Ebalst-%20Register&utm_content=Register) to join the upcoming event that also includes access to On-Demand recording's if you can't make it live. You can join over 30 expert speakers from Europe's leading financial services as we have representatives from 19 of the top 50 banks! With over 15 interactive sessions, this is the perfect opportunity to join your peers to develop your data strategy and maximize your ROI. Register for your Complimentary VIP Pass Today (https://cdao-fs-eu.coriniumintelligence.com/vip-registration?utm_campaign=0696%20-%20CDAO%20FS%20Europe&utm_source=KdNuggets-%20Eblast-%20Register%20page&utm_content=Register) Confirmed Thought-Leading Speakers Include: 0696 - CDAO FS Europe - Speakers (3) Dr. Adrian Pearce, Chief Data Officer, Credit-Suisse Samir Boualla Chief Data Officer, ING France Samir Boualla, Chief Data Officer, ING France 0696 - Chris Butler Chief Data Officer, HSBC UK Chris Butler, Chief Data Officer, HSBC UK Tammy Solomon, Chief Data Officer - Risk, Investec Tammy Solomon, Chief Data Officer - Risk, Investec CDAO Financial Services Europe - Bram Bram Nauts, Enterprise Data Advisor - Data Strategy, ABN AMRO Bank Philipp Rindler Head of Artificial Intelligence Models Validation, UBS Philipp Rindler, Head of Artificial Intelligence Models Validation, UBS Giles Spungin Managing Director, Global Head of Analytics, Compliance and Operational Risk, HSBC Giles Spungin, Managing Director, Global Head of Analytics, Compliance and Operational Risk, HSBC 0696 - https://www.dremio.com/ TDWI Checklist Report : Preparing for the Next-Generation Cloud Data Architecture Foundation for a high performance, scalable architecture READ REPORT (https://hello.dremio.com/wp-tdwi-checklist-report.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-09-02-email&utm_content=kd-nuggests-email&utm_campaign=wp-tdwi-checklist-report) Data architectures to support reporting, business intelligence, and analytics have evolved dramatically over the past 10 years. Instead of considering the data warehouse and the data lake as independent "data islands" that coexist in a cloud platform, it is time to reconsider the fundamental ways that information is accumulated, managed, and then provisioned to the different downstream data consumers. Download this TDWI Checklist report to understand: bullet How your organization can make this transition to a modernized data architecture bullet The decision making around this transition bullet The steps required to best take advantage of this modernized architecture and environment READ NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/wp-tdwi-checklist-report.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-09-02-email&utm_content=kd-nuggests-email&utm_campaign=wp-tdwi-checklist-report) https://hello.dremio.com/wp-tdwi-checklist-report.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=dbta&utm_term=2021-06-08-email&utm_content=dbta-email&utm_campaign=wp-tdwi-checklist-report ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. subject: StateOfTheArt() Conference - Tickets Are Selling Out!
snippet: Hi, At the StateofTheArt() conference we plan to discuss the most important innovations in AI. Speakers include Marty Chavez from Goldman, Karim Lakhani from Harvard, Frank Hutter of the AutoML fame
content:
[

Hi, At the StateofTheArt() conference we plan to discuss the most important innovations in AI. Speakers include Marty Chavez from Goldman, Karim Lakhani from Harvard, Frank Hutter of the AutoML fame and Zack Lipton from CMU. Sign up for your free ticket here - https://bit.ly/3zJ05hr-abacus-210831 The conference is hosted by Abacus.AI that got declared by Forbes as the most innovative AI start-up - https://bit.ly/3kxqXue In one of the sessions, we plan to compare Abacus.AI's offerings with the internal ML/AI systems at Facebook, Google, and Uber. We are currently at 1300 attendees and will be sold out when we reach 2000 Link - https://bit.ly/3zJ05hr-abacus-210831 Thanks, Bindu Reddy CEO, Abacus.AI ============================================== Welcome to KDnuggets Unsubscribe Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com from this list: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=e1f2b44540 Our mailing address is: KDnuggets Reservoir Rd Brookline, MA 02467 USA Our telephone: Forward this email to a friend: http://us12.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e1f2b44540&e=bfdfd73c17 Update your profile: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/profile?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=e1f2b44540

subject: Join your peers in the DACH region for an afternoon of virtual conversation & collaboration
snippet: Apply today to join us online for CDAO Germany Think Tanks 2021 on the 30th of September. Chief Data and Analytics Officer Germany Think Tanks DACH Corinium 2021 Hi colleague, Would you like to join a
content:
[

Apply today to join us online for CDAO Germany Think Tanks 2021 on the 30th of September. https://dco-dach.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0693%20-%20DCO%20DACH%202021&utm_source=media%20partners%20-%20kd%20nuggets&utm_medium=KD%20Nuggets&utm_content=home Hi colleague, Would you like to join a conversation with 12-15 other senior data and analytics leaders in the DACH region, like you? If so, join Chief Data & Analytics Officer Germany Think Tanks (https://dco-dach.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0693%20-%20DCO%20DACH%202021&utm_source=media%20partners%20-%20kd%20nuggets&utm_medium=KD%20Nuggets&utm_content=home) on the 30th of September, 2021, taking place virtually. JOIN US: CDAO GERMANY THINK TANKS (https://dco-dach.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0693%20-%20DCO%20DACH%202021&utm_source=media%20partners%20-%20kd%20nuggets&utm_medium=KD%20Nuggets&utm_content=home) We know people are craving meaningful discussion with peers, so our unique "think tanks" make up the bulk of the afternoon. These intimate 1.5 hour 'self-help style' groups are highly interactive, with every participant sharing their experiences, so everyone benefits from the collective wisdom of all. This application-only event allows for idea sharing, interactive conversations, and intimate networking amongst true peers in the DACH region. Executives Already Confirmed to Participate Include: Volkswagen Gabriele Compostella Chief Technology Officer, Data Lab Volkswagen 0690 - Christian Essling Chief Data Officer, E.ON Christian Essling Chief Data Officer E.ON Energie Deutschland Lufthansa Group Mirco Bharpalamia Head of Data & Analytics Lufthansa Group ALDI Nord Felix Kalkum Managing Director Data & Analytics Competence Centre ALDI Nord Boehringer Ingelheim Andreas Henrich Corporate VP, IT Enterprise Data Services Boehringer Ingelheim Lufthansa Industry Solutions-2 Susan Wegner VP, Artificial Intelligence & Data Analytics Lufthansa Industry Solutions APPLY NOW FOR CDAO GERMANY THINK TANKS (https://dco-dach.coriniumintelligence.com/registration?utm_campaign=0693%20-%20DCO%20DACH%202021&utm_source=media%20partners%20-%20kd%20nuggets&utm_medium=KD%20Nuggets&utm_content=registration) The application only takes a few minutes to complete, and it's completely free to join! Don't miss your opportunity to join us at CDAO Germany Think Tanks (https://dco-dach.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0693%20-%20DCO%20DACH%202021&utm_source=media%20partners%20-%20kd%20nuggets&utm_medium=KD%20Nuggets&utm_content=home) where you make long-lasting connections with true peers. subject: Forecasting for the real world, not the ideal world
snippet: Next-Generation Time Series Forecasting for the Real-World, Not the Ideal World Get the ebook Hi there, Time series forecasting is one of the most valuable, yet difficult, problems in data science
content:
[

Company Logo Next-Generation Time Series (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e2c6b4f3f2&e=bfdfd73c17) Forecasting for the Real-World, Not the Ideal World (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=877e000d38&e=bfdfd73c17) Get the ebook (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=1f68d8a8d6&e=bfdfd73c17) Hi there, Time series forecasting is one of the most valuable, yet difficult, problems in data science today. But it can be a very complicated process to turn that data into actionable insights. Our new ebook, Next-Generation Time Series: Forecasting for the Real World, Not the Ideal World (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=42ce29aecf&e=bfdfd73c17) , looks at the many ways organizations are handling time series questions, including a deep dive into: checkmark The current state of time series analysis checkmark Specific time series applications, such as demand forecasting and anomaly detection checkmark How to choose the right time series cases checkmark How DataRobot’s enterprise AI platform solves time series problems Get the ebook (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=16cd89b2f7&e=bfdfd73c17) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=89825f5872&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=5d1fd5a163&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c434f6e089&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=0b0ca3db61&e=bfdfd73c17 Copyright © 2012-2021 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=1f8c85816f&e=bfdfd73c17) Privacy Policy (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=fd99f207e1&e=bfdfd73c17) Terms of Service (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=39341384e5&e=bfdfd73c17) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Zac Lipton and Frank Hutter will be at the StateOfTheArt() Conference
snippet: Hi, We will be talking state-of-the-art AI with Zac Lipton from CMU, Frank Hutter of the AutoML fame, Marty Chavez from Goldman alongside speakers from Harvard, Stanford and other large e-commerce
content:
[

Hi, We will be talking state-of-the-art AI with Zac Lipton from CMU, Frank Hutter of the AutoML fame, Marty Chavez from Goldman alongside speakers from Harvard, Stanford and other large e-commerce companies Sign up for your free ticket here - https://stateoftheartconference.ai/ In addition to some excellent fire-side chats with big thinkers in AI, we will also be discussing how big tech builds AI. We will deep dive into the AI services at Facebook. Google and Uber and contrast that with Abacus.AI's offerings. We will be announcing more speakers and a more detailed agenda soon. There is only limited room available and 1K of the 2K slots are taken Link - https://stateoftheartconference.ai/ Thanks, Bindu Reddy CEO, Abacus.AI ============================================== Welcome to KDnuggets Unsubscribe Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com from this list: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=e573a255e5 Our mailing address is: KDnuggets Reservoir Rd Brookline, MA 02467 USA Our telephone: Forward this email to a friend: http://us12.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e573a255e5&e=bfdfd73c17 Update your profile: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/profile?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=e573a255e5

subject: So many data annotation tools, so little time
snippet: Should you build or buy a data annotation tool Selecting a data annotation tool is a daunting task. The data annotation tools you use to enrich your data for training and deploying machine learning
content:
[

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=fe8b1074ba&e=bfdfd73c17 Selecting a data annotation tool is a daunting task. The data annotation tools you use to enrich your data for training and deploying machine learning models can determine success or failure for your AI project. Do you want help narrowing down the complex, ever-evolving data annotation tool market? After a decade using and evaluating tools, CloudFactory has created this essential guide to finding the right tool for your data, workforce, QA, and deployment needs. In Data Annotation Tools for Machine Learning (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ba86923f80&e=bfdfd73c17) , you’ll discover: • An overview of data annotation tools and common features • Tips for choosing whether to build or buy a tool • CloudFactory’s short list of the best commercial, open-source, and freeware data annotation tools available today • Key questions to ask during vendor evaluations Get the Guide (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e2f3de8bf5&e=bfdfd73c17) P.S. Have questions? Contact CloudFactory anytime here (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2aa7e08fbb&e=bfdfd73c17) . You might also enjoy this free guide (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=9d3f64761f&e=bfdfd73c17) to accelerating the AI lifecycle with humans in the loop. subject: Sentiment Analysis: What Are People Feeling?
snippet: Learn more about what people are feeling through sentiment analysis. Register now! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ View as a web page JMP | Statistical Discovery. From SAS. Technically Speaking Join us Aug.
content:
[

Learn more about what people are feeling through sentiment analysis. Register now! (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/live-webinars/technically-speaking/sentiment-analysis-26aug2021.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ts7013Z000002DsueQAC&utm_content=thirdparty) ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ View as a web page (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/email/2021/q3/technically-speaking/78380.html) https://www.jmp.com?utm_source=headerlogo&utm_medium=email https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/live-webinars/technically-speaking/sentiment-analysis-26aug2021.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ts7013Z000002DsueQAC&utm_content=thirdparty Join us Aug. 26 What do people feel about your products and their features? What do they feel about your customer service and brand? Now you can gain insights into customer impressions using survey text, social media, and other sources of text data. Join us for a free live webinar Aug. 26. Mike Anderson (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/bios/anderson-mike.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ts7013Z000002DsueQAC&utm_content=thirdparty) will show how sentiment analysis and term selection can quickly reveal insights from multiple forms of text data. You will learn about: * What sentiment analysis is. * How we do sentiment analysis in JMP. * Sentiment analysis and driver analysis on Toronto Casino Survey. * Examples of sentiment analysis with the Kaggle Simpsons scripts data set. Who should attend? Anyone interested in learning more about how to start exploring text data to reveal insights and create value. Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/live-webinars/technically-speaking/sentiment-analysis-26aug2021.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ts7013Z000002DsueQAC&utm_content=thirdparty) https://www.facebook.com/JMPsoftware https://twitter.com/JMP_software https://www.linkedin.com/company/jmp https://www.youtube.com/user/JMPSoftwareFromSAS Don't miss JMP updates: Please add jmp.com and sas.com as domains to your safe sender (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/about/email-safe-sender.html?utm_source=footerlink&utm_medium=email) list. Explore the four-day agenda featuring 40 half-day vendor-neutral classes on all the most important data-related topics from foundational concepts to advanced techniques. Check out the options below and plan your training across four core topics, three bootcamps, topical spotlights, and the co-located Executive Data Strategy Summit for data leaders. We are thrilled to get back to in-person events, and with our hybrid event design, we are making it easy for you to choose your preferred mode of attendance: join us on location in Orlando or from the comfort of your desk. We hope you will join us this November. Maximize your savings with Super Early Bird pricing through Sept. 17! Save an extra $100 – up to $810! – with promo code KD100. Be sure to forward this to your colleagues because teams of 3 or more save an extra 10%. subject: StateOfTheArt() DL Ops Platform & Conference
snippet: Today, we are announcing the world's first deep learning platform and relaunching our service - Abacus.AI With the new launch, you can now experiment and deploy deep learning models to production
content:
[

Today, we are announcing the world's first deep learning platform and relaunching our service - Abacus.AI With the new launch, you can now experiment and deploy deep learning models to production in a matter of weeks. Our state-of-the-art AI platform can scale to billions of data points and makes it dead easy to set up data pipelines, complex data transformations, host your TF and PyTorch models and provides you an online feature store and vector matching engine! We will be talking more about our platform along with other recent developments in AI at our FREE StateOfTheArt() AI conference. We have Zac Lipton from CMU, Frank Hutter of the AutoML fame, Marty Chavez from Goldman and speakers from Stanford, Harvard, Google and Uber Free registration here - https://bit.ly/3AFYAAi Sign up for a free trial of our platform here - https://bit.ly/3r2LvN7 This article from SiliconAngle covers our launch in more detail - https://bit.ly/3CJGH5t Thanks, Bindu Reddy CEO, Abacus.AI ============================================== Welcome to KDnuggets Unsubscribe Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com from this list: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=ce4c13b481 Our mailing address is: KDnuggets Reservoir Rd Brookline, MA 02467 USA Our telephone: Forward this email to a friend: http://us12.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ce4c13b481&e=bfdfd73c17 Update your profile: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/profile?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=ce4c13b481

subject: Free report: The Evolving Role of the Data Engineer
snippet: Report cover - The Evolving Role of the Data Engineer Data analysis gets the lion's share of the attention, and yet by some estimates data engineering comprises 80% to 90% of the work organizations
content:
[

https://get.oreilly.com/ind_the-evolving-role-of-the-data-engineer.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=q3+download&utm_content=dedicated+the+evolving+role+of+the+data+engineer+20210809 Data analysis gets the lion’s share of the attention, and yet by some estimates data engineering comprises 80% to 90% of the work organizations do with data. So why does the role of data engineer seem so, well, murky? The way we work with data is evolving quickly, and the job titles aren’t keeping pace. If you want a clear look at the role, responsibilities, skills, and best practices of data engineering, this report could prove pretty useful. And did we mention it’s free, courtesy of O’Reilly? Get the report (https://get.oreilly.com/ind_the-evolving-role-of-the-data-engineer.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=q3+download&utm_content=dedicated+the+evolving+role+of+the+data+engineer+20210809) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: State of Mathematical Optimization Report, 2021
snippet: State of Mathematical Optimization Report, 2021 We are pleased to announce the publication of our first-ever "State of Mathematical Optimization Report." This report – which is based on data
content:
[

https://www.gurobi.com/state-of-mathematical-optimization-report-landing-page/?utm_source=3PE&utm_medium=EM&utm_campaign=Q2_FY21_State_MO_ReportKDNuggets&utm_term=Mathematical_Optimization We are pleased to announce the publication of our first-ever "State of Mathematical Optimization Report." This report – which is based on data from a survey of commercial mathematical optimization users – provides insights on: * How companies from over 42 different industries are using mathematical optimization technologies today to solve a broad range of business problems. * Which business objectives have been achieved by companies utilizing mathematical optimization. * Why the use of mathematical optimization is expanding into new areas across the enterprise. subject: Are you tackling bias in your AI?
snippet: Trusted AI 102: A Guide to Building Fair and Unbiased AI Systems Download now Hi there, It's impossible to build an AI-driven organization without fully understanding the implications of bias in AI
content:
[

Company Logo Trusted AI 102: A Guide to Building Fair and Unbiased AI Systems (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/trusted-ai-102-fairness-and-bias/?utm_source=3rdpartypromoter&utm_medium=marketo&utm_campaign=TRUSTAI102-KDN) Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/trusted-ai-102-fairness-and-bias/?utm_source=3rdpartypromoter&utm_medium=marketo&utm_campaign=TRUSTAI102-KDN) Hi there, It's impossible to build an AI-driven organization without fully understanding the implications of bias in AI models. It can undermine trust towards AI and result in unfair decision-making that can have direct adverse effects on your organization. But how do you tackle the problem of bias in AI? This guide is a great way to find answers to this and many other questions around AI bias: checkmark How to identify, investigate, and mitigate bias in AI checkmark Which fairness and bias metrics to prioritize for your machine learning models checkmark How to manage the bias versus accuracy trade-off for your models Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/trusted-ai-102-fairness-and-bias/?utm_source=3rdpartypromoter&utm_medium=marketo&utm_campaign=TRUSTAI102-KDN) https://www.datarobot.com/resources/trusted-ai-102-fairness-and-bias/?utm_source=3rdpartypromoter&utm_medium=marketo&utm_campaign=TRUSTAI102-KDN https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot/ https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright Â© 2012-2021 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Salary Report: 2021 Data Practitioner Salary Guide
snippet: View this email online AGENDA | BROCHURE | REGISTER NOW Want to know what you're worth? Data professionals are some of the most sought out individuals in the corporate world today. Any company
content:
[

** View this email online (http://mail.theaisummit.com/q/1cHfLCRHWXJS/wv) ------------------------------------------------------------ https://london.theaisummit.com/what-to-expect/?utm_source=guesting&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=guestem3&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264 AGENDA (https://london.theaisummit.com/full-agenda/?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=kdnuggets&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264) | BROCHURE (http://get.knect365.com/ai-summit-london-data-practitioners-agenda/?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=kdnuggets&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264) | REGISTER NOW (https://london.theaisummit.com/attending/?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=kdnuggets&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264) ** Want to know what you're worth? ------------------------------------------------------------ Data professionals are some of the most sought out individuals in the corporate world today. Any company armed with the right talent can derive more value from its data. However, the marketplace can be confusing. The job requirements unclear, titles used interchangeably, and automation both accelerating and changing how tasks need to be approached. That's why we've created the 2021 Data Practitioner Salary Report (https://get.knect365.com/ai-summit-london-data-practitioners-report/?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=kdnuggets&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264) ; allowing you to uncover salary information for the data and analytics market GET YOUR FREE COPY (https://get.knect365.com/ai-summit-london-data-practitioners-report/?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=kdnuggets&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264) For the types of roles created and impacted by rapid technological change, it is hard to know how to benchmark your approach. That's why we wanted to create the salary report and we also invite you to read our guide (https://get.knect365.com/ai-summit-london-data-practitioners-agenda/?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=kdnuggets&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264) , designed with data-professional in mind, to explore how The AI Summit London can help you overcome your most complicated challenges with in-depth, data-focused content from the likes of AWS, Rolls-Royce and AstraZeneca! And we look forward to welcoming you to experience it for yourself soon! (http://london.theaisummit.com/attending/?utm_source=partner&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=kdnuggets&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264) Kind Regards, The AI Summit Team https://london.theaisummit.com/sponsors/?utm_source=del&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=12-week-del&utm_term=ai-business&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264 https://london.theaisummit.com/sponsors/?utm_source=del&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=12-week-del&utm_term=ai-business&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264 https://london.theaisummit.com/sponsors/?utm_source=del&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=12-week-del&utm_term=ai-business&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264 https://aibusiness.com/?utm_source=del&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=12-week-del&utm_term=ai-business&utm_content=TAI2264&tracker_id=TAI2264 This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: StateOfTheArt() conference - Save The Date
snippet: Hi, The StateOfTheArt() AI conference is back! Our next one will be on September 15th and we will have legendary researchers in Reinforcement and Self-Supervised learning participating. In addition, we
content:
[

Hi, The StateOfTheArt() AI conference is back! Our next one will be on September 15th and we will have legendary researchers in Reinforcement and Self-Supervised learning participating. In addition, we will feature speakers from Stanford, Google, Facebook, Abacus.AI and premium e-commerce, oil and gas and manufacturing companies Last time we had 3500 seats and we still sold out 2 weeks before the conference Register for free here and reserve your spot - http://bit.ly/2SUSrjd-abacus-210521 The conference will cover AI research, applied ML and the impact AI is having on society today/tomorrow. subject: Smart Cities, Drones, and Geospatial Tech (Webinar Replay)
snippet: A Chat with Smart Cities Expert and Author, Jonathan Reichental AI is everywhere. Even in the cities where we live and work. Here's your chance to learn about smart cities, the data they collect,
content:
[

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=9d03a54769&e=bfdfd73c17 AI is everywhere. Even in the cities where we live and work. Here's your chance to learn about smart cities, the data they collect, and how AI innovation is impacting city planning. CloudFactory's Keith McCormick recently chatted with Dr. Jonathan Reichental, a smart cities expert and author of Smart Cities for Dummies. As the former CIO of Palo Alto, California, and keynote speaker at global Smarter Cities conferences, Jonathan has had a front-row seat for the planning cities are doing to prepare for the future. Watch a replay of A Chat with Smart Cities Expert and Author, Jonathan Reichental (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=3509cb8e3a&e=bfdfd73c17) to learn about: • The present and future of smart cities • The impact of technology like autonomous vehicles and drones • Use of geospatial technology to address challenges like traffic congestion • Data generated by cities and how data labeling supports innovation and insight Watch Now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=39c849eb9c&e=bfdfd73c17) P.S. Have questions? Contact CloudFactory anytime here (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=511f55b706&e=bfdfd73c17) . You might also enjoy this free guide (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=62b1b02a6c&e=bfdfd73c17) to accelerating the AI lifecycle with humans in the loop. subject: Do you promote data literacy to achieve success with AI?
snippet: Data Literacy for Responsible AI Download now Hi there, Better data literacy is a key milestone on the path to fair and unbiased AI, as it ensures diverse perspectives are baked into AI governance
content:
[

Company Logo Data Literacy for Responsible AI (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2a947b9b08&e=bfdfd73c17) Download now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=4354677132&e=bfdfd73c17) Hi there, Better data literacy is a key milestone on the path to fair and unbiased AI, as it ensures diverse perspectives are baked into AI governance efforts, and that AI in production achieves consistently better outcomes. Download this white paper co-authored by DataRobot and DataCamp to learn more about: checkmark Algorithmic bias, how to define, identify, and mitigate bias in AI checkmark Accountability and governance frameworks, to develop a comprehensive understanding of the risks in an AI use case, and to put into action guardrails to monitor and reduce those risks checkmark The cultivation of data literacy, to make available to stakeholders of all technical levels a shared understanding of an AI and its data, for more informed decision-making Download now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=979d5e0563&e=bfdfd73c17) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=d8c1b358a0&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=5bdb3765cc&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c25ef0b170&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=f439feaa6a&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b0d8cfcc5a&e=bfdfd73c17 Copyright Â© 2012-2021 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=0a71f6d527&e=bfdfd73c17) Privacy Policy (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2f1d84de26&e=bfdfd73c17) Terms of Service (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2a3cdda100&e=bfdfd73c17) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Learn How GPU Acceleration is Revolutionizing Data Science and Analytics
snippet: View in Browser Logo NVIDIA A100 GPU-Accelerate Your Data Science Workflows Data science workflows have traditionally been slow and cumbersome, relying on CPUs to extract, transform, and load massive
content:
[

View in Browser (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b18e5ed88d&e=bfdfd73c17) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=80c2284cf1&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=eac9d50b34&e=bfdfd73c17 GPU-Accelerate Your Data Science Workflows Data science workflows have traditionally been slow and cumbersome, relying on CPUs to extract, transform, and load massive datasets, train DNNs until acceptable inferencing accuracy is achieved, and trained networks can be deployed. GPUs (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=fbf5f07aaf&e=bfdfd73c17) substantially outperform CPUs and reduce infrastructure costs for end-to-end data science workflows using RAPIDS™, Apache Arrow, other open source software libraries, and all leading commercial AI frameworks, along with a vast array of resources provided by NGC. GPU-accelerated data science is available everywhere-on laptops or desktops, in the data center, at the edge, and in the cloud. Features and Benefits Maximize Productivity Maximize Productivity Reduce time spent waiting to get the most valuable insights and accelerate ROI. Accomplish More Accomplish More Accelerate machine learning training up to 215x faster and perform more iterations, increase experimentation and carry out deeper exploration. Cost-Efficiency Cost-Efficiency Reduce data science infrastructure costs and increase data center efficiency. Unprecedented Acceleration at Every Scale Data scientists need to be able to analyze, visualize, and turn massive datasets into actionable insights, but scale-out solutions are often bogged down by datasets scattered across multiple servers. Accelerated servers with NVIDIA® A100 PCIe data center GPUs (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=3f81510b74&e=bfdfd73c17) provide the needed compute power-along with massive memory (40 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2a745be2d0&e=bfdfd73c17) or 80 GB HBM2e (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=17b6c8210a&e=bfdfd73c17) ), over 1.5 TB/sec of memory bandwidth, and scalability with NVIDIA NVLink^®-to tackle these workloads. Powered by the NVIDIA Ampere Architecture, A100 provides up to 20x higher performance over the prior generation and can be partitioned into seven GPU instances via MIG (Multi Instance GPU) to dynamically adjust to shifting demands. Available in 40 GB and 80 GB memory versions, the A100 80 GB has the compute and storage capacity to run the largest models and datasets. Combined with InfiniBand (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=cbb7735179&e=bfdfd73c17) , NVIDIA Magnum IO™ and the NVIDIA's unmatched ecosystem of AI, data science, and big data analytics SDKs, frameworks, tools, source code, and ISV ecosystem, the NVIDIA A100 accelerates these huge workloads at unprecedented levels of performance and efficiency. PNY offers and supports a full range of NVIDIA Data Center GPUs (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=9478a015b4&e=bfdfd73c17) , including the NVIDIA A100 PCIe (40 GB (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=a1d6e0e835&e=bfdfd73c17) or 80 GB (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=3b35038b6b&e=bfdfd73c17) ) NVIDIA A40 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2ddb1fad21&e=bfdfd73c17) , NVIDIA A30 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=0bcd44bfa7&e=bfdfd73c17) , NVIDIA A16 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=acfa1f9564&e=bfdfd73c17) , NVIDIA A10 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=62f6aab89a&e=bfdfd73c17) and the NVIDIA T4 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=18c8c3067a&e=bfdfd73c17) . For more information contact your PNY account Manager at gopny@pny.com (mailto:gopny@pny.com) or visit www.pny.com/datacenterGPU https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=24130a4252&e=bfdfd73c17 Additional Resources: * Data Science Central Podcast Series: NVIDIA-Powered Data Science Solutions (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=07ec795079&e=bfdfd73c17) * Improving Insights and Outcomes NVIDIA RTX for Data Science and Big Data subject: [eBook] Data As Its Own Tier
snippet: Dremio Logo Data As Its Own Tier DOWNLOAD NOW Read this eBook to explore the evolution of cloud data lakes from traditional data warehouses to data lakes and the separation of compute and data. Data
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ Data As Its Own Tier DOWNLOAD NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/ebook-data-as-its-own-tier.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-07-27-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email&utm_campaign=ebook-data-as-its-own-tier) Read this eBook to explore the evolution of cloud data lakes from traditional data warehouses to data lakes and the separation of compute and data. Data has emerged as one of the key assets of every company and exists as its own separate tier within an organization's architecture. In this eBook, you will learn: bullet How emerging open source projects like Apache Iceberg and Project Nessie are bringing transactions, data mutations, time travel and even a git-like experience to cloud data lakes on Amazon S3 and Azure Data Lake Storage (ADLS). bullet How these open source innovations have resulted in data essentially becoming its own tier, enabling us to think about data architectures in a completely revolutionary way. bullet How this completely new, loosely coupled, open data architecture doesn't just separate the compute from the storage, but actually separates the compute from the data. bullet How your organization can achieve immense benefits from this new architectural design. DOWNLOAD NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/ebook-data-as-its-own-tier.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-07-27-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email&utm_campaign=ebook-data-as-its-own-tier) https://hello.dremio.com/ebook-data-as-its-own-tier.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-07-27-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email&utm_campaign=ebook-data-as-its-own-tier ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. subject: Webinar - COVID-19 Hospital Capacity Management using Mathematical Models
snippet: Webinar - COVID-19 Hospital Capacity Management using Mathematical Models As hospitals cope with surges in COVID-19 cases, critical resources like ICU beds have become scarce. Data-driven strategies to
content:
[

https://www.gurobi.com/event/webinar-covid-19-hospital-capacity-management-using-mathematical-models/?utm_source=GEG&utm_medium=EM&utm_campaign=WW_MU_HEA_MU_O_MU_KDN_W_Q3_FY21_COVID19JohnHopkins_webinar&utm_term=mathematical+models&utm_content=C_WBR As hospitals cope with surges in COVID-19 cases, critical resources like ICU beds have become scarce. Data-driven strategies to coordinate care among different hospitals can lead to better utilization of available capacity, improved access to resources, reduced burden on hospitals and staff, and better patient care. Join us for a webinar presented by Kimia Ghobadi, an Assistant Professor in the Department of Civil and Systems Engineering at Johns Hopkins University. She will discuss the mathematical models that her team developed, which match COVID-19 demand with available resources in a network of hospitals through patient transfer. In this webinar you will learn: * How system-level approaches to healthcare capacity can improve resilience against surges, ensure better use of available capacity, increase efficiency, and improve access and care for patients. * How mathematical optimization can be used to determine optimal strategies to reduce the burden of COVID-19 on hospitals. * How optimally coordinated patient transfers have the potential to significantly help hospitals cope with COVID-19 surges and balance uneven loads among hospitals. The benefits of this approach will be demonstrated on a publicly available dashboard using real-world data. Register Now (https://www.gurobi.com/event/webinar-covid-19-hospital-capacity-management-using-mathematical-models/?utm_source=GEG&utm_medium=EM&utm_campaign=WW_MU_HEA_MU_O_MU_KDN_W_Q3_FY21_COVID19JohnHopkins_webinar&utm_term=mathematical+models&utm_content=C_WBR) We hope you can join us! subject: Why Unify? TDWI’s Case for the Unified Data Warehouse/Data Lake
snippet: TDWI Case for the Unified Data Warehouse/Data Lake How do you get a handle on your analytics data when all it does is grow? Do you build a data warehouse or a data lake? What if there were a third
content:
[

Logo_Color.png https://www.trifacta.com/gated-form/tdwi-best-practices-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggetsEmail How do you get a handle on your analytics data when all it does is grow? Do you build a data warehouse or a data lake? What if there were a third option, where the two architectures converged and offered you the best of both? In its Q2 2021 Best Practices Report, TDWI surveyed 220 analytics and data professionals to outline a new direction in enterprise data architectures: the unified unified data warehouse/data lake (DW/DL). Get this report to learn about unified DW/DLs: * Use cases, terminology, data tools (like data pipelines), disciplines, and organizational strategies for unified DW/DLs  * Nine recommendations for assessing whether unified DW/DLs are right for your data and business  * The drivers, challenges, opportunities, and best practices for unified DW/DLs  GET REPORT (https://www.trifacta.com/gated-form/tdwi-best-practices-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggetsEmail) Trifacta, 575 Market St, 11th Floor, San Francisco, CA 94105 +1 415-548-7108 © 2021 Copyright Contact (https://www.trifacta.com/contact/) Privacy Policy (https://www.trifacta.com/privacy-policy/) Manage Email Preferences (http://pages.trifacta.com/manage-email-preferences.html) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? Our new KDnuggets Top Blogs Reward Program (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/kdnuggets-top-authors-reward-program.html) will pay to the authors of top blogs - check details here (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/kdnuggets-top-authors-reward-program.html) . Reposts accepted, but we love original submissions, rewarded at 3 times the rate of reposts. Features * Top 6 Data Science Online Courses in 2021 (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/07/top-6-data-science-online-courses.html) , by Natassha Selvaraj * Geometric foundations of Deep Learning (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/07/geometric-foundations-deep-learning.html) , by Michael Bronstein, Joan Bruna, Taco Cohen, and PV * Google’s Director of Research Advice for Learning Data Science (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/07/google-advice-learning-data-science.html) , by Benjamin Obi Tayo * SQL, Syllogisms, and Explanations (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/07/sql-syllogisms-explanations.html) , by Adrian Walker * How to Create Unbiased Machine Learning Models (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/07/create-unbiased-machine-learning-models.html) , by Philip Tannor Products, Services * AWS Webinar: How are data-driven companies using ESG and sustainability data to make actionable decisions? (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/07/roidna-aws-webinar-data-driven-esg-sustainability-decisions.html) , by Roidna Tutorials, Overviews * Pushing No-Code Machine Learning to the Edge (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/07/pushing-no-code-machine-learning-edge.html) , by Devin Partida * Shareable data analyses using templates (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/07/shareable-data-analyses-using-templates.html) , by Cedric Dussud * Date Processing and Feature Engineering in Python (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/07/date-pre-processing-feature-engineering-python.html) , by Matthew Mayo * 7 Open Source Libraries for Deep Learning Graphs (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/07/7-open-source-libraries-deep-learning-graphs.html) , by Kevin Vu * How Much Memory is your Machine Learning Code Consuming? subject: Why We Still Need the Human Brain
snippet: Augmented Intelligence: Celebrating Human Expertise July 28th, 2021 | 11:00 AM EDT - 45 minutes, including Q&A Register now The most powerful computers on the planet still can't perform some of
content:
[

Company Logo Augmented Intelligence: Celebrating Human Expertise (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=32bf141aac&e=bfdfd73c17) July 28th, 2021 | 11:00 AM EDT - 45 minutes, including Q&A Register now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=917dca0b62&e=bfdfd73c17) The most powerful computers on the planet still can't perform some of the tasks a human toddler is capable of. Join us on Wednesday, July 28th at 11am EDT (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=5ecd8f5182&e=bfdfd73c17) for a conversation between Chief AI Evangelist Ben Taylor and Chief Medical Artificial Intelligence Officer at Northwest Medical Center, Dr. Zain Khalpey. The two will discuss why you need both human and artificial intelligence, as well as how to increase your chances of success with AI by involving your subject matter experts. In this webinar, we will discuss: checkmark Human intelligence checkmark Artificial intelligence checkmark The meaning of augmented intelligence and why it is needed checkmark How to best leverage augmented intelligence to convince stakeholders that AI systems are working and delivering value Register now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=9ed9df318d&e=bfdfd73c17) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=32067da0d3&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=cdb5100434&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ffb8b4f9a3&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=0e6201748f&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=8d9306af4c&e=bfdfd73c17 Copyright Â© 2012-2021 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=1a9011873b&e=bfdfd73c17) Privacy Policy (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c7e5139eef&e=bfdfd73c17) Terms of Service (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=02942b9be8&e=bfdfd73c17) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: What Value Will Your Text Data Reveal?
snippet: Experts from the FDA, Procter & Gamble and 1440 Consulting discuss what engineers and scientists can (and should) do with text data. Livestream on July 22 at 1 pm ET. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ View
content:
[

Experts from the FDA, Procter & Gamble and 1440 Consulting discuss what engineers and scientists can (and should) do with text data. Livestream on July 22 at 1 p.m. ET. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ View as a web page (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/email/2021/q3/statistically-speaking/78376.html) https://www.jmp.com?utm_source=headerlogo&utm_medium=email https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/july-22/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DpzxQAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** You're collecting it. You're storing it. Now do something with it. ------------------------------------------------------------ Join us for a virtual event July 22 providing industry expertise and guidance to help you get started (or continue) your journey to adopt a text analytics strategy. In a keynote presentation and panel discussion, our guests will: * Outline how they've adopted text exploration and analytics to uncover relationships and gain insights from their text data. * Discuss the potential of including text data in the predictive modeling workflow. * Share tips for communicating results from textual analyses. * And more. Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/july-22/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DpzxQAC&utm_content=thirdparty) ** Watch the keynote ------------------------------------------------------------ Manya Mayes Vice President of Data Science, 1440 Consulting Manya Mayes advises others on her area of passion and expertise: Natural Language Processing (NLP). She has over 23 years of experience in NLP, working for companies such as SAS, Attensity, IBM and, currently, at tech startup Reveal Why. Mayes' practical experience with NLP and machine learning has helped customers such as Ford, Honda, Costco, Bank of America and Ameritas make better decisions using data. https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/july-22/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DpzxQAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** Watch the panel ------------------------------------------------------------ You'll learn how leading organizations are making the most of text data - whether your unstructured data comes in the form of repair logs, engineering reports, customer surveys or other formats. Hear from Manya Mayes and: https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/july-22/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DpzxQAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** Weida Tong ------------------------------------------------------------ Director, Division of Bioinformatics and Biostatistics, National Center for Toxicological Research, FDA https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/july-22/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DpzxQAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** Jeff Swartzel ------------------------------------------------------------ Statistician, Procter & Gamble ** Details ------------------------------------------------------------ July 22 | 1:00 - 2:30 p.m. ET Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/july-22/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DpzxQAC&utm_content=thirdparty) https://www.facebook.com/JMPsoftware https://twitter.com/JMP_software https://www.linkedin.com/company/jmp https://www.youtube.com/user/JMPSoftwareFromSAS Don't miss JMP updates: Please add jmp.com and sas.com as domains to your safe sender (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/about/email-safe-sender.html?utm_source=footerlink&utm_medium=email) list. About this email: If you do not wish to receive future emails, please modify your email preferences (https://www.jmp.com/optout?utm_source=footerlink&utm_medium=email) . To contact JMP via postal address: SAS Institute Inc., JMP Software, SAS Campus Drive, Cary, NC 27513 USA ATTN: Legal Division/Privacy Manager. subject: REGISTER NOW! Don't Miss Subsurface LIVE - July 21-22, 2021
snippet: Event Image Top Five Reasons to Attend Subsurface LIVE Summer 2021! Netflix, Uber, Lyft, Adobe, LinkedIn, Dremio, Databricks, Convoy and FactSet engineers will be presenting on their innovation and how
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/subsurface/live/?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-07-15-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email-2&utm_campaign=2021-subsurface-summer Top Five Reasons to Attend Subsurface LIVE Summer 2021! * Netflix, Uber, Lyft, Adobe, LinkedIn, Dremio, Databricks, Convoy and FactSet engineers will be presenting on their innovation and how they build and operate best-in-class lakehouses. * Subsurface is FREE to attend, and if you sign up you'll receive offline access to all 30 talks immediately after the event. Plus, be among the first to register and qualify to receive an awesome swag box. * Open source panel with the who's who of cloud data lakes, moderated by Gartner's Sanjeev Mohan. The panel includes the heads of Arrow (Wes McKinney), Iceberg (Ryan Blue), Nessie (Ryan Murray) and Parquet (Julien Le Dem), this is an opportunity to be the first to know where the open source community is headed. * Keynote presentations by the people who are responsible for most of the world's data lake storage: Kevin Miller, GM of S3 @ AWS, and Jurgen Willis, VP of Azure Storage @ Microsoft * Engage LIVE with 40+ thought leaders from cutting edge companies such as Astronomer (Airflow), Coiled (Dask), Elementl (Dagster), Imply (Druid), Monte Carlo, Prefect and Preset (Superset). Check out the lineup below to see all the amazing speakers presenting at Subsurface LIVE Summer 2021. subject: Is your AI execution holding you back?
snippet: End-to-End AI: The Complete Guide to DataRobot's Enterprise AI Platform Download now Hi there, Nearly nine out of ten enterprise executives with revenue over $20 billion see AI as vital for the
content:
[

Company Logo End-to-End AI: The Complete Guide to DataRobot's Enterprise AI Platform (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/end-to-end-ai-guide/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=E2EAI-KDN) Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/end-to-end-ai-guide/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=E2EAI-KDN) Hi there, Nearly nine out of ten enterprise executives with revenue over $20 billion see AI as vital for the future of their businesses. In fact, even before the pandemic in 2019, companies were increasing their AI investments-in the amount of 4.6% on average over the previous year to about $38 million for each firm. Are you one of them? In order for your enterprise to become AI-driven, you need to adopt an end-to-end AI solution that is a single ecosystem rather than separate tools that were never designed to work together. Download our ebook, End-to-End AI: The Complete Guide to DataRobot's Enterprise AI Platform (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/end-to-end-ai-guide/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=E2EAI-KDN) , where you will learn how DataRobot's platform enables you to run in a true multi-cloud environment and why that frees you from vendor lock-in-a key differentiator in the AI market. We will also cover important features to look for, including: checkmark How to set up your organization for success in AI checkmark Why automation is essential to success checkmark Getting from raw data to value checkmark Guardrails to ensure that consistent best practices are followed checkmark How MLOps helps you streamline all of the models' lifecycle steps Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/end-to-end-ai-guide/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=E2EAI-KDN) https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot/ https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright Â© 2012-2021 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? content:

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=cf4ff68df2&e=bfdfd73c17 Webinar Top 10 Dremio and AWS Best Practices for Data Lakes (Part 1 of 2) Dramatically transform your cloud data lake analytics experience on Amazon S3 and AWS services REGISTER (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=5a2aa4baf4&e=bfdfd73c17) date Wednesday, July 14, 2021 time 10:00 AM PT | 1:00 PM ET Speakers Brett Roberts Brett Roberts Principal Solutions Architect Dremio Shashi Raina Shashi Raina Partner Solution Architect Amazon Web Services Data teams are spending too much time bogged down by time-consuming queries and complex data systems. Data lakes provide a cost-effective, centralized repository for both structured and unstructured data, yet despite these advantages, data lake users still experience challenges related to performance, managing data workflows and making data and analytics available to business users readily. Join this session to learn how data teams can accelerate queries to data stored in AWS data lakes and storage, while reducing data engineering costs and simplifying data access for analysts and data scientists. We'll review best practices when utilizing the power of Dremio and AWS: bullet The benefits of employing a data lake centric design bullet No data copies bullet Efficiencies created by separating storage and compute bullet How to stay open, flexible and portable bullet And more! REGISTER (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=7bd34486ad&e=bfdfd73c17) ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It's quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it's free! https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b14367a043&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=d71b51fe16&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ab4b1fb696&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=db72691f11&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=7bd2714194&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=32559e2cdd&e=bfdfd73c17 Â© 2021 Dremio.
