content:
[

The future is a digitally broadcast event made up of unique in-person content. This is not a webinar, not a zoom or teams call... https://www.boddigitalbroadcast.com/festival/registration?utm_campaign=0761%20-%20Business%20of%20Data%20Festival&utm_source=kdnuggs REGISTER YOUR COMPLIMENTARY TICKET (https://www.boddigitalbroadcast.com/festival/registration?utm_campaign=0761%20-%20Business%20of%20Data%20Festival&utm_source=kdnuggs) Hi Colleague, In just 2 weeks the revolutionary Business of Data Festival (https://www.boddigitalbroadcast.com/festival/registration?utm_campaign=0761%20-%20Business%20of%20Data%20Festival&utm_source=kdnuggs) is set to take place. Join us July 20-22 from 9am EST for an exclusive broadcast of in-person, in-studio content featuring perspectives from over 65 data and analytics leaders across the world, set to inspire you! The Business of Data Festival (https://www.boddigitalbroadcast.com/festival/registration?utm_campaign=0761%20-%20Business%20of%20Data%20Festival&utm_source=kdnuggs) is not a webinar, nor a Zoom call! Each morning we've curated a diverse group of interviewees and panellists which will lead to dynamic conversations with a global outlook. In the afternoon we focus on region-specific content tailored to you. Session highlights include: * Building the Digital Future on a Foundation of Trusted Data with Amy O'Connor (Precisely) * Data & Digital, Two Sides of the Same Coin with Dan Power (State Street), Stephen Gatchell (Consumer Electronics Co. in MA) and Joe DosSantos (Qlik) * Journey to the Data-Driven Enterprise with Tiffany Perkins-Munn and Hamdan Azhar from BlackRock * Delivering Tomorrow's AI Vision Today with JoAnn Stonier (Mastercard) Don't miss out - join 1000s of your peers who have already registered (https://www.boddigitalbroadcast.com/festival/registration?utm_campaign=0761%20-%20Business%20of%20Data%20Festival&utm_source=kdnuggs) ** Guest Speakers Include ------------------------------------------------------------ https://www.boddigitalbroadcast.com/festival/registration?utm_campaign=0761%20-%20Business%20of%20Data%20Festival&utm_source=kdnuggs JOIN 1000s OF YOUR PEERS (https://www.boddigitalbroadcast.com/festival/registration?utm_campaign=0761%20-%20Business%20of%20Data%20Festival&utm_source=kdnuggs) Matthew Hunt Marketing Lead, Business of Data Email: [email protected] (/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection) ** Global Premier Partner ------------------------------------------------------------ Precisely_wordmark_rgb_purple ** Global Partners ------------------------------------------------------------ qlik-3 Tigergraph ** Regional Partners ------------------------------------------------------------ metricinsights domo+logo coursera-logo-full-rgb-2 privitar-ltd-vector-logo You may be receiving this email for a number of reasons: From our research we have identified you to have an interest in the content of this communication; you may have expressed a previous interest in the topic addressed in this communication; you have participated in a Corinium Global Intelligence event or we have had some previous connection, correspondence or relationship. https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=75573784cf&e=bfdfd73c17 ** The Applied MSc programmes received the label 3IA Côte d'Azur ------------------------------------------------------------ Data ScienceTech Institute (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=80e2b70328&e=bfdfd73c17) is very proud see its three Applied MSc programmes, Data Science & Artificial Intelligence (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e36fe3600b&e=bfdfd73c17) , Data Engineering for Artificial Intelligence (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=f1d5a8a58b&e=bfdfd73c17) and Data Analytics (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=6d9e4d02dd&e=bfdfd73c17) having received a label "3IA Côte d'Azur (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=9670792d8e&e=bfdfd73c17) ", a programme driven by Université Côte d'Azur, Shanghai Ranking 301-400 (Academic Ranking of World Universities) and 13-16 at National (France) level. ** The Nice-Sophia Antipolis - "3IA Côte d'Azur" project ------------------------------------------------------------ The 3IA Côte d'Azur programme, led by Université Nice Côte d'Azur (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=a8757da654&e=bfdfd73c17) , brings together its main members in artificial intelligence such as the CNRS, Inria, the Sophia Antipolis and Nice Côte d'Azur local authorities, as well as other academic institutions on the site such as EURECOM, MINES ParisTech, SKEMA Business School and Data ScienceTech Institute (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=15030c2add&e=bfdfd73c17) , as well as the Inserm. This project brings together more than 250 academics. 35 researchers and teacher-researchers of international level have been award 3IA Côte d'Azur Chairs. Three of them are DSTI professors: * Pr Charles Bouveyron (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=8f67baed55&e=bfdfd73c17) , also Director of the 3AI Côte d'Azur programme * Pr Fabien Gandon (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=5ff52f4203&e=bfdfd73c17) * Pr Marina Teller (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=19b778853d&e=bfdfd73c17) ** What does it mean for DSTI students and graduates? ------------------------------------------------------------ 3IA Côte d'Azur promoting research at its core, but also teaching AI and its applications. A "3IA Côte d'Azur Label", awarded by its Board of Directors Committee, identifies and recognises the value of a certain number of training programs, as per 15 programs in April 2021, including the three DSTI Applied MSc programmes. The label will be placed on the transcripts and degree parchments of DSTI graduates, pushing our degree value even further on the international AI-education scene. LEARN MORE (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=003ec03c68&e=bfdfd73c17) Questions? Book an online meeting here (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=af9adab7e3&e=bfdfd73c17) ** Virtual Open Day ------------------------------------------------------------ https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=14b4479028&e=bfdfd73c17 Discover the whole DSTI experience by attending a live class. Discuss with our team to get all the information you need about the admission and career opportunities. Talk to a former DSTI student to get valuable information about life at DSTI and more. This half-day event will be 100% online. Schedule and registration here (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c328b90cf3&e=bfdfd73c17) ** Our master's-level programmes ------------------------------------------------------------ Early bird admissions. Save 10% on your tuition fees. https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=05ad7b8f71&e=bfdfd73c17 ** Applied MSc in Data Analytics (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=6ec1dc45ce&e=bfdfd73c17) ------------------------------------------------------------ https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=72d00009a8&e=bfdfd73c17 ** Applied MSc in Data Science & AI (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2901b8c339&e=bfdfd73c17) ------------------------------------------------------------ https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=8323113ab6&e=bfdfd73c17 ** Applied MSc in Data Engineering for AI (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ba89afabdc&e=bfdfd73c17) ------------------------------------------------------------ ============================================================ ** Website (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=16f8d62211&e=bfdfd73c17) ** Email (mailto:contact@dsti.institute) ** LinkedIn () ** Facebook (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e7fbd40280&e=bfdfd73c17) ** Instagram (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=eb5b42361f&e=bfdfd73c17) ** view this email in your browser (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ecad4f8723&e=bfdfd73c17) Copyright © 2021 Data ScienceTech Institute, All rights reserved. subject: [Register] Top 10 Dremio and AWS Best Practices for Data Lakes (Part 1 of 2)
snippet: Dremio Logo Top 10 Dremio and AWS Best Practices for Data Lakes (Part 1 of 2) Dramatically transform your cloud data lake analytics experience on Amazon S3 and AWS services REGISTER Wednesday, July 14,
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ Webinar Top 10 Dremio and AWS Best Practices for Data Lakes (Part 1 of 2) Dramatically transform your cloud data lake analytics experience on Amazon S3 and AWS services REGISTER (https://hello.dremio.com/webinar-dremio-and-aws-best-practices.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-07-01-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email&utm_campaign=webinar-dremio-and-aws-best-practices) date Wednesday, July 14, 2021 time 10:00 AM PT | 1:00 PM ET Speakers Brett Roberts Brett Roberts Principal Solutions Architect Dremio Shashi Raina Shashi Raina Partner Solution Architect Amazon Web Services Data teams are spending too much time bogged down by time-consuming queries and complex data systems. Data lakes provide a cost-effective, centralized repository for both structured and unstructured data, yet despite these advantages, data lake users still experience challenges related to performance, managing data workflows and making data and analytics available to business users readily. Join this session to learn how data teams can accelerate queries to data stored in AWS data lakes and storage, while reducing data engineering costs and simplifying data access for analysts and data scientists. We’ll review best practices when utilizing the power of Dremio and AWS: bullet The benefits of employing a data lake centric design bullet No data copies bullet Efficiencies created by separating storage and compute bullet How to stay open, flexible and portable bullet And more! REGISTER (https://hello.dremio.com/webinar-dremio-and-aws-best-practices.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-07-01-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email&utm_campaign=webinar-dremio-and-aws-best-practices) ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It’s quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it’s free! https://www.dremio.com/test-drive/?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-07-01-email&utm_content=kd-nuggets-email&utm_campaign=webinar-dremio-and-aws-best-practices https://github.com/dremio https://www.facebook.com/dremio https://twitter.com/dremio https://www.linkedin.com/company/dremio/ https://www.dremio.com/ © 2021 Dremio. subject: Subsurface LIVE Summer 2021 is HERE! Register Now!
snippet: Event Image Subsurface LIVE is 100% Virtual & 100% Free! Don't miss the Open Source Cloud Data Lake Conference on July 21-22! Register Now Subsurface LIVE brings together all the open source
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/subsurface/live/?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-06-30-email&utm_content=kd-nuggests-email&utm_campaign=2021-subsurface-summer Subsurface LIVE is 100% Virtual & 100% Free! subject: Computer Vision: Explained (eBook)
snippet: The Essential Guide to Computer Vision Did you know that it takes upwards of 800 hours to annotate one hour of video training data? Wow! Now, imagine if you chose the wrong annotation technique or a
content:
[

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=4350a1a065&e=bfdfd73c17 Did you know that it takes upwards of 800 hours to annotate one hour of video training data? Wow! Now, imagine if you chose the wrong annotation technique or a subpar labeling workforce -- that number could double or triple! Computer vision models require a massive amount of data to learn and stay current. The choices you make about data preparation are critical to your computer vision project's performance, budget, and speed to market. In The Essential Guide to Computer Vision (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c02c5a5bc5&e=bfdfd73c17) , you'll learn: • An introduction to image annotation for computer vision using supervised learning • How computer vision is being used in the real world • The importance of data quality and best practices for maintaining data quality • Tips for outsourcing the data labeling or managing an internal data team Read the Guide (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b4c905875a&e=bfdfd73c17) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Data Prep for Dummies (And Smart Folks, Like You)
snippet: Everything you need to know about data prep Here's a common misperception about data analysis. You simply run statistical algorithms on high-performance data engines and voilà! Relevant, accurate,
content:
[

Logo_Color.png https://www.trifacta.com/gated-form/data-preparation-for-dummies/?utm_source=kdnuggets Here's a common misperception about data analysis. You simply run statistical algorithms on high-performance data engines and voilà! Relevant, accurate, meaningful, and actionable data at your service, ready to fuel the proactive business decisions that help your organization scale. Easy, right? Actually... The reality is that analysts spend 80% of their time preparing data-cleaning, structuring, and enriching it-to get it where this kind of analysis is even possible. It's time-consuming, technically challenging, and complex. A new eBook, Data Preparation for Dummies , simplifies it for you. It explains everything you need to know about data preparation, including: * The main principles of data preparation * The big shift from desktop or on-premise solutions to cloud-based data preparation platforms * The democratization of data preparation so that everyone-not just data engineers or other technical staff with advanced coding skills-can do it LEARN MORE (https://www.trifacta.com/gated-form/data-preparation-for-dummies/?utm_source=kdnuggets) Trifacta, 575 Market St, 11th Floor, San Francisco, CA 94105 © 2021 Copyright Contact (https://www.trifacta.com/contact/) Privacy Policy (https://www.trifacta.com/privacy-policy/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: For you: The Rise of Operational Analytics
snippet: Report cover - The Rise of Operational Analytics To stay competitive, businesses need to make informed decisions fast. So the pressure is on to analyze data more quickly. Enter operational analytics.
content:
[

https://get.oreilly.com/ind_the-rise-of-operational-analytics.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=q2+download&utm_content=dedicated+the+rise+of+operational+analytics+20210618 To stay competitive, businesses need to make informed decisions fast. So the pressure is on to analyze data more quickly. Enter operational analytics. It’s an approach to building, accessing, and sharing datasets that enables actionable analytics—in near real time. This practical ebook will show you how to put operational analytics to work for your organization. And it’s free, courtesy of O’Reilly. Download the ebook (https://get.oreilly.com/ind_the-rise-of-operational-analytics.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=q2+download&utm_content=dedicated+the+rise+of+operational+analytics+20210618) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? snippet: Dear Colleague, Data & Analytics Live: Europe, is fast approaching in a few days, virtually taking place on the 22-23 June 2021. Join hundreds of data & analytics professionals across a broad
content:

Dear Colleague, Data & Analytics Live: Europe (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=20975d4c91&e=bfdfd73c17) , is fast approaching in a few days, virtually taking place on the 22-23 June 2021. Join hundreds of data & analytics professionals across a broad range of the top pan-European industries to share best practices in optimising their data strategy. Walk away with end-to-end insights on some of the most challenging situations faced by Europe's data and analytics leaders, including the key strategies to adopt when building an ROI approach to data and the question of how to bring together people and process, technology, and culture. subject: Data Management: The Good, The Bad and The Ugly
snippet: View in Browser Databricks Hi there, When it comes to data management, there's a lot of bad and some just plain ugly. But there's also good news: Databricks is quickly becoming the industry
content:
[

View in Browser (https://www.kdnuggets.com/em/2021/databricks-0614.html) https://www.databricks.com Hi there, When it comes to data management, there's a lot of bad and some just plain ugly. But there's also good news: Databricks is quickly becoming the industry standard for managing data in the cloud because it provides a simple, reliable and secure way to transform a data lake into the hub of your data architecture. Join us on June 29 or June 30 to discover how Databricks simplifies data management -- from data processing with ETL to data governance - and why that makes the lakehouse architecture a reality. You'll also learn about newly released features and tools that extend the power of Databricks as a Lakehouse platform. Here's what we'll cover: * How to automatically and reliably ingest and prepare structured and unstructured data at scale for data lakes * How to simplify your architecture and enable data scientists and analysts to query the freshest and most complete data using their SQL and BI tools of choice * How to centrally share and govern data within and across organizations using open source Delta Sharing and a unified data catalog * You'll see an end-to-end demo of Databricks' most recent capabilities for data management and live Q&A throughout the event. REGISTER NOW (https://databricks.com/p/webinar/data-management-the-good-the-bad-the-ugly?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000cVcWAAU) See Databricks in Action > (https://databricks.com/try-databricks?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdn&utm_campaign=7013f000000cVcWAAU) https://databricks.com/p/webinar/data-management-the-good-the-bad-the-ugly?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000cVcWAAU https://www.databricks.com 160 Spear Street 13th floor, San Francisco CA 94105 Â© Databricks 2021. subject: Interested in ML interpretability? O’Reilly has a gift for you.
snippet: Report cover - An Introduction to Machine Learning Interpretability Odds are, you're working with increasingly complex predictive modeling and machine learning algorithms. This complexity makes
content:
[

https://get.oreilly.com/ind_introduction-to-machine-learning-interpretability-2e.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=q2+download&utm_content=dedicated+an+introduction+to+ml+interpretability+20210609 Odds are, you’re working with increasingly complex predictive modeling and machine learning algorithms. This complexity makes these models accurate but can also make their predictions difficult to understand. When accuracy outpaces interpretability, human trust suffers, affecting business adoption, model validation efforts, and regulatory oversight. An Introduction to Machine Learning Interpretability provides cutting-edge interpretability techniques. And the best part? You can download it today, free, courtesy of O’Reilly. Download the ebook (https://get.oreilly.com/ind_introduction-to-machine-learning-interpretability-2e.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=q2+download&utm_content=dedicated+an+introduction+to+ml+interpretability+20210609) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: [Download] TDWI Checklist Report: Preparing for the Next-Generation Cloud Data Architecture
snippet: Dremio Logo TDWI Checklist Report : Preparing for the Next-Generation Cloud Data Architecture Foundation for a high performance, scalable architecture READ REPORT Data architectures to support
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ TDWI Checklist Report : Preparing for the Next-Generation Cloud Data Architecture Foundation for a high performance, scalable architecture READ REPORT (https://hello.dremio.com/wp-tdwi-checklist-report.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-06-07-email&utm_content=kd-nuggests-email&utm_campaign=wp-tdwi-checklist-report) Data architectures to support reporting, business intelligence, and analytics have evolved dramatically over the past 10 years. Instead of considering the data warehouse and the data lake as independent "data islands" that coexist in a cloud platform, it is time to reconsider the fundamental ways that information is accumulated, managed, and then provisioned to the different downstream data consumers. Download this TDWI Checklist report to understand: bullet How your organization can make this transition to a modernized data architecture bullet The decision making around this transition bullet The steps required to best take advantage of this modernized architecture and environment READ NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/wp-tdwi-checklist-report.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-06-07-email&utm_content=kd-nuggests-email&utm_campaign=wp-tdwi-checklist-report) https://hello.dremio.com/wp-tdwi-checklist-report.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-06-07-email&utm_content=kd-nuggests-email&utm_campaign=wp-tdwi-checklist-report ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. One of the biggest challenges is the inability to deliver an infrastructure that can both facilitate model deployment and support the production model lifecycle, including monitoring and governance. The discipline of creating and enabling this infrastructure is referred to as machine learning operations (MLOps). Fortunately, over the past few years, a number of vendors delivering MLOps capabilities have entered the market, driven by the growing number of organizations trying to deliver value and ROI from their AI initiatives. subject: [eBook] Exponentially Enhance the Operational Efficiencies in Your Company with the New Data Tier
snippet: Dremio Logo Exponentially Enhance the Operational Efficiencies in Your Company with the New Data Tier Data is its own tier - consisting of multiple layers of open source technologies. DOWNLOAD NOW Over
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ Exponentially Enhance the Operational Efficiencies in Your Company with the New Data Tier Data is its own tier - consisting of multiple layers of open source technologies. DOWNLOAD NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/ebook-the-new-data-tier.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-05-31-email&utm_content=kd-nuggests-email&utm_campaign=ebook-the-new-data-tier) Over the years, data-driven companies have followed four primary principles to democratize data access: 1) Migration to the Cloud, 2) Scalability, 3) Flexibility & Agility and 4) Availability. These four principles have shaped the evolution of data analytics and data infrastructure: from the pre-2015 co-location of storage and compute in purely monolithic architectures, to the 2015-2020 separation of compute and storage in cloud data warehouses, and—finally—to today’s post-2020 separation of data and compute in data architectures. Data now exists as its own, separate tier – built on open source standards and formats. The Data Tier brings data warehousing capabilities to the data lake and enables net-new capabilities that data warehouses cannot provide. It makes data highly accessible and flexible across multiple tools and engines and in general, makes data analytics and data architectures much more effective at meeting business requirements and providing business value, while at the same time being affordable, cost effective and operationally effective. Read this eBook to learn: bullet How the modern data lake architecture consists of multiple layers of open source technologies that enable the data lake to provide data warehousing capabilities, as well as net-new capabilities DWs can’t provide. bullet How these open source technologies enable users to pick and choose the technology tools and engines best suited for the job, both today and tomorrow. bullet How industry standard open table formats (such as Iceberg) and open metastores (such as Nessie) provide an always-consistent view of data across different engines. bullet How the new data tier leverages open source technologies to bring synchronization and operational efficiency between the different tools and engines. bullet How new open metastores are leveraged to enable new functionalities that take advantage of the capabilities of the data lake architecture. DOWNLOAD NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/ebook-the-new-data-tier.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-05-31-email&utm_content=kd-nuggests-email&utm_campaign=ebook-the-new-data-tier) https://hello.dremio.com/ebook-the-new-data-tier.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-05-31-email&utm_content=kd-nuggests-email&utm_campaign=ebook-the-new-data-tier ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It’s quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. subject: StateOfTheArt() AI conference - exclusive free registration
snippet: Hi, The StateOfTheArt() AI conference is little more than a week away and we have limited space left. The conference will feature speakers from Caltech, Stanford, Zillow, Pinterest, and Abacus.AI
content:
[

Hi, The StateOfTheArt() AI conference is little more than a week away and we have limited space left. The conference will feature speakers from Caltech, Stanford, Zillow, Pinterest, and Abacus.AI Register for free here - http://bit.ly/2SUSrjd-abacus-210521 The event will be kicked off with a fireside chat with Anima Anandkumar. They will discuss the evolution of deep learning over time and innovation that is around the corner. It will be followed with a discussion with Erik Brynjolfsson from Stanford on the future of work. We will then engage in a deep dive on the state-of-the-art of ML infrastructure with the heads of AI and ML at Pinterest and Zillow and with the CEO of Abacus.AI. Specifically we will compare and contract the various different ML platforms in the market, how they differ and what features are important First come, first serve, only 500 spots left! - http://bit.ly/2SUSrjd-abacus-210521 Thanks, Bindu Reddy CEO, Abacus.AI ============================================== Welcome to KDnuggets Unsubscribe Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com from this list: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=330f735ef3 Our mailing address is: KDnuggets Reservoir Rd Brookline, MA 02467 USA Our telephone: Forward this email to a friend: http://us12.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=330f735ef3&e=bfdfd73c17 Update your profile: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/profile?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=330f735ef3

subject: Data Engineer, Data Scientists & Other Data Careers, Explained; Where Did You Apply Analytics & Data Science Recently?
snippet: KDnuggets News 21:n20, May 26, 2021 issue (read online) KDnuggets KDnuggets™ News 20:n20, May 26 Features | Products | Tutorials | Opinions | Tops | Jobs Submit a blog | Image of the week This week,
content:
[

KDnuggets News 21:n20, May 26, 2021 issue (read online (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/n20.html) ) https://www.kdnuggets.com/index.html KDnuggets™ News 20:n20 (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/n20.html) , May 26 Features (#feat) | Products (#prod) | Tutorials (#tuto) | Opinions (#opin) | Tops (#tops) | Jobs (#jobs) Submit a blog (https://www.kdnuggets.com/news/submissions.html) | Image of the week (#imag) This week, take part in our survey (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/poll-did-apply-analytics-data-science-machine-learning-2020-2021.html) and let us know where you recently applied Data Science, Analytics and Machine Learning. Also: Data Scientist, Data Engineer & Other Data Careers, Explained; A Guide On How To Become A Data Scientist (Step By Step Approach); A checklist to track your Data Science progress; How to Determine if Your Machine Learning Model is Overtrained; Differentiable Programming from Scratch; and much, much more. Our new KDnuggets Top Blogs Reward Program (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/kdnuggets-top-authors-reward-program.html) will pay to the authors of top blogs - check details here (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/kdnuggets-top-authors-reward-program.html) . Reposts accepted, but we love original submissions, rewarded at 3 times the rate of reposts. Features * Data Scientist, Data Engineer & Other Data Careers, Explained (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/data-scientist-data-engineer-data-careers-explained.html) , by Matthew Mayo * Where Did You Apply Analytics, Data Science, Machine Learning in 2020/2021? (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/poll-did-apply-analytics-data-science-machine-learning-2020-2021.html) , by Matthew Mayo * A Guide On How To Become A Data Scientist (Step By Step Approach) (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/guide-become-data-scientist.html) , by Aditya Agarwal * A checklist to track your Data Science progress (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/checklist-data-science-progress.html) , by Pascal Janetzky * How to Determine if Your Machine Learning Model is Overtrained (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/how-determine-machine-learning-model-overtrained.html) , by Charles Martin * Differentiable Programming from Scratch (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/differentiable-programming-from-scratch.html) , by Guillaume Saupin Products, Services * DataOps Summit 2021 CFP Is Now Open! Noumen * How to pitch to VCs, explained: The Deck We Used to Raise Capital For Our Open-Source ELT Platform (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/vc-pitch-deck-open-source-elt-platform.html) , by John Lafleur * How to Deal with Categorical Data for Machine Learning (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/deal-with-categorical-data-machine-learning.html) , by Shelvi Garg * Building RESTful APIs using Flask (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/building-restful-apis-flask.html) , by Mahadev Easwar * DataOps: 5 things that you need to know (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/dataops-5-things-need-know.html) , by Sigmoid * Data Validation in Machine Learning is Imperative, Not Optional (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/data-validation-machine-learning-imperative.html) , by Aggarwal & Bose * Write and train your own custom machine learning models using PyCaret (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/pycaret-write-train-custom-machine-learning-models.html) , by Moez Ali Opinions * 6 Business Trends Benefiting Data Scientists (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/6-business-trends-data-scientists.html) , by Devin Partida * These Soft Skills Can Make or Break Your Data Science Career (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/soft-skills-data-science-career.html) , by Stefan Maraj Top Stories * Top Stories, May 17-23: Data Scientist, Data Engineer & Other Data Careers, Explained (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/05/top-news-week-0517-0523.html) , by KDnuggets Jobs * See our recent jobs in AI, Analytics, Data Science, Machine Learning (https://www.kdnuggets.com/jobs/index.html) * You can post a free short entry on KDnuggets jobs page for an industry or academic job related to AI, Big Data, Data Science, or Machine Learning, email - snippet: Report cover - Rebuilding Reliable Data Pipelines Through Modern Tools Data pipelines have become increasingly complex. So when data-driven applications fail, identifying the cause is challenging and
content:
[

So when data-driven applications fail, identifying the cause is challenging and time-consuming for even the most experienced performance expert. In this free ebook, Capital One director of engineering Ted Malaska examines DataOps processes and tools that enable you to better manage modern data pipelines—whether they’re in the cloud, on-prem, or in a hybrid configuration. subject: Carefully curated in-person, in-studio content. Designed for you, streaming for three days this July
snippet: Just two weeks ago we launched the Business of Data Festival and since then we've received hundreds of registrations from across the globe. BOD HEADER (3) Hi Colleague, Just a few weeks ago we
content:
[

Just two weeks ago we launched the Business of Data Festival and since then we've received hundreds of registrations from across the globe. https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=77689b5e7c&e=bfdfd73c17 Hi Colleague, Just a few weeks ago we launched the Business of Data Festival (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=fe77c54e9a&e=bfdfd73c17) and since then we've received hundreds of registrations from across the globe. Unlike any conference you've seen before, this is not a series of webinars, zoom calls or even teams! This is a unique collection of in-person, in-studio content designed specifically for you, airing across three days this July. Each morning, no matter your time zone, you'll be able to see our 'Global Content'. This carefully curated selection features episodes covering the latest data analytics challenges and topics - we'll be airing: * Data Truths with Nick Blewden, Lloyds of London * Building a Digital Future with Josh Rogers, Precisely * The Insights are Right! Journey to a Data-Driven Enterprise with Tiffany Perkins-Minn and Hamdan Azhar from BlackRock * Data Conversations Over Coffee with Moloko Komane, Multichoice Group And that's just the morning viewing schedule of Day 1. Check out the schedule in full today. (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=32e9cd1c6e&e=bfdfd73c17) DISCOVER THE VIEWING SCHEDULE AND SIGN UP TODAY (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c036a4bec3&e=bfdfd73c17) If you have any questions please do let me know. We can't wait for you to join us for the Business of Data Festival! Matthew Hunt Marketing Lead, Business of Data ** Our Global Broadcast Partners ------------------------------------------------------------ preciselty logo-qlik ** Regional Broadcast Partners ------------------------------------------------------------ metric-insights-white We respect your right to privacy. subject: A Chat with the World's First Chief Data Officer, Usama Fayyad
snippet: Join us for an interactive discussion on June 24th at 12 pm EDT: A Chat with the World's First Chief Data Officer, Usama Fayyad Can we interest you in an interactive chat with a data science icon?
content:
[

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=7c9be4af74&e=bfdfd73c17 Can we interest you in an interactive chat with a data science icon? On June 24, spend a virtual hour with Usama Fayyad, a celebrity in the world of data science, data mining, and AI. He has held impactful data strategy roles with NASA, Microsoft, Barclay's Bank, and became the world's first Chief Data Officer (CDO) at Yahoo! in 1994. You might have heard of the KDD conferences, IADSS, and ACM SIGKDD associations that he co-founded too. Join us for an interactive discussion on June 24th at 12 pm EDT: A Chat with the World's First Chief Data Officer, Usama Fayyad (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=105495e9ad&e=bfdfd73c17) Here are a few topics we plan to discuss and we welcome your questions during the event: • Experiential AI vs. human in the loop (HITL) • What's next for autonomous vehicles and NLP • Challenges that deep learning still has to overcome • The future of data science as a career Register Now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=8ce642d348&e=bfdfd73c17) P.S. Have questions? Contact CloudFactory (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b777fe64a0&e=bfdfd73c17) with questions for the speakers or support needs. In the meantime, you might enjoy this free guide (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e3bd5a7391&e=bfdfd73c17) to accelerating the AI lifecycle with humans in the loop. This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/about?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=65c6eef146) unsubscribe from this list (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=65c6eef146) update subscription preferences (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/profile?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=65c6eef146) KDnuggets . subject: Scale up your ML & Python applications with Ray
snippet: View this email in your browser Ray Summit Ray is an open source Python framework for distributed computing. Because Ray really simplifies building and running distributed applications, it is quickly
content:
[

View this email in your browser (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=fada05f313&e=bfdfd73c17) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=52fd232cd5&e=bfdfd73c17 Ray is an open source Python framework for distributed computing. Because Ray really simplifies building and running distributed applications, it is quickly becoming a key technology in large scale machine learning (ML) and Python applications. Join us at the upcoming Ray Summit (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=7c2312d36f&e=bfdfd73c17) to learn more about Ray, connect with the community, and hear how companies like Visa, Intel, Uber, Amazon, Ant Financial, and others are using Ray to build and run large scale distributed applications in production. Register Now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=6c76b29720&e=bfdfd73c17) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=a339ca63e0&e=bfdfd73c17 Highlights include: * Making boats fly with AI — Hear how McKinsey / QuantumBlack Australia helped the Emirates Team New Zealand win the 36th America's Cup by using the latest AI techniques, and speeding up their end-to-end ML pipeline with Ray * Hear from leaders in ML & AI such as Matt Johnson, Marvin Theimer, Dawn Song, Eric Brewer, and Ion Stoica * See how Ray plays with the broader ML ecosystem, with integrations into Airflow, Hugging Face, JAX, PyTorch, Tensorflow, XGBoost, and more Sign up now and see for yourself why Ray is becoming the dominant framework in distributed computing. Register now — it's free (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=10f0ffab94&e=bfdfd73c17) We hope to see you there! ============================================================ ** anyscale-twitter (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=f02888f31a&e=bfdfd73c17) ** anyscale-facebook (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=af8cbaa166&e=bfdfd73c17) ** Website (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=f14b9cf8cc&e=bfdfd73c17) ** LinkedIn (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2aa9645a10&e=bfdfd73c17) Copyright © 2021, Anyscale, All rights reserved. subject: Free ticket to the StateOfTheArt() AI conference
snippet: Hi, KDNuggets is delighted to offer you a free ticket to the StateOfTheArt() AI conference, hosted by Abacus.AI. The conference will feature speakers from Caltech, Stanford, Zillow, Pinterest, and
content:
[

Hi, KDNuggets is delighted to offer you a free ticket to the StateOfTheArt() AI conference, hosted by Abacus.AI. The conference will feature speakers from Caltech, Stanford, Zillow, Pinterest, and Abacus.AI Register for free here - http://bit.ly/2SUSrjd-abacus-210521 The event will be kicked off with a fireside chat between Anima Anandkumar and Colin White. They will discuss the evolution of deep learning over time and innovation that is around the corner. It will be followed with a discussion with Erik Brynjolfsson from Stanford on the future of work. We will then engage in a deep dive on the state-of-the-art of ML infrastructure with the heads of AI and ML at Pinterest and Zillow and with the CEO of Abacus.AI. Specifically we will compare and contract the various different ML platforms in the market, how they differ and what features are important First come and first serve, spots only available for the first 2000 to register - http://bit.ly/2SUSrjd-abacus-210521 Thanks, Bindu Reddy CEO, Abacus.AI ============================================== Welcome to KDnuggets Unsubscribe Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com from this list: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=9d792f5f7e Our mailing address is: KDnuggets Reservoir Rd Brookline, MA 02467 USA Our telephone: Forward this email to a friend: http://us12.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=9d792f5f7e&e=bfdfd73c17 Update your profile: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/profile?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=9d792f5f7e

subject: How Intelligent Automation Helps Against Anti-Money Laundering
snippet: Combatting the $2tr AML Compliance Problem with Intelligent Automation May 20, 2021 | 11.00 am ET - 45 min including Q&A Register today Hello there, Financial institutions still rely heavily on
content:
[

Company Logo Combatting the $2tr AML Compliance Problem with Intelligent Automation (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/combating-aml-compliance-problem/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WAARPA21-KD) May 20, 2021 | 11.00 am ET - 45 min including Q&A Register today (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/combating-aml-compliance-problem/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WAARPA21-KD) Hello there, Financial institutions still rely heavily on manual processes, which are inefficient, costly, and error-prone. Implementing Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and artificial intelligence (AI) can overcome many of these issues, while optimizing front- and back-office operations. Join us for our webinar, How Intelligent Automation Helps Strengthen AML Compliance (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/combating-aml-compliance-problem/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WAARPA21-KD) , to learn how the combination of AI and RPA has helped financial services companies successfully implement intelligent automation to enhance risk management. Learn how organizations have improved the operational efficiency of KYC/AML compliance by reducing false positive alerts by 60% and automating 40% of the business processes. During this session, our panel of experts will discuss: checkmark RPA and machine learning technology advances in banking and financial services. checkmark Intelligent automation use cases in KYC/AML compliance. checkmark Critical success factors to achieving intelligent automation success. subject: [Download] Five Best Practices for Deploying AWS Data Lakes
snippet: Dremio Logo Five Best Practices for Deploying AWS Data Lakes READ WHITEPAPER All types of enterprises use data lakes as a cost-effective, centralized repository to support a wide range of analytics use
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ Five Best Practices for Deploying AWS Data Lakes READ WHITEPAPER (https://hello.dremio.com/wp-top-5-best-practices-plan-design-and-build-a-successful-data-lake-on-AWS.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-05-14-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-top-5-best-practices-plan-design) All types of enterprises use data lakes as a cost-effective, centralized repository to support a wide range of analytics use cases, from operational dashboards to data science, machine learning and even big data processing. Amazon Web Services (AWS) powers many of today's cloud data lakes, making them more scalable and simpler to deploy and manage-and making the data they house easier to manage and analyze. Despite these advantages, some AWS users still experience challenges related to data lake performance, data workflows and data access. But there are ways to overcome them. Read this eBook to learn: bullet The top five best practices to help data lake architects realize an optimal data architecture bullet How to accelerate queries of data stored in an AWS data lake while reducing data engineering costs bullet How to simplify data access for analysts and data scientists bullet How to complement and extend the existing capabilities of an AWS data lake READ NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/wp-top-5-best-practices-plan-design-and-build-a-successful-data-lake-on-AWS.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-05-14-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-top-5-best-practices-plan-design) https://hello.dremio.com/wp-top-5-best-practices-plan-design-and-build-a-successful-data-lake-on-AWS.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-05-14-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-top-5-best-practices-plan-design ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It's quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it's free! https://www.dremio.com/test-drive/?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-05-14-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-top-5-best-practices-plan-design https://github.com/dremio https://www.facebook.com/dremio https://twitter.com/dremio https://www.linkedin.com/company/dremio/ https://www.dremio.com/ Â© 2021 Dremio. subject: The Chief Data Scientist at the NY Times opens up on this brand new podcast
snippet: The "Data Science Leaders" podcast launches in 3, 2, 1... INTRODUCING Data Science Leaders A podcast for data science teams tackling the world's most important challenges Scaling data
content:
[

The "Data Science Leaders" podcast launches in 3, 2, 1... Data Science Leaders Podcast ** INTRODUCING ------------------------------------------------------------ ** Data Science Leaders ------------------------------------------------------------ A podcast for data science teams tackling the world's most important challenges Scaling data science is hard. Subscribing to a podcast is easy. Grab your headphones and listen to Data Science Leaders (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=dcbbe87282&e=bfdfd73c17) , a fresh new podcast from Domino Data Lab. You can listen and subscribe in your favorite app here (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=db51a78f58&e=bfdfd73c17) . Each week, host Dave Cole will share the mic with an enterprise leader doing the hard work of scaling data science, MLOps, and more. You'll hear their stories about everything from building high-performing teams to getting more models into production. And we'll have some fun along the way. Chris Wiggins, Chief Data Scientist at the New York Times, and Celeste Fralick, Chief Data Scientist at McAfee, kick things off in the first two episodes. Tune into both conversations right now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=315b667cbb&e=bfdfd73c17) . We hope you'll listen, subscribe, and join us on this journey. Let's learn a thing or two together. ðŸŽ§ Listen to Data Science Leaders (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=bebf3f9b0d&e=bfdfd73c17) P.S. ðŸ¤– Like what you hear? Early fans of the show could win a seriously impressive robotics programming kit, just by helping us grow. Find out how (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=f15db791bc&e=bfdfd73c17) . https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c831df29d6&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=7c976a2c9c&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=7fb201d978&e=bfdfd73c17 This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Human in the Loop Machine Learning - Live Chat
snippet: You're invited to CloudFactory's upcoming interactive live discussion on May 19th at 11am EDT: A Chat with Human in the Loop Expert and Author, Robert Monarch Have you ever wished you could be
content:
[

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=98761e5ec3&e=bfdfd73c17 Have you ever wished you could be a fly on the wall while two machine learning pros chatted? Here's your chance to listen in -- and luckily, ask questions! You're invited to CloudFactory's upcoming interactive live discussion on May 19th at 11am EDT: A Chat with Human in the Loop Expert and Author, Robert Monarch (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c99b1a96c8&e=bfdfd73c17) Machine learning veteran Keith McCormick will be chatting with Robert Monarch about his brand new book, Human-in-the-Loop Machine Learning: Active learning and annotation for human-centered AI and other topics such as: • The current human-in-the-loop landscape and marketplace • Ethical considerations regarding outsourcing HITL • Estimating sample size requirements when supporting deep learning with annotation • Trends in natural language processing (NLP) with HITL • Active learning strategies Register Now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=a0d8f3e2cb&e=bfdfd73c17) P.S. Have questions? Contact CloudFactory (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=413308143d&e=bfdfd73c17) with questions for the speakers or support needs. In the meantime, you might enjoy this free guide about accelerating the AI lifecycle with HITL (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c61ac50fab&e=bfdfd73c17) . subject: Free report: AI-Driven Analytics
snippet: Report cover - AI-Driven Analytics AI-driven analysis has gone from esoteric to mission critical in just a few years. So what happens when you incorporate AI into your analytics portfolio? A lot. You
content:
[

https://get.oreilly.com/ind_getting-started-with-machine-learning-in-the-cloud.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=q2+download&utm_content=dedicated+ai+driven+analytics+20210507 AI-driven analysis has gone from esoteric to mission critical in just a few years. So what happens when you incorporate AI into your analytics portfolio? A lot. You’ll: * Reduce analysis from days to minutes * Help nontechnical users understand what to look for—and what to ask for—right from the start * Find deeper actionable insights faster than is possible with static BI dashboards (and discover insights you didn’t even know to look for) This practical (and free) report, courtesy of O’Reilly, will show you how. Download the report (https://get.oreilly.com/ind_ai-driven-analytics.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=q2+download&utm_content=dedicated+ai+driven+analytics+20210507) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: [Register] Bloor Group: An Open Architecture for Analytics
snippet: Dremio Logo Time to Reflect: An Open Architecture for Analytics REGISTER Wednesday, May 12, 2021 9:00 AM PT | 12:00 PM ET Speakers Eric Kavanagh CEO The Bloor Group Yves Mulkers Founder 7wData Scott
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ Webinar Time to Reflect: An Open Architecture for Analytics (https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/7616185608517/WN_bh521z6qRiGa7PGFT1xBvg) REGISTER (https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/7616185608517/WN_bh521z6qRiGa7PGFT1xBvg) date Wednesday, May 12, 2021 time 9:00 AM PT | 12:00 PM ET Speakers speaker Eric Kavanagh CEO The Bloor Group speaker Yves Mulkers Founder 7wData Scott%20Gay.jpg Scott Gay Senior Architect Dremio Open and straightforward: That's how analytics should work in today's Information Economy. But most architectures don't enable that vision at all. The business changes much faster than data engineers or IT can accommodate. Dashboards go stale, and reliance on them wanes. But the old way of doing things is suddenly changing, in dramatic fashion. Register for this episode of The Briefing Room to hear 7wData Founder Yves Mulkers and Bloor Group CEO Eric Kavanagh extol the virtues of an open analytics architecture. They'll be joined by Scott Gay, Senior Architect at Dremio, who will explain how a semantically enabled, in-memory architecture revolutionizes the speed and efficiency of analytics. Attendees will learn: bullet Why separating data from compute enables a pure data tier bullet How Apache Arrow tightly aligns in-memory query processing bullet The power of data "reflections" for optimizing performance bullet The value of leveraging inexpensive cloud storage (data lakes) bullet Why respect for data gravity will save you time, money and headaches REGISTER (https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/7616185608517/WN_bh521z6qRiGa7PGFT1xBvg) ^[Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries] Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It's quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it's free! https://www.dremio.com/test-drive/?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-05-06-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=webinar-time-to-reflect-an-open-architecture-for-analytics https://github.com/dremio https://www.facebook.com/dremio https://twitter.com/dremio https://www.linkedin.com/company/dremio/ https://www.dremio.com/ Â© 2021 Dremio. subject: Trusted AI 101: A Guide to Building Trustworthy and Ethical AI Systems
snippet: Trusted AI 101: A Guide to Building Trustworthy and Ethical AI Systems Download the guide Can you trust the predictions of an AI system, if it's native to your organization or a third party
content:
[

Company Logo Trusted AI 101: A Guide to Building Trustworthy and Ethical AI Systems (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/trusted-ai-guide/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=TRUSTAI101-KDN) Download the guide (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/trusted-ai-guide/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=TRUSTAI101-KDN) Can you trust the predictions of an AI system, if it's native to your organization or a third party solution? Fostering trust in AI systems is a great obstacle to bringing transformative AI technologies into reality, such as autonomous vehicles or the large-scale integration of machine intelligence in medicine. We address these issues in our latest ebook, focusing on practical tips around building trustworthy, unbiased, and ethical AI systems. By reading Trusted AI 101: A Guide to Building Trustworthy and Ethical AI Systems (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/trusted-ai-guide/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=TRUSTAI101-KDN) you will discover: checkmark Practical data quality, model accuracy, robustness, stability, and velocity dimensions of trusted AI checkmark Compliance, security, humility, and governance considerations, vital for operational trust in AI checkmark Transparency, bias and fairness, and privacy implications for AI systems striving to deliver unparalleled levels of trust aligned with your organizational values This information can help you and your organization build trust in AI, both internally and externally, approaching the issue from multiple angles. subject: Learn what's new for Ray & next-gen machine learning
snippet: View this email in your browser Anyscale Ray Summit, Jun 22-24, 2021 Powering the next generation of ML platforms Ray Summit 2021 is the best place to learn all about the latest in Ray, machine
content:
[

View this email in your browser (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=8fc40b8cec&e=bfdfd73c17) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=51992bcd2e&e=bfdfd73c17 ** Powering the next generation of ML platforms ------------------------------------------------------------ Ray Summit 2021 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=0cdbf248c9&e=bfdfd73c17) is the best place to learn all about the latest in Ray, machine learning, cloud computing, and more-together with the global Ray community. Since the release of Ray 1.0 last year, it's quickly becoming a critical component for the next generation of ML platforms, with recent developments including: * Data processing on Ray - native support for external storage and support for libraries from the Python data processing ecosystem, including integrations for PySpark & Dask. * Elastic Deep Learning with Horovod on Ray - common infrastructure and standardization to the production machine learning ecosystem. * Distributed XGBoost on Ray - multi node and multi GPU training with an interface compatible with the usual XGBoost API. * Production Ready ML Serving with Ray Serve - a new incremental deployment API, FastAPI support, and scalability improvements. * State of the Art RL with RLlib - a new trajectory view API and increased support for attention nets, offline RL, and meta-RL. To learn how Ray is playing an increasingly important role in bringing common infrastructure and standardization to the production ML ecosystem, be sure to attend Ray Summit 2021 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=1c7a5fbd03&e=bfdfd73c17) . It's free to attend and you can join the livestream or watch sessions on-demand. LEARN MORE (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2c482f3255&e=bfdfd73c17) ============================================================ ** Twitter (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ed82d2a166&e=bfdfd73c17) ** LinkedIn (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=df6d8de19f&e=bfdfd73c17) ** GitHub (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=bdeef72e4b&e=bfdfd73c17) ** Facebook (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=98282cebbf&e=bfdfd73c17) Copyright Â© 2021 Anyscale, All rights reserved. subject: State-of-the-art AI and Data Science Platform
snippet: Hi there, We have been working actively on building a new state of the art data science and AI platform. You can easily scale your models, use an online feature store and put models in production
content:
[

Hi there, We have been working actively on building a new state of the art data science and AI platform. You can easily scale your models, use an online feature store and put models in production instantly. Develop in your notebook, upload the python file to our servers and push models to production! Request access to our AI platform here - http://bit.ly/2RWgRbD-abacus-210425d We take care of real-time predictions, model versions and auto-scaling based on traffic. With the new service you can do online feature engineering and measure model drift/explainability. We work with all python libraries and support decision trees, logistic regression, catboost and deep learning models. You can also sign up for a free data science consultation here - http://bit.ly/2RWgRbD-abacus-210425d Thanks, Bindu Reddy CEO, Abacus.AI ============================================== Welcome to KDnuggets Unsubscribe Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com from this list: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=4182f8201c Our mailing address is: KDnuggets Reservoir Rd Brookline, MA 02467 USA Our telephone: Forward this email to a friend: http://us12.forward-to-friend.com/forward?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=4182f8201c&e=bfdfd73c17 Update your profile: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/profile?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=4182f8201c

content:

subject: Your VIP invite to CDAO Germany Live 2021
snippet: Hi Colleague, Are you available to meet 150+ of your peers in the German data analytics leadership community in two weeks' time? Hundreds of the country's leading data analytics executives will
content:
[

Hi Colleague, Are you available to meet 150+ of your peers in the German data analytics leadership community in two weeks' time? Hundreds of the country's leading data analytics executives will gather at Chief Data & Analytics Officer Germany Live (https://cdao-germany.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0690%20-%20CDAO%20Germany%20Live%202021&utm_source=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_medium=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_term=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_content=Homepage) , taking place virtually on 4-5 May, to share the keys to unlock data-driven transformation and deliver business value. As a leader in data analytics at your company, you can attend for free - register your complimentary pass. (https://cdao-germany.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0690%20-%20CDAO%20Germany%20Live%202021&utm_source=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_medium=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_term=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_content=Registration%20Page#REGISTER) This May, we'll be joined by over 25 leading experts to discuss the latest challenges and opportunities across the data & analytics industry. Confirmed Speakers include: * Christian Essling, Chief Data Officer, E.ON * Mirco Bharpalania, Head of Data & Analytics, Lufthansa Group * Gabriele Compostella, Chief Technology Officer, Data:Lab, Volkswagen * Christiane von Flotow, Head of Data Design, Uniper Energy * Axcella Xu, Head of EU Analytics, eBay * Frank Wagner, VP, Business Services & Infrastructure Group Privacy, Deutsche Telekom * Wolfgang Hauner, Head of Group Data Analytics, Allianz * Felix Kalkum, Managing Director, Data & Analytics Competence Centre, ALDI Nord * Alireza Dorfard, Head of Department, Data Services, Deutsche Börse * Divya Bokaria, Head of Data & Analytics, Zattoo * Ralf-Peter Schäfer, VP, Head of Traffic and Travel Information Product Unit, TomTom * Ricardo Rodrigues, Global Pricing Operations & Strategies Manager, Opel * Plus many more (https://cdao-germany.coriniumintelligence.com/speakers?utm_campaign=0690%20-%20CDAO%20Germany%20Live%202021&utm_source=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_medium=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_term=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_content=Speakers) >> Join your peers! (https://cdao-germany.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0690%20-%20CDAO%20Germany%20Live%202021&utm_source=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_medium=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_term=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_content=Registration%20Page#REGISTER) You will walk away with new ideas to allow you to overcome your most pressing challenges, including; delivering value from data, utilising emerging technologies, balancing customer expectations with privacy concerns, building a data-driven, AI-ready culture, and much more. Our unique digital format prioritises genuine interaction to ensure you can learn from, share experiences with, and get to know your counterparts responsible for data & analytics within their organization. Benefit from the collective wisdom of the group through our innovative session formats such as "self-help group" style roundtables, "Meet & Greet" networking sessions, and more. Limited spaces are now available for most exciting data & analytics event in Germany. Secure your free place today >> (https://cdao-germany.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0690%20-%20CDAO%20Germany%20Live%202021&utm_source=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_medium=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_term=KDNuggets%20Email%202&utm_content=Registration%20Page#REGISTER) If you have any questions simply reply to this email and we will respond as soon as we can. subject: [Register] Migrate BI Dashboards to Run Directly on a Cloud Data Lake in Five Easy Steps
snippet: Dremio Logo Migrate BI Dashboards to Run Directly on a Cloud Data Lake in Five Easy Steps Eliminate ETL and Data Copies While Improving Time to Insight REGISTER Tuesday, April 27, 2021 11:00 AM PT | 2:
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ Webinar Migrate BI Dashboards to Run Directly on a Cloud Data Lake in Five Easy Steps Eliminate ETL and Data Copies While Improving Time to Insight REGISTER (https://dataversity-net.zoom.us/webinar/register/2016184248170/WN_H-U6nEUoQpG5Ue1fRikvZg) date Tuesday, April 27, 2021 time 11:00 AM PT | 2:00 PM ET Speaker JasonHughes.png Jason Hughes Technical Director Dremio While BI dashboards are great at democratizing analytics in organizations, the architecture that traditionally powers them has hidden consequences that have serious impacts on the business. This architecture is based on a 30-year old paradigm that requires many different systems, ETL jobs, and copies of data in data marts, data warehouses, and BI extracts. One downside of many is that it takes many days if not weeks to answer a different business question with this architecture. The negative consequences are further multiplied by the tens, hundreds, or even thousands of dashboards needed to run a data-driven organization Now, there's a straightforward way to overcome these challenges that many organizations are already taking advantage of: an open cloud data lake architecture and Dremio. Join Jason Hughes, Technical Director at Dremio, for this webinar to learn how you can migrate BI dashboards to Dremio to quickly provide interactive dashboards to data consumers without the issues of the traditional architecture - and finally deliver the benefits always promised by BI. What You'll Learn bullet Why BI dashboards' traditional architecture implemented at scale causes many issues, which hinder the very insights it promises bullet How a Dremio-powered cloud data lake architecture eliminates or mitigates the negative consequences of the traditional approach bullet Step-by-step instructions for migrating a BI dashboard to run directly on a cloud data lake, both a self-contained example and your own dashboards REGISTER (https://dataversity-net.zoom.us/webinar/register/2016184248170/WN_H-U6nEUoQpG5Ue1fRikvZg) ^[Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries] Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It's quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it's free! https://www.dremio.com/test-drive/?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-04-19-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=webinar-migrate-bi-dashboards-to-run-directly-on-a-cloud-data https://github.com/dremio https://www.facebook.com/dremio https://twitter.com/dremio https://www.linkedin.com/company/dremio/ https://www.dremio.com/ Â© 2021 Dremio. content:

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=9d6f352813&e=bfdfd73c17 Please register to join Soda Live (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=d848b9b987&e=bfdfd73c17) on May 12, an event for organizations reliant on good data quality and integrity to transform how they operate. Soda Live is bringing together members of the data community to discuss how to deliver quality data for analytics and data products that everyone can trust. Panelists include: * Dr. Kinda El Maarry, Global Head of Data Governance at HelloFresh * Sarah Catanzaro, Partner at Amplify Partners * Dr. Alexander Borek, Head of Data at Zalando * Joseph Jacks, Partner at COSS * Martijn Spaan, Head of Data & Insights at NN Investment Partners The Soda Team will present the Soda platform and developer tools showcasing core capabilities for automated monitoring, testing and validation, data fitness and collaboration. We'll be sharing practitioner tips and inspiring you with best practices that you can put to use straight away! There are two broadcasts taking place at 4.00pm CEST and 4.00pm EDT. If your business relies on quality data, this is a must-attend event for you. Our ML engineers have applied years of experience and expertise to design a highly efficient platform for building data pipelines to train your machine learning models. No matter how large your project or what kind of model you need to improve, Toloka can help - whether it's audio and natural language processing, computer vision, chat bots and voice assistants, or search and information retrieval. Our new KDnuggets Top Blogs Reward Program (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/kdnuggets-top-authors-reward-program.html) will pay to the authors of top blogs - check details here (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/kdnuggets-top-authors-reward-program.html) . Reposts accepted, but we love original submissions, rewarded at 3 times the rate of reposts. (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/zero-shot-learning.html) , by Nagesh Chauhan * How to Apply Transformers to Any Length of Text (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/apply-transformers-any-length-text.html) , by James Briggs * NoSQL Explained: Understanding Key-Value Databases (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/nosql-explained-understanding-key-value-databases.html) , by Alex Williams * E-commerce Data Analysis for Sales Strategy Using Python (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/e-commerce-data-analysis-sales-strategy-python.html) , by Juhi Sharma * Microsoft Research Trains Neural Networks to Understand What They Read (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/microsoft-research-trains-neural-networks-understand-read.html) , by Jesus Rodriguez Opinions * Deepfakes are now mainstream. What's next? (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/deepfakes-mainstream-next.html) , by Dan Abdinoor * Why Automated Feature Selection Has Its Risks (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/automated-feature-selection-risks.html) , by Michael Grogan * How to Make Sure Your Analysis Actually Gets Used (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/make-analysis-used.html) , by Taylor Count * 7 Must-Haves in your Data Science CV (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/7-must-haves-data-science-cv.html) , by Elad Cohen Top Stories, Tweets * Top March Stories: Are You Still Using Pandas to Process Big Data in 2021? snippet: View in Browser Databricks Hi there, The lakehouse is emerging as the new paradigm for data and AI because it offers a single platform to unify all your data, analytics and AI workloads. Join our How
content:

View in Browser ({{system.ViewAsWebpageLink}}) https://www.databricks.com Hi there, The lakehouse is emerging as the new paradigm for data and AI because it offers a single platform to unify all your data, analytics and AI workloads. Join our How to Build a Lakehouse technical training, where we’ll explore how to use Apache SparkTM, Delta Lake and other open source technologies to build a better lakehouse. This virtual session will include concepts, architectures and demos. Here’s what you’ll learn in this two-hour session: * How Delta Lake combines the best of data warehouses and data lakes for improved data reliability, performance and security * How to use Apache Spark and Delta Lake to perform ETL processing, manage late-arriving data, and repair corrupted data directly on your lakehouse REGISTER TODAY (https://databricks.com/p/webinar/free-training-how-to-build-a-lakehouse?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000cUgfAAE) See Databricks in Action > (https://databricks.com/p/webinar/free-training-how-to-build-a-lakehouse?utm_source=dsc&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=70161000001uMGCAA2) https://databricks.com/p/webinar/free-training-how-to-build-a-lakehouse?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000cUgfAAE https://www.databricks.com 160 Spear Street 13th floor, San Francisco CA 94105 © Databricks 2021. Speakers for the conference include JPMorgan Chase, Intuit, Jaguar Land Rover, Pinterest, Stanford University, Forrester Research, Accenture, Capgemini, KPMG, Intel, Dell, and Xilinx, along with many innovative startups. Don't miss your chance to learn from these esteemed keynote speakers at Graph + AI Summit 2021: * Brad Spiers, the executive director at JPMorgan Chase, will share lessons learned from combining machine learning and Graphs. * Harry Powell, Director of Data and Analytics at Jaguar Land Rover, shares how they are driving over 100 million pounds annually in incremental profits with advanced analytics. * Danny Clark, Head of Fraud Strategy at NewDay, will explain how they identify and prevent fraudsters from joining their network by using graph and machine learning. * Dr. Jure Leskovec, Chief Scientist at Pinterest and Professor at Stanford University, shares what's next in terms of the evolution of graph for delivering the next-generation AI. You can see the agenda-at-glance for Graph +AI Summit (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b7f2a39623&e=bfdfd73c17) here. subject: The planet’s first-ever children’s book on data science.
snippet: Before you snicker, let us explain. florence-the-data-scientist-and-her-magical-bookmobile You're busy. We get that. So, here's the TL;DR... We here at Domino Data Lab wrote a children's
content:
[

Before you snicker, let us explain. https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e308f78889&e=bfdfd73c17 You're busy. We get that. So, here's the TL;DR... We here at Domino Data Lab wrote a children's book in hopes to introduce kids at a younger age to the magical world of data science. It's called "Florence The Data Scientist and Her Magical Bookmobile" and you can download it, here (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=f2a0dd9b57&e=bfdfd73c17) . Now for the whole story... So, we did something a bit bizarre for an MLOps software company. We wrote a children's book. At first glance, we imagine that statement evokes in you what Jane Austen once upon a time dubbed a Quizzical Brow. But, before you write us off, let us explain ourselves... Kids want to be all sorts of things when they "grow up": astronauts, zookeepers, firefighters, presidents, etc. But, something you never hear come up is... data scientist. Being that we're of the opinion that the knowledge, findings and abilities of data scientists can massively change the world for the better, we've decided it'd be worthwhile to introduce more kiddos to this particular field, earlier. Because let's face it, while firefighting will forever be more mesmerizing to a seven-year-old than data "Sciencing"... data science can put out many of the world's fires, too. So, we've written and illustrated a book titled, "Florence The Data Scientist and Her Magical Bookmobile" (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=3dd8a9f668&e=bfdfd73c17) , which you can download by hitting the magical glowing text to the left. Or, by tapping the button down below. The button down below (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=9cb0ed3fc2&e=bfdfd73c17) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/about?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=ee75a618c7) unsubscribe from this list (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/unsubscribe?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=ee75a618c7) update subscription preferences (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/profile?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b2fa8716d2&e=bfdfd73c17&c=ee75a618c7) KDnuggets .
