subject: Experience NVIDIA GTC -- The Conference for AI Innovators, Technologists, and Creatives
snippet: NVIDIA GTC is a transformative global event that brings together brilliant, creative minds looking to ignite ideas, build new skills, and forge new connections to take on our biggest challenges. View
content:
[

NVIDIA GTC is a transformative global event that brings together brilliant, creative minds looking to ignite ideas, build new skills, and forge new connections to take on our biggest challenges. View in browser (http://blog.pny.com/experience-nvidia-gtc-the-conference-for-ai-innovators-technologists-and-creatives?ecid=&utm_campaign=NVIDIA%20Quadro&utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-9iv_rLlzPysPKp9fU6oQwCe2vEIzQju2gelYwnkpr13qilMoqHL3h6AMjWadb4tJBYaJlh) https://www.pny.com/professional?utm_campaign=NVIDIA%20Quadro&utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-9iv_rLlzPysPKp9fU6oQwCe2vEIzQju2gelYwnkpr13qilMoqHL3h6AMjWadb4tJBYaJlh https://www.pny.com/company/events/gtc?utm_campaign=NVIDIA%20Quadro&utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-9iv_rLlzPysPKp9fU6oQwCe2vEIzQju2gelYwnkpr13qilMoqHL3h6AMjWadb4tJBYaJlh NVIDIA® GTC (https://www.pny.com/company/events/gtc?utm_campaign=NVIDIA%20Quadro&utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-9iv_rLlzPysPKp9fU6oQwCe2vEIzQju2gelYwnkpr13qilMoqHL3h6AMjWadb4tJBYaJlh) is a transformative global event that brings together brilliant, creative minds looking to ignite ideas, build new skills, and forge new connections to take on our biggest challenges. It all comes together online April 12 - 16, 2021 kicking off with CEO and Founder Jensen Huang's keynote on April 12 | 8:30 AM PDT. Watch live at www.pny.com/GTC. PNY would like to personally invite you to join a global community of developers, researchers, engineers, and innovators in discovering what's next in AI, HPC, healthcare, intelligent data networking, and more. Tune in to explore: * Inspiring presentations from industry pioneers * Connect with Experts sessions * Startup insights * DLI Training * Demos Registration is free and gives you access to all the live sessions, interactive panels, demos, research posters, and more. You can also add a Deep Learning Institute (DLI) full-day workshop to your GTC conference pass for just $249 each. NVIDIA's DLI offers hands-on training in AI, accelerated computing, and data science to help developers, data scientists, and other professionals solve their most challenging problems. content:

KDnuggets News 21:n13, Apr 7, 2021 issue (read online (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/n13.html) ) https://www.kdnuggets.com/index.html KDnuggets™ News 20:n13 (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/n13.html) , Apr 7 Features (#feat) | Products (#prod) | Tutorials (#tuto) | Opinions (#opin) | Tops (#tops) | Jobs (#jobs) Submit a blog (https://www.kdnuggets.com/news/submissions.html) | Image of the week (#imag) In this double issue of KDnuggets: Top 10 Python Libraries Data Scientists should know in 2021; KDnuggets Top Blogs Reward Program; Shapash: Making Machine Learning Models Understandable; Easy AutoML in Python; The 8 Most Common Data Scientists; A/B Testing: 7 Common Questions and Answers in Data Science Interviews, Part 1; and much, much more. Features * Top 10 Python Libraries Data Scientists should know in 2021 (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/top-10-python-libraries-2021.html) , by Terence Shin * KDnuggets Top Blogs Reward Program (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/kdnuggets-top-authors-reward-program.html) , by Gregory Piatetsky * Shapash: Making Machine Learning Models Understandable (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/shapash-machine-learning-models-understandable.html) , by Yann Golhen * Easy AutoML in Python (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/easy-automl-python.html) , by Dylan Sherry * The 8 Most Common Data Scientists (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/8-most-common-data-scientists.html) , by JABDE * A/B Testing: 7 Common Questions and Answers in Data Science Interviews, Part 1 (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/ab-testing-7-common-questions-answers-data-science-interviews-1.html) , by Emma Ding * Great News for KDnuggets subscribers! You now have access to the WorldData.AI Partners Plan at no cost (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/worlddata-ai-kdnuggets-partner.html) , by Gregory Piatetsky Products, Services * How Noisy Labels Impact Machine Learning Models (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/imerit-noisy-labels-impact-machine-learning.html) , by iMerit * Hiring or Looking to Get Hired in Data Science/Analytics? The INFORMS Virtual Career Fair is for You (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/informs-virtual-career-fair.html) , by INFORMS * Sudoku Rules: Using a Decision Engine to Solve Candidate Pairs (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/fico3-sudoku-decision-engine-solve-candidate-pairs.html) , by FICO * MS in Data Science at Ramapo (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/ramapo-ms-data-science.html) , by Ramapo College * Solve for Success: The Transformative Power of Data Visualization (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/copyright-power-data-visualization.html) , by Copyright Clearance Center Tutorials, Overviews * Working With Time Series Using SQL (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/time-series-using-sql.html) , by Michael Grogan * How to Dockerize Any Machine Learning Application (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/dockerize-any-machine-learning-application.html) , by Arunn Thevapalan * Automated Text Classification with EvalML (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/automated-text-classification-evalml.html) , by Angela Lin * The Best Machine Learning Frameworks & Extensions for TensorFlow (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/best-machine-learning-frameworks-extensions-tensorflow.html) , by Derrick Mwiti * How to deploy Machine Learning/Deep Learning models to the web (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/deploy-machine-learning-models-to-web.html) , by Ahmad Anis * Awesome Tricks And Best Practices From Kaggle (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/awesome-tricks-best-practices-kaggle.html) , by Bex T. * What’s ETL? (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/whats-etl.html) , by Omer Mahmood * 3 More Free Top Notch Natural Language Processing Courses (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/3-more-free-nlp-courses.html) , by Matthew Mayo * Introduction to the White-Box AI: the Concept of Interpretability (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/introduction-white-box-ai-interpretability.html) , by SciForce * Software Engineering Best Practices for Data Scientists (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/software-engineering-best-practices-data-scientists.html) , by Madison Hunter * Why So Many Data Scientists Quit Good Jobs at Great Companies (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/why-data-scientists-quit-good-jobs.html) , by Adam Sroka * Explainable Visual Reasoning: How MIT Builds Neural Networks that can Explain Themselves (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/explainable-visual-reasoning-mit-builds-neural-networks-explain-themselves.html) , by Jesus Rodriguez * How to break a model in 20 days — a tutorial on production model analytics (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/break-model-20-days-tutorial-production-model-analytics.html) , by Dral & Samuylova * MongoDB in the Cloud: Three Solutions for 2021 (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/mongodb-icloud-solutions-2021.html) , by Krueger & Franklin * Overview of MLOps (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/overview-mlops.html) , by Steve Shwartz * Multilingual CLIP with Huggingface + PyTorch Lightning (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/multilingual-clip--huggingface-pytorch-lightning.html) , by Sachin Abeywardana * Extraction of Objects In Images and Videos Using 5 Lines of Code (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/extraction-objects-images-videos-5-lines-code.html) , by Ayoola Olafenwa * Rejection Sampling with Python (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/rejection-sampling-python.html) , by Michael Grogan Opinions * One Million KDnuggets Visitors in March. Wow. (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/one-million-visitors-wow.html) , by Gregory Piatetsky * What did COVID do to all our models? (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/covid-do-all-our-models.html) , by Heather Fyson * Data vault: new weaponry in your data science toolkit (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/data-vault.html) , by Bas Vlaming * What Took Me So Long to Land a Data Scientist Job (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/land-data-scientist-job.html) , by Soner Yildirim * Deep Learning Is Becoming Overused (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/deep-learning-becoming-overused.html) , by Michael Grogan * The question that makes your data project more valuable (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/one-question-makes-data-project-more-valuable.html) , by Brittany Davis * Data Science Curriculum for Professionals (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/data-science-curriculum-professionals.html) , by Brock Taute * 15 Habits I Learned from Highly Effective Data Scientists (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/15-habits-learned-from-highly-effective-data-scientists.html) , by Madison Hunter Top Stories * Top Stories, Mar 29 – Apr 4: Top 10 Python Libraries Data Scientists should know in 2021; Shapash: Making Machine Learning Models Understandable (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/04/top-news-week-0329-0404.html) * Top Stories, Mar 22-28: How to Succeed in Becoming a Freelance Data Scientist (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/top-news-week-0322-0328.html) Jobs * See our recent jobs in AI, Analytics, Data Science, Machine Learning (https://www.kdnuggets.com/jobs/index.html) * You can post a free short entry on KDnuggets jobs page for an industry or academic job related to AI, Big Data, Data Science, or Machine Learning, email - see details at kdnuggets.com/jobs (https://www.kdnuggets.com/jobs/index.html) Image of the week From Overview of MLOps (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2021/03/overview-mlops.html) See also KDnuggets Resources in Big Data, Data Mining, Data Science, Machine Learning, and Predictive Analytics, including Blog (https://www.kdnuggets.com/news/index.html) | Courses (https://www.kdnuggets.com/courses/index.html) | Education (https://www.kdnuggets.com/education/index.html) | Jobs (https://www.kdnuggets.com/jobs/index.html) | Meetings (https://www.kdnuggets.com/meetings/index.html) | Software (https://www.kdnuggets.com/software/index.html) | Webcasts (https://www.kdnuggets.com/webcasts/index.html) Copyright © 2021 KDnuggets. subject: [Download] The Unexpected Cost of Data Copies
snippet: Dremio Logo The Unexpected Cost of Data Copies Realize a More Efficient Data Lake Architecture with Dremio READ WHITEPAPER An organization's data is copied for many reasons, namely ingesting
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ The Unexpected Cost of Data Copies Realize a More Efficient Data Lake Architecture with Dremio READ WHITEPAPER (https://hello.dremio.com/wp-the-unexpected-cost-of-data-copies.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-04-07-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-the-unexpected-cost-of-data-copies) An organization's data is copied for many reasons, namely ingesting datasets into data warehouses, creating performance-optimized copies and building BI extracts for analysis. Unfortunately, data replication, transformation and movement can result in longer time to insight, reduced efficiency, elevated costs, and increased security and compliance risk. Fortunately, a next-gen data architecture enabled by the Dremio data lake service removes the need for replicated data, helping organizations to minimize complexity, boost efficiency and dramatically reduce costs. Read this whitepaper to learn: bullet Why organizations frequently end up with unnecessary data copies bullet How replicated data increases costs and impacts the bottom line bullet How a next-gen data lake can halt data replication and streamline data management bullet What to consider when implementing a "no-copy" data strategy bullet How Dremio delivers clear business advantages in productivity, security and performance READ NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/wp-the-unexpected-cost-of-data-copies.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-04-07-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-the-unexpected-cost-of-data-copies) https://hello.dremio.com/wp-the-unexpected-cost-of-data-copies.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-04-07-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-the-unexpected-cost-of-data-copies ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It's quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it's free! https://www.dremio.com/test-drive/?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-04-07-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-the-unexpected-cost-of-data-copies https://github.com/dremio https://www.facebook.com/dremio https://twitter.com/dremio https://www.linkedin.com/company/dremio/ https://www.dremio.com/ Â© 2021 Dremio. snippet: TigerGraph_Logo.png Graph + AI Summit 2021 Email Banners (35) JOIN US IN APRIL FOR THE GRAPH+AI SUMMIT The Graph + AI Summit returns April 21-22 and once again will focus on accelerating analytics, AI,
content:
[

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=5b873234e2&e=bfdfd73c17 Graph + AI Summit 2021 ** https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=8bbac8eacd&e=bfdfd73c17 ------------------------------------------------------------ JOIN US IN APRIL FOR THE GRAPH+AI SUMMIT The Graph + AI Summit (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2f3430a7b4&e=bfdfd73c17) returns April 21-22 and once again will focus on accelerating analytics, AI, and machine learning with graph algorithms. Speakers for last year's conference included UnitedHealth Group, Intel, Dell, Jaguar Land Rover, Intuit, AT&T, Xandr, Scotiabank, Accenture, KPMG, Publicis Sapient, and Xilinx, along with many innovative startups. Don't miss your chance to learn from these esteemed keynote speakers at Graph + AI Summit 2021: * Harry Powell, Director of Data and Analytics at Jaguar Land Rover, has accelerated query times across their complex supply chain model from 3 weeks to 45 minutes, reduced their supplier risk by 35%, and drove three times the business value from data. The analytics team at Jaguar Land Rover has delivered Â£100 million in incremental profits annually. . * Noel Yuhanna, Vice President and Principal Analyst at Forrester Research, will bring insights from Forrester clients across all industries on driving business outcomes combining graph-based analytics, AI, and machine learning. * Danny Clark, Head of Fraud Strategy at NewDay, will explain how they identify and prevent fraudsters from joining their network faster than ever before by using graph and machine learning to check data against known and new fraud syndicates. Data scientists, engineers, architects, and business executives can pick sessions to enhance their learning when we open the virtual portal in April. Choose from technical sessions, live workshops and industry tracks covering: * The integration of graph algorithms into your Analytics and AI projects * Graph enrichment techniques by leveraging NLP for enhanced knowledge retrieval * Unsupervised and supervised machine learning with graph * Banking, Insurance, and Fintech industries * Technology, Advertising, Media, and Entertainment industries * Supply Chain, Manufacturing, Retail, and eCommerce industries * Healthcare, Life Sciences and Government industries ** ------------------------------------------------------------ ** Secure Your Complimentary Spot ------------------------------------------------------------ https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=5738b87346&e=bfdfd73c17 Follow us! https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=fba2446c23&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=f8b7472b65&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=df9d97f474&e=bfdfd73c17 TigerGraph 3 Twin Dolphin Drive Suite 225 Redwood City California 94065 United States This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? content:

With the number of available data science roles increasing by a staggering 650% since 2012, organizations are clearly looking for professionals who have the right combination of computer science, modeling, mathematics, and business skills. And more is being asked of data scientists as companies look to implement artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning technologies into key operations. DataRobot together with Snowflake - a leading cloud data platform provider - is helping data scientists stay current with the latest technology and data science best practices so that they can excel in an increasingly AI-driven workplace. Five Things a Data Scientist Can Do to Stay Current (https://www.datarobot.com/resource/5-things-a-data-scientist-can-do-to-stay-current/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=2020sfebook-KDN) offers data scientists guidance for thriving in AI-driven enterprises, with tips such as: checkmark Using automated machine learning (AutoML) frameworks to enhance productivity checkmark Fostering collaboration between DevOps and machine learning operations (MLOps) teams checkmark Adopting data handling best practices to ensure more efficient workflows checkmark Sharing data with trusted partners and suppliers to ensure top value checkmark Collecting and accessing data from outside sources Read the ebook (https://www.datarobot.com/resource/5-things-a-data-scientist-can-do-to-stay-current/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=2020sfebook-KDN) to get more information about staying up to speed with the latest technologies in a rapidly evolving AI environment. subject: [Register] Overcome the 5 Biggest Analytics Challenges
snippet: Dremio Logo Make Analytical Data Available to Everyone by Overcoming the 5 Biggest Challenges REGISTER Wednesday, March 31, 2021 10:00 AM PT | 1:00 PM ET Speakers Claudia Imhoff Intelligent Solutions
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ Webinar Make Analytical Data Available to Everyone by Overcoming the 5 Biggest Challenges REGISTER (https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/3977537603053839376?source=Dremio) date Wednesday, March 31, 2021 time 10:00 AM PT | 1:00 PM ET Speakers Claudia Imhoff Claudia Imhoff Intelligent Solutions Founder Boulder BI Brain Trust Isha Sharma Isha Sharma Director of Product Management Dremio "Data and analytics for all!" - the admirable, new mantra for today's companies. But it's not easy to put all of an organization's analytical data and assets into the hands of everyone that needs it. That's why embarking on this democratization initiative requires you to be prepared to overcome the five monumental challenges you undoubtedly will face. Join us for this interactive webcast (https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/3977537603053839376?source=Dremio) where we will: explore the recommended components of an all-encompassing, extended analytics architecture; dive into the details of what stands between you and data democratization success, and; reveal how a new open data architecture maximizes data access with minimal data movement and no data copies. Attendees will learn: bullet The five biggest challenges to democratizing data bullet How to permanently and thoroughly liberate data via live, interactive queries that run directly on cloud data lake storage bullet A best-practice roadmap for finally achieving "data and analytics for all," as quickly as possible bullet How a next-generation cloud data lake architecture brings together the best attributes of data warehouse and data lakes to truly democratize data REGISTER (https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/3977537603053839376?source=Dremio) ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It's quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it's free! But hurry-Dremio Virtual Labs are only available for a limited time. https://www.dremio.com/labs/?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-03-29-email&utm_content=one-click&utm_campaign=make-analytical-data-available-to-everyone https://github.com/dremio https://www.facebook.com/dremio https://twitter.com/dremio https://www.linkedin.com/company/dremio/ https://www.dremio.com/ Â© 2021 Dremio. (https://cdao-germany.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0690%20-%20CDAO%20Germany%20Live%202021&utm_source=KDNuggets%20Email&utm_medium=KDNuggets%20Email&utm_term=KDNuggets%20Email&utm_content=Registration%20Page#REGISTER) REGISTER YOUR COMPLIMENTARY PASS (https://cdao-germany.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0690%20-%20CDAO%20Germany%20Live%202021&utm_source=KDNuggets%20Email&utm_medium=KDNuggets%20Email&utm_term=KDNuggets%20Email&utm_content=Registration%20Page#REGISTER) This May, we'll be joined by leading experts to discuss the latest challenges and opportunities across the data & analytics industry. subject: Free ebook: Reporting, Predictive Analytics, and Everything in Between
snippet: Report cover - Reporting, Predictive Analytics, and Everything in Between Planning a data analytics initiative forces you to face a bewildering array of choices-from deciding among different analytics
content:

https://get.oreilly.com/ind_reporting-predictive-analytics-and-everything-in-between.html?tm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=q1+download&utm_content=dedicated+predictive+analytics+everything+20210325 Planning a data analytics initiative forces you to face a bewildering array of choices-from deciding among different analytics platforms or selecting reporting systems to determining how to deploy analytic components in streaming and embedded systems. This practical ebook can help. Reporting, Predictive Analytics, and Everything in Between explains: * Analytics platforms including embedded BI, reporting, data exploration and discovery, streaming BI, and data science and machine learning * The business problems each option solves and the capabilities and requirements of each * How to identify the right analytics type for your particular use case * Key considerations and the level of investment for each analytics platform The best part? It’s yours free, courtesy of O’Reilly. subject: [Register] Democratize Your Data by Eliminating Data Copies
snippet: Dremio Logo Democratize Your Data by Eliminating Data Copies SAVE YOUR SPOT Thursday, March 25th, 2021 9:00 am PT / 12:00 noon ET Speaker Brock Griffey Solutions Architect Dremio Disconnected data
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ Webinar Democratize Your Data by Eliminating Data Copies SAVE YOUR SPOT (https://hello.dremio.com/democratize-your-data-by-eliminating-data-copies.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-03-24-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=democratize-your-data-by-eliminating-data-copies) date Thursday, March 25th, 2021 time 9:00 am PT / 12:00 noon ET Speaker Brock%20Griffey.png Brock Griffey Solutions Architect Dremio Disconnected data copies are a key obstacle to democratizing data and making it readily available to data consumers. However, many organizations think of copies as a necessary evil - a requirement of the data warehouses, BI extracts, cubes and other constructs used to make datasets available to the analysts who rely on them while optimizing performance for their reporting and BI use cases. But what if there is a better way? Join us to learn about next-generation cloud data lake architecture and how it brings together the best attributes of the data warehouse and the data lake to truly democratize data access. During this webinar you'll learn: bullet How you can avoid loading data into a data warehouse by querying your data directly on S3 or ADLS bullet About using a semantic layer to provision different views of the data, eliminating the need for personalized data copies bullet Why you no longer need additional copies for performance optimization (e.g., aggregates or sorted tables) bullet How to achieve performance with a live connection from your BI tool, making BI extracts and imports unnecessary bullet About new technologies for high-throughput data exchange such as Apache Arrow Flight SAVE YOUR SPOT (https://hello.dremio.com/democratize-your-data-by-eliminating-data-copies.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-03-24-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=democratize-your-data-by-eliminating-data-copies) ** Spin Up Dremio in One Click for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It's quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it's free! But hurry-Dremio Virtual Labs are only available for a limited time. https://www.dremio.com/labs/?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-03-24-email&utm_content=one-click&utm_campaign=democratize-your-data-by-eliminating-data-copies https://github.com/dremio https://www.facebook.com/dremio https://twitter.com/dremio https://www.linkedin.com/company/dremio/ https://www.dremio.com/ Â© 2021 Dremio. subject: Building A Culture of Analytic Excellence
snippet: Learn from innovative organizations that implement data analytics in every facet of business to solve problems, remain competitive. Livestream on March 25 at 1 pm ET. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ JMP |
content:
[

Learn from innovative organizations that implement data analytics in every facet of business to solve problems, remain competitive. Livestream on March 25 at 1 p.m. ET. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ https://www.jmp.com?utm_source=headerlogo&utm_medium=email https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/mar-25/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DpONQA0&utm_content=thirdparty ** Do you have a strategy for building analytic excellence in your organization? ------------------------------------------------------------ Your competitors do. Join us for a virtual event March 25 to hear real-world examples of organizations that place the highest value on data analytics to drive decision making and innovation. Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/mar-25/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DpONQA0&utm_content=thirdparty) ** Watch the keynote ------------------------------------------------------------ If you want to enable a stronger analytic culture, data literacy is imperative. Curiosity helps, too. But what are the elements that enable faster, better and more efficient science? Loren Perelman, VP of Science at Riffyn, will share his perspective on the topic, from years of experience at science and manufacturing organizations. https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/mar-25/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DpONQA0&utm_content=thirdparty ** Learn about: ------------------------------------------------------------ * The key ingredients needed to create and promote a data-driven culture. * The basic steps required to use data effectively, whether for solving problems or for improvement and innovation. * Strategies for removing common bottlenecks to generating and sharing new knowledge. ** Watch the panel ------------------------------------------------------------ The best organizations spread awareness and knowledge of analytics to everyone who needs it. Hear examples from innovative organizations that do more than talk about being data-driven companies; instead, they strive to put data analytics at the heart of all decision making. You'll hear from Loren Perelman and: https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/mar-25/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DpONQA0&utm_content=thirdparty ** Andre B. subject: Distributed Data Science and Culture - Making Scaled Data Science Work For People
snippet: Making Scaled Data Science Work For People, March 30, 5 pm ET Making Scaled Data Science Work For People, March 30, 5 pm ET Making Scaled Data Science Work For People, March 30, 5 pm ET Data science is
content:
[

Making Scaled Data Science Work For People, March 30, 5 pm ET https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=dcf5e21a96&e=bfdfd73c17 ** Making Scaled Data Science Work For People (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=0cb36f3ffe&e=bfdfd73c17) , March 30, 5 pm ET ------------------------------------------------------------ Data science is too often discussed as a technical discipline, rather than a social and cultural one. But the role of data science is to both inform and automate decision-making processes, which require, in turn, humans to collaborate and communicate with each other and humans to collaborate with machines, both of which have key cultural and social dimensions. This webinar, presented by Hugo Bowne-Anderson, Head of Data Science Evangelism and Marketing at Coiled, will answer key questions, including * Why do so many executives feel that so little of the data work in their organizations actually deliver returns? * How can we reduce friction in factoring the process of turning business questions into business answers through the intermediaries of data questions and data answers? * What provisions need to be in place to make sure that everybody is speaking enough of the same data languages to excel at their jobs? * How do we promote data literacy throughout organizations while getting the job done? Join us on March 30th at 5 pm ET by signing up here (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=d82fc856d1&e=bfdfd73c17) Register Now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=86a0dbd40a&e=bfdfd73c17) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? https://appen.com/ Embracing Responsible AI (http://appen.com/embracing-responsible-ai-ebook/?utm_source=Paid&utm_medium=KDN) From Pilot to Production With AI investment growing and teams rushing to find ways to bring it into the core of their business, the intention of responsible AI is often an afterthought. This is one of the biggest ways companies set themselves up for failure. In Embracing Responsible AI from Pilot to Production (http://appen.com/embracing-responsible-ai-ebook/?utm_source=Paid&utm_medium=KDN) , we'll share how to strategically launch an inclusive AI initiative that provides business value and reflects an ethics-first approach. Download the eBook today to learn more about these key areas: * A breakdown of what responsible AI means * The challenges of AI adoption and why responsible AI can alleviate these obstacles * A five-step AI development process with ethical AI practices baked in * What the explainability problem is and why it's so important to address Download your eBook (http://appen.com/embracing-responsible-ai-ebook/?utm_source=Paid&utm_medium=KDN) When your goal is to launch world-class AI, Appen's reliable training data gives you the confidence to deploy. This shift pressures organizations to invest in technologies to manage and analyze time series data. Traditional statistical tools struggle to leverage multivariate inputs, uncover actionable insights and make an impact on actual business operations. subject: [Download] Next-Gen Cloud Data Lake: An Open, No-Copy Data Architecture
snippet: Dremio Logo The Next-Generation Cloud Data Lake An Open, No-Copy Data Architecture READ WHITEPAPER In an effort to be data driven, many organizations are looking to democratize data. However, they
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ The Next-Generation Cloud Data Lake An Open, No-Copy Data Architecture READ WHITEPAPER (https://hello.dremio.com/wp-the-next-generation-cloud-data-lake.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-03-11-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-the-next-generation-cloud-data-lake) In an effort to be data driven, many organizations are looking to democratize data. However, they often struggle with increasingly larger data volumes, reverting back to bottlenecking data access to manage large numbers of data engineering requests and rising data warehousing costs. To address this, a next-gen cloud data lake architecture has emerged that brings together the best attributes of the data warehouse and the data lake. This new open data architecture is built to maximize data access with minimal data movement and no data copies. Read this whitepaper to learn: bullet How this "no data copy" approach dramatically streamlines data workflows while reducing security and governance overhead bullet Why agile development concepts, when applied to the data tier, can dramatically increase data engineering agility bullet How to separate compute and data by preserving data in open file and table formats bullet About alternative solutions such as lake houses and how they compare to next-gen cloud data lakes READ WHITEPAPER (https://hello.dremio.com/wp-the-next-generation-cloud-data-lake.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-03-11-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-the-next-generation-cloud-data-lake) https://hello.dremio.com/wp-the-next-generation-cloud-data-lake.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-03-11-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=wp-the-next-generation-cloud-data-lake ** Spin Up Dremio in One Minute for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It's quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it's free! Snowflake's cloud data platform accelerates data science with DataRobot Automated Machine Learning, bringing AI and data science within reach for every company. In this free instructor-led lab (https://www.snowflake.com/webinar/virtual-hands-on-labs/accelerating-data-science-with-snowflake-and-datarobot/?utm_source=datarobot&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=vhol-3rd-party-2-datarobot) you'll get first-hand experience preparing data in Snowflake and building and training models with DataRobot. No prior experience is necessary, and you will have trial access to both platforms after the lab is over so you can continue honing your data science skills. subject: Free ebook: Getting DataOps Right
snippet: Free O'Reilly ebook: ML at Enterprise Scale Machine Learning at Enterprise Scale report cover Machine learning is immensely useful, but it can be difficult to scale and get into production. In this
content:
[

Free O'Reilly ebook: ML at Enterprise Scale https://get.oreilly.com/ind_machine-learning-at-enterprise-scale.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=q1+download&utm_content=dedicated+mach+learn+ent+scale+20210308 Machine learning is immensely useful, but it can be difficult to scale and get into production. In this practical (and free!) ebook, data scientists and machine learning engineers look at six common challenges that teams face every day when creating, managing, and scaling ML applications. Then they offer their hard-earned advice so you can avoid the pitfalls and get up and running quickly. And did we mention it’s free, courtesy of O’Reilly? content:
[

KDnuggets News 21:n09, Mar 3, 2021 issue (read online (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=80ea89f102&e=bfdfd73c17) ) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=0ff90a6363&e=bfdfd73c17 KDnuggets™ News 21:n09 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=f9682b0df0&e=bfdfd73c17) , Mar 3 Features | Tutorials (#Tutorials) | Opinions (#Opinions) | Jobs (#Jobs) | Submit a blog (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=263fc96b65&e=bfdfd73c17) | Image of the week (#Image) In this issue, find the top YouTube channels for Data Science; they will help you with Data Science Learning Roadmap for 2021; Another great learning option is Machine Learning Systems Design: A Free Stanford Course; and if you are still using pandas to process large datasets, here are two better options. Features * Top YouTube Channels for Data Science (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=174d4533f2&e=bfdfd73c17) * Data Science Learning Roadmap for 2021 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=0f60da804b&e=bfdfd73c17) * Machine Learning Systems Design: A Free Stanford Course (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=69ed84f29b&e=bfdfd73c17) * Are You Still Using Pandas to Process Big Data in 2021? Here are two better options (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c163b498db&e=bfdfd73c17) * How Reading Papers Helps You Be a More Effective Data Scientist (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=13de0e8b43&e=bfdfd73c17) Tutorials, Overviews * Speech to Text with Wav2Vec 2.0 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2287269bdf&e=bfdfd73c17) * 3 Mathematical Laws Data Scientists Need To Know (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=30eb66984c&e=bfdfd73c17) * Google's Model Search is a New Open Source Framework that Uses Neural Networks to Build Neural Networks (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=8f3b7d2eb8&e=bfdfd73c17) * Understanding Graph Databases (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e6b0106ff0&e=bfdfd73c17) * 6 Web Scraping Tools That Make Collecting Data A Breeze (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=3e6da9349b&e=bfdfd73c17) * The Difficulty of Graph Anonymisation (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=0b1158d158&e=bfdfd73c17) * Pandas Profiling: One-Line Magical Code for EDA (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=1868f53d89&e=bfdfd73c17) Opinions * The Ultimate Guide to Acing Coding Interviews for Data Scientists (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e2f256e73c&e=bfdfd73c17) * 5 Supporting Skills That Can Help You Get a Data Science Job (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=7b477e0697&e=bfdfd73c17) * Why Do Machine Learning Projects Fail? (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=8161c6efa6&e=bfdfd73c17) Jobs * See our recent jobs in AI, Analytics, Data Science, Machine Learning (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=9aed67b877&e=bfdfd73c17) * You can post a free short entry on KDnuggets jobs page for an industry or academic job related to AI, Big Data, Data Science, or Machine Learning, email - subject: Find the True Impact of AI and a More Intelligent Tomorrow
snippet: AI Thought Leadership Digest: Expert Outlook on the Future of AI, Q1 2021 Download now Many people start with business buzzwords and then try to build their AI solutions-as opposed to identifying the
content:
[

Company Logo AI Thought Leadership Digest: Expert Outlook on the Future of AI, Q1 2021 (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/ai-thought-leadership-digest-q1-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=DGST21-KD) Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/ai-thought-leadership-digest-q1-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=DGST21-KD) Many people start with business buzzwords and then try to build their AI solutions-as opposed to identifying the problem they're trying to solve and then finding the right technology. This is the philosophy of Eric Boduch, co-founder and Chief Evangelist of Pendo .io, and one of the many industry thought leaders on DataRobot's More Intelligent Tomorrow podcast. We started the podcast in order to have candid conversations with industry innovators that explore the potential impact of AI on the world around us. In our AI Thought Leadership Digest, Q1 2021: Expert Outlook on the Future of AI (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/ai-thought-leadership-digest-q1-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=DGST21-KD) we share highlights from some of our top guests on the podcast. In these episodes, we covered a wide variety of exciting and timely topics, such as: checkmark Ethical and safety guidelines for AI and data checkmark The democratization of data checkmark The pitfalls of shiny-new-toy syndrome checkmark The effects of AI on healthcare and other industries checkmark Ways to run a business while maintaining a healthy family life Read our AI Thought Leadership Digest, Q1 2021 (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/ai-thought-leadership-digest-q1-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=DGST21-KD) to learn more about the current state and future of AI. https://www.datarobot.com/resources/ai-thought-leadership-digest-q1-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=DGST21-KD INDUSTRY NAME AI Thought Leadership Digest: Expert Outlook on the Future of AI, Q1 2021 Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/ai-thought-leadership-digest-q1-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=DGST21-KD) https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot/ https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright Â© 2012-2021 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? content:

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=48c3143374&e=bfdfd73c17 A few questions for you... Does your team process high-volume or time-sensitive data that your organization depends on to deliver a product or service? Do you have large archives of printed or scanned documents that need to be digitized and structured so the information they include can be accessed, searched, and maintained? Do you have high volumes of incorrect, inaccurate, or inconsistent data that needs to be cleansed before it can be useful? If you answered yes to any of these questions, then you should read CloudFactory's new Guide to Finding the Best Data Entry Services. Learn about common use cases and industries where data entry services are fueling digital transformation, the pros and cons of several workforce and technology options, and tips for choosing a data entry service that can adapt and scale with your evolving needs. subject: [Register] Eliminate Data Transfer Bottlenecks with Apache Arrow Flight
snippet: Eliminate Data Transfer Bottlenecks with Apache Arrow Flight Thursday, February 25th, 2021 10:00 am PT | 1 pm ET Speakers Wes McKinney PMC Chair and Co-Creator Apache Arrow CEO and Founder Ursa
content:
[

https://hello.dremio.com/eliminate-data-transfer-bottlenecks-with-apache-arrow-flight.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-02-23-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=eliminate-data-transfer-bottlenecks-with-apache-arrow-flight date Thursday, February 25th, 2021 time 10:00 a.m. PT | 1 p.m ET Speakers Wes McKinney Wes McKinney PMC Chair and Co-Creator Apache Arrow CEO and Founder Ursa Computing Matt Topol Matt Topol Vice President, Principal Software Engineer FactSet Tomer Shiran Tomer Shiran Co-Founder and Chief Product Officer Dremio Data scientists and analysts need fast access to millions of records. However, the throughput of traditional data transfer APIs such as pyodbc is insufficient to meet their needs, so they extract data into files on their local machines. This results in significant security and governance issues as well as stale data copies. Join us as we explore how Apache Arrow Flight solves this problem by providing a new and modern standard for transporting large data between networked applications. We'll even run a live bake-off to demonstrate how Arrow Flight enables more than 10x faster transfer rates for highly parallel systems compared to pyodbc. You will learn: bullet About Arrow Flight's remote procedure call (RPC) mechanism and how it fulfills Apache Arrow's promise of data interoperability bullet How you can quickly build data services with built-in authentication and security bullet How clients can connect to an Arrow Flight server endpoint using the Arrow Flight client libraries bullet About Flight SQL, an upcoming standard for data access that utilizes the tried-and-true SQL as its query language. SAVE YOUR SPOT (https://hello.dremio.com/eliminate-data-transfer-bottlenecks-with-apache-arrow-flight.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=2021-02-23-email&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=eliminate-data-transfer-bottlenecks-with-apache-arrow-flight) ** Spin Up Dremio in One Minute for Lightning-Fast Queries ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. It's quick and easy to gain hands-on experience with Dremio by launching an on-demand instance. And best of all, it's free! But hurry-Dremio Virtual Labs are only available for a limited time. https://www.dremio.com/labs/ https://github.com/dremio https://www.facebook.com/dremio https://twitter.com/dremio https://www.linkedin.com/company/dremio/ https://www.dremio.com/ Â© 2021 Dremio. subject: A Technical Primer on Data Drift & Drift Detection Techniques
snippet: Download a copy of Dataiku's technical white paper for insight on data drift & drift detection techniques. dataiku_main_logo.png Insights Email Banner Data Drif Diving Deeper: Understand and
content:
[

Download a copy of Dataiku's technical white paper for insight on data drift & drift detection techniques. http://dataiku.com ** Insights ------------------------------------------------------------ https://pages.dataiku.com/data-drift-detection-techniques?utm_campaign=CONTENT%20Data%20Drift%20Technical%20WP%202020&utm_source=nam-kdnuggets&utm_medium=paid-email&utm_content=data%20drift%20WP ** Diving Deeper: Understand and Measure Data Drift ------------------------------------------------------------ Data is constantly changing, as is the world from which it is collected. When a model is deployed in production, detecting changes and anomalies in new incoming data is key to make sure the predictions obtained are valid and can be safely consumed. Get a copy of "A Primer on Data Drift & Drift Detection Techniques (https://pages.dataiku.com/data-drift-detection-techniques?utm_campaign=CONTENT%20Data%20Drift%20Technical%20WP%202020&utm_source=nam-kdnuggets&utm_medium=paid-email&utm_content=data%20drift%20WP) " for a brief but deep dive into the types of data drift, its root causes, and practical examples of measuring data drift. DOWNLOAD NOW (https://pages.dataiku.com/data-drift-detection-techniques?utm_campaign=CONTENT%20Data%20Drift%20Technical%20WP%202020&utm_source=nam-kdnuggets&utm_medium=paid-email&utm_content=data%20drift%20WP) Dataiku, 902 Broadway, New York City, New York 10010, United States https://www.linkedin.com/company/dataiku/ https://twitter.com/dataiku https://blog.dataiku.com/ https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSMqVwPTmerMiCaL_zKRjBw This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Two weeks to go until Chief Data & Analytics Officers, UK
snippet: We're excited to announce the return of our flagship event Chief Data & Analytics Officers, UK for the 8th year! CDAO UK 2021 (1) Hi Colleague, In just two weeks we're hosting our 8th
content:
[

We're excited to announce the return of our flagship event Chief Data & Analytics Officers, UK for the 8th year! https://cdao-uk.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0643%20-%20CDAO%20UK%202021&utm_source=kdnuggs-two Hi Colleague, In just two weeks we're hosting our 8th Annual Chief Data & Analytics Officers, UK (https://cdao-uk.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0643%20-%20CDAO%20UK%202021&utm_source=kdnuggs-two) ! Over the past 8 years we've hosted thousands of UK data analytics leaders to discuss the challenges the industry has faced and opportunities that have arisen. But none have been quite like the past year! Whilst this year we can't be face-to-face in London, we can continue to build on the past years with new leading-edge content, expert speaker faculty but on a new interactive virtual platform. Registration is now open - secure your complimentary pass (https://cdao-uk.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0643%20-%20CDAO%20UK%202021&utm_source=kdnuggs-two) to attend, today. SECURE YOUR COMPLIMENTARY PASS TO ATTEND (https://cdao-uk.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0643%20-%20CDAO%20UK%202021&utm_source=kdnuggs-two) COVID-19 has reshaped the industry. Calling for faster transformation to prepare for unique future opportunities - and this year our CDAO UK agenda has been totally redesigned to examine not just a short-term approach, but positioning your function for long-term success, post pandemic. Session highlights include: * What do data, analytics and tech leaders need to do to adapt, survive and thrive in 2021 and beyond? * Building robust ecosystems for enhanced business intelligence * Getting smart with artificial intelligence - building trust through ethical AI * Leveraging data science and analytics to develop a 360 view of the customer and accelerate CX strategy * & much, much more! (https://cdao-uk.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0643%20-%20CDAO%20UK%202021&utm_source=kdnuggs-two) VIEW THE AGENDA (https://cdao-uk.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0643%20-%20CDAO%20UK%202021&utm_source=kdnuggs-two) ** Expert Speakers for 2021 ------------------------------------------------------------ https://cdao-uk.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0643%20-%20CDAO%20UK%202021&utm_source=kdnuggs-two SECURE YOUR COMPLIMENTARY PASS TO ATTEND (https://cdao-uk.coriniumintelligence.com/?utm_campaign=0643%20-%20CDAO%20UK%202021&utm_source=kdnuggs-two) If you have any questions about the event please don't hesitate to reach out! Hope to see you there, Matt mattsig Matthew Hunt Marketing Manager, CDAO UK Email: enquiries@coriniumintel.com Corinium Global Intelligence is registered on the Information Commissioners Office (ICO) Data Protection Register - our registration number is: ZA011492 Corinium Global Intelligence, 20-22 Wenlock Road, London, London N1 7GU, United Kingdom, +44 (0)203 432 2335 This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? Company Logo Ten Keys to AI Success in 2021 (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/ten-keys-to-ai-success-in-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WTKEY21-KDN) February 24th, 2021 | 11:00 am EST - 45 min including Q&A (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/ten-keys-to-ai-success-in-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WTKEY21-KDN) Register for the webinar (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/ten-keys-to-ai-success-in-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WTKEY21-KDN) The potential business benefits of AI are immense. As PWC predicts "AI could contribute up to $15.7 trillion to the global economy in 2030", but it would be a mistake to think that adopting AI is without its challenges. Join our webinar (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/ten-keys-to-ai-success-in-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WTKEY21-KDN) , Top 10 Keys to AI Success in 2021. Find out how business leaders across industries saved time and improved accuracy by using AI, resulting in reduced costs and increased overall ROI. In this webinar, you will learn how to: checkmark Optimize and automate AI to deliver ROI for your business checkmark Implement an MLOps strategy and infrastructure that operationalizes, monitors, and governs your entire machine learning lifecycle checkmark Get more accurate results 10x faster by automating the key stages of production machine learning checkmark Democratize AI with education programs that create citizen data scientists checkmark Identify common pitfalls and mistakes made when deploying AI into production Register (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/ten-keys-to-ai-success-in-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WTKEY21-KDN) https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/ten-keys-to-ai-success-in-2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WTKEY21-KDN https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright Â© 2012-2021 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Improve Model Accuracy With Data Labeling
snippet: Gain an overview of three popular active learning packages and how they compare and explore findings from a reproduction exercise. 2021 Dataiku Logo - DKU_LOGO_RGB_TEAL_DARK_BLUE Insights Email banner
content:
[

Gain an overview of three popular active learning packages and how they compare and explore findings from a reproduction exercise. https://www.dataiku.com/ ** Insights ------------------------------------------------------------ https://pages.dataiku.com/tech-white-paper-unpacking-data-labeling?utm_campaign=CONTENT%20Tech%20WP%20SSl%20and%20Active%20Learning%20Nov%202020&utm_source=glo-kdnuggets&utm_medium=paid-email&utm_content=glo-kdnuggets ** Improve Model Accuracy With Data Labeling ------------------------------------------------------------ Before jumping into any cutting-edge machine learning algorithms or deploying any models, the data involved needs to be high quality and labeled. But how do you bootstrap a data science project when the data is available but unlabeled? Get the latest paper (https://pages.dataiku.com/tech-white-paper-unpacking-data-labeling?utm_campaign=CONTENT%20Tech%20WP%20SSl%20and%20Active%20Learning%20Nov%202020&utm_source=glo-kdnuggets&utm_medium=paid-email&utm_content=glo-kdnuggets) from the data science experts at Dataiku that highlights semi-supervised and active learning labeling techniques (benefits, drawbacks, and more) via a series of experiments and reproduction exercises. Company Logo DataRobot MLOps Agents (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/mlops-agents/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=MLOpsAgent-KDN) Provide Centralized Monitoring for All Your Production Models (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/mlops-agents/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=MLOpsAgent-KDN) Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/mlops-agents/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=MLOpsAgent-KDN) The production gap and the cost of additional resources are the most significant challenges to centralizing your MLOps platform. DataRobot MLOps Agents (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/mlops-agents/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=MLOpsAgent-KDN) are the solution to these challenges. DataRobot's Agents are designed to run on remote hosts and monitor the behavior of your production models. This information is then sent to DataRobot's centralized MLOps server, allowing you to detect, diagnose and resolve issues occurring in any production model. This provides organizations with the flexibility required to meet the unique project needs of multiple departments and lines of business all working on different platforms and in different programming languages. Learn how DataRobot MLOps has conquered these challenges by reading our ebook, DataRobot MLOps Agents (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/mlops-agents/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=MLOpsAgent-KDN) . subject: Humans in the Loop: Accelerating the AI Lifecycle
snippet: Human in the Loop Why is my model failing? Why wasn't that cruddy data caught during QC? Why does our auto-labeling tool keep missing things? If you've asked yourself any of these questions
content:
[

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=de738b9d48&e=bfdfd73c17 Why is my model failing? Why wasn't that cruddy data caught during QC? Why does our auto-labeling tool keep missing things? If you've asked yourself any of these questions during the AI lifecycle, you might benefit from a human in the loop workforce strategy (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=bc9c8806c6&e=bfdfd73c17) . From proof of concept through production, humans can do everything from inspecting, validating, and tweaking algorithms to collecting, labeling, and ensuring quality data feeds and refreshes the models. Knowing when and where to leverage humans in the loop is key to reducing the number of failed AI projects and the time and money that is wasted on them. We've seen firsthand which human in the loop strategies worked for hundreds of AI clients and now we're sharing that insight with you. Read the Guide (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=2040850f66&e=bfdfd73c17) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: ebook: 10 Keys to AI Success in 2021
snippet: 10 Keys to AI Success in 2021 Download now "AI could contribute up to $15.7 trillion to the global economy by 2030, more than the current output of China and India combined," according to PwC
content:
[

Company Logo 10 Keys to AI Success in 2021 (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/aisuccess2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=10KEYS2021-KDN) Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/aisuccess2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=10KEYS2021-KDN) "AI could contribute up to $15.7 trillion to the global economy by 2030, more than the current output of China and India combined," according to PwC (https://www.pwc.com/gx/en/issues/data-and-analytics/publications/artificial-intelligence-study.html#:~:text=%2415.7%20trillion%20game%20changer&text=AI%20could%20contribute%20up%20to,come%20from%20consumption-side%20effects.) . Capitalizing on the incredible potential of AI means having a coherent AI strategy that you can operationalize within your existing processes. But it's not always easy for organizations to get there. In our ebook, 10 Keys to AI Success in 2021 (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/aisuccess2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=10KEYS2021-KDN) , we look at how organizations are overcoming hurdles and realizing the enormous rewards that AI can bring to any organization. Drawing on the engaging conversations we've had with guests on our More Intelligent Tomorrow podcast series, we cover ten areas that organizations need to be successful with AI in 2021 (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/aisuccess2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=10KEYS2021-KDN) , including: checkmark Achieving ROI with AI and delivering valuable results with urgency checkmark AI storytelling in communicating value to your organization checkmark Trusted AI and how vital it is to your AI projects checkmark The importance of governance in ensuring consistency in the modeling process checkmark How MLOps streamlines machine learning from data to value Read our ebook (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/aisuccess2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=10KEYS2021-KDN) to learn more about all ten keys to AI success in 2021. https://www.datarobot.com/resources/aisuccess2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=10KEYS2021-KDN WHITE PAPER/EBOOK 10 Keys to AI Success in 2021 Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/aisuccess2021/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=10KEYS2021-KDN) https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright Â© 2012-2021 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Secure Your Place: NYU Stern MS in Business Analytics
snippet: header Are you ready to advance your career with data? NYU Stern's MS in Business Analytics (MSBA) program is a one-year, part-time program designed for experienced professionals with at least 5
content:
[

https://web-marketing.stern.nyu.edu/global-programs/business-analytics/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=eblast&utm_campaign=kdn12521&utm_term=jan25&utm_content=fy21 Are you ready to advance your career with data? NYU Stern's MS in Business Analytics (MSBA) program (https://web-marketing.stern.nyu.edu/global-programs/business-analytics/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=eblast&utm_campaign=kdn12521&utm_term=jan25&utm_content=fy21) is a one-year, part-time program designed for experienced professionals with at least 5 years of professional experience who are looking to use data science and AI to inform business strategy. The MSBA program is uniquely positioned as a program that educates its students to be translators of analytics and modeling results toward business problems that are heavily influenced by AI. Students will attend class with their cohort during five on-site modules that take place at NYU Stern and in rotating global locations, with online, independent study in between. Our final deadline for the MSBA Class of 2022, beginning May 2021, is March 1. Follow the instructions below to be considered for admission: * Step 1: Get started by submitting an MSBA inquiry form. (https://web-marketing.stern.nyu.edu/global-programs/business-analytics/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=eblast&utm_campaign=kdn12521&utm_term=jan25&utm_content=fy21) Step 2: Within one week, the Admissions Committee will invite you to learn more about the program by registering for an information session or by scheduling an optional one-on-one informational call with a member of the Admissions Committee. Step 3: Complete the online application and submit the required application materials. Please note that the GMAT and GRE are generally not required on the initial application. Step 4: The Admissions Committee may contact you to schedule a final interview upon review of a completed application. Take the first step and start the application process today! (https://web-marketing.stern.nyu.edu/global-programs/business-analytics/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=eblast&utm_campaign=kdn12521&utm_term=jan25&utm_content=fy21) https://web-marketing.stern.nyu.edu/global-programs/business-analytics/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=eblast&utm_campaign=kdn12521&utm_term=jan25&utm_content=fy21 mailto:msba@stern.nyu.edu https://twitter.com/NYUSternMSBA https://business.facebook.com/NYUSternMSBA https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/ms-in-business-analytics/ mailto:msba@stern.nyu.edu Â© 2021 Leonard N. Stern School of Business This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Last chance for 30+ cloud data lake tech sessions
snippet: Subsurface LIVE 2021 | January 27-28 Featuring case studies from tech leaders at companies like Netflix, AWS, Adobe, Microsoft and USAA, the cloud data lake conference, Subsurface LIVE, is coming up
content:
[

Attend technical sessions with the creators of open-source technologies like Apache Iceberg, Amundsen, InfluxDB IOx, dbt and Apache Parquet and hear from data architects and engineers about best practices for building open cloud data lakes. content:
[

Hi, We are holding a contest to train models using our state-of-the-art deep-learning service. You can bring your dataset and train your own deep leaning model in a few hours using our automated deep learning service. Get started here - http://bit.ly/3qJnRoe-abcontest-210124 The 1st price is for $1000 with multiple 2nd and 3rd prices and your model will be showcased to You will be judged for creativity and the type of model you develop. Several members of the community have already developed models here - http://bit.ly/3qJu7we-abmodel-210124 While we provide sample datasets, you can also search for public datasets on Google or Kaggle. Learn machine and deep learning and have fun along the way by participating in the contest! subject: Livestream: Find Meaning With Purpose-Driven Analytics
snippet: Hear from analytics experts and change agents from NOAA, Riffyn, SAS and University of Michigan. Livestream on Jan. 28 at 1 pm ET. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ JMP | Statistical Discovery. From SAS. Find
content:
[

Hear from analytics experts and change agents from NOAA, Riffyn, SAS and University of Michigan. Livestream on Jan. 28 at 1 p.m. ET. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ https://www.jmp.com?utm_source=headerlogo&utm_medium=email https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/jan-28/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=advertisement&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DnsnQAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** How can we use purpose-driven analytics to create a life worth living? ------------------------------------------------------------ Join us for a virtual event Jan. 28 featuring a presentation about how scientists are using data to help people align with their life's purpose, followed by a panel discussion with analysts from many different fields who are maximizing data and their analytics expertise to make the world a better place. Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/jan-28/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=advertisement&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DnsnQAC&utm_content=thirdparty) ** Watch the keynote ------------------------------------------------------------ Vic Strecher is a professor and behavioral scientist at the University of Michigan School of Public Health. He wrote Life on Purpose, which examines the science and philosophy of purpose in life and ways to develop and align with one's purpose. He is founder and CEO of Kumanu, an app that fuses AI and machine learning, the latest behavior-changing and habit-forming models, and real-time predictive decision support to help people and organizations find meaning in work and purpose in life. https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/jan-28/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=advertisement&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DnsnQAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** Learn about: ------------------------------------------------------------ * Experimental studies on the effects of a purpose-driven life on behavior and well-being. * The potential of structured experimentation to transform science. * Predictive modeling for conservation management. * Applying analytics to social innovation initiatives addressing inequality. * And more. ** Watch the panel ------------------------------------------------------------ Meet these analytics experts who also happen to be change agents in their fields. We'll talk about what happens when your analytics work aligns with a passion, how predictive models and data visualization can solve a variety of intractable problems, and the great responsibility that comes with having access to data and the know-how to do something with it. You'll hear from Vic Strecher and: https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/jan-28/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=advertisement&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DnsnQAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** Timothy Gardner ------------------------------------------------------------ Founder and CEO, Riffyn https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/jan-28/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=advertisement&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DnsnQAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** Ayana Littlejohn ------------------------------------------------------------ Senior Associate Analytical Consultant, SAS https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/jan-28/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=advertisement&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DnsnQAC&utm_content=thirdparty ** Anderson Mayfield ------------------------------------------------------------ Assistant Scientist, NOAA/University of Miami ** Details ------------------------------------------------------------ Jan. 28 | 1:00 - 2:30 p.m. ET Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/jan-28/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=advertisement&utm_campaign=ss7013Z000002DnsnQAC&utm_content=thirdparty) https://www.facebook.com/JMPsoftware https://twitter.com/JMP_software https://www.linkedin.com/company/jmp https://www.youtube.com/user/JMPSoftwareFromSAS Don't miss JMP updates: Please add jmp.com and sas.com as domains to your safe sender (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/about/email-safe-sender.html?utm_source=footerlink&utm_medium=email) list. To contact JMP via postal address: SAS Institute Inc., JMP Software, SAS Campus Drive, Cary, NC 27513 USA ATTN: Legal Division/Privacy Manager. SAS and all other SAS Institute Inc. product or service names are registered trademarks or trademarks of SAS Institute Inc. in the USA and other countries. ® indicates USA registration. subject: Learn the 5 best practices to be successful at AI
snippet: The Intelligence Revolution: Driving ROI with AI January 27, 2021 | 11.00 am EDT - 60 min including Q&A Register today Almost every business in every corner of the world is seeing some use of AI
content:
[

Company Logo The Intelligence Revolution: Driving ROI with AI (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/driving-roi-with-ai/?utm_source=3rdpartypromoter&utm_medium=KDNuggets&utm_campaign=WINR21-KDN) January 27, 2021 | 11.00 am EDT - 60 min including Q&A Register today (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/driving-roi-with-ai/?utm_source=3rdpartypromoter&utm_medium=KDNuggets&utm_campaign=WINR21-KDN) Almost every business in every corner of the world is seeing some use of AI within its business. But the question is, are they using AI in ways that will help them drive the biggest ROI? Join us (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/driving-roi-with-ai/?utm_source=3rdpartypromoter&utm_medium=KDNuggets&utm_campaign=WINR21-KDN) for a lively discussion on this topic with Lou Celi, CEO of ESI ThoughtLab, Peter Henstock, Machine Learning and AI Lead at Pfizer, and Ari Kaplan, AI Evangelist at DataRobot, as they discuss the findings of ESI ThoughtLab's benchmarking study of 1200 organizations across world markets. In the webinar, you will learn: checkmark Insights around the current state of AI at major companies and how those organizations plan to continue to make major investments in AI. checkmark The five best practices to be successful at AI and drive high performance. checkmark How Pfizer is already using AI to meet challenges and "lead from the middle." content:

content:

https://www.dremio.com/ AWS Logo Webinar Analyze Your Entire Cloud Data Lake in Real Time No Data Warehouse Required REGISTER (https://hello.dremio.com/webinar-analyze-your-entire-cloud-data-lake-in-real-time.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=kd-nuggets-newsletter-2020-12&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=webinar-analyze-your-entire-cloud-data-lake-in-real-time) date Thursday | January 14, 2021 time 10:00 AM PT | 1:00 PM ET Speakers Blair Hutchinson Blair Hutchinson Product Manager, Technology Partners Tableau Brock%20Griffey.png Brock Griffey Solutions Architect Dremio What if you could provide your analysts self-service access to all the pertinent data in your data lake to enable real-time business analytics? Join technical experts from Tableau and Dremio as they discuss how to enable fast access to more complete data and accelerate query performance. They'll demonstrate how you can easily connect Tableau to your data lake with Dremio to immediately begin driving better business decisions. You'll learn how to: bullet Visualize data directly on your data lake bullet Provision new datasets with consistent KPIs and business logic in minutes, not days or weeks bullet Empower analysts to create their own derivative datasets, without copies bullet Accelerate analytics queries for real-time data visualizations bullet Minimize data copies and movement to meet data governance requirements REGISTER (https://hello.dremio.com/webinar-analyze-your-entire-cloud-data-lake-in-real-time.html?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=kd-nuggets-newsletter-2020-12&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=webinar-analyze-your-entire-cloud-data-lake-in-real-time) ** Want to see Dremio in action? ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts.
