snippet: KDnuggets News 21:n01, Jan 6, 2021 issue (read online) KDnuggets KDnuggets™ News 21:n01, Jan 6 Features | Tutorials | Opinions | Tops | Jobs | Submit a blog | Image of the week Happy New Year! The
content:
[

KDnuggets News 21:n01, Jan 6, 2021 issue (read online (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=3307dc4c4d&e=bfdfd73c17) ) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=6b86e867a3&e=bfdfd73c17 KDnuggets™ News 21:n01 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=6dff3e75b0&e=bfdfd73c17) , Jan 6 Features | Tutorials (#Tutorials) | Opinions (#Opinions) | Tops (#Tops) | Jobs (#Jobs) | Submit a blog (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=69e0cd222d&e=bfdfd73c17) | Image of the week (#Image) Happy New Year! The first issue in 2021 brings you a great blog about Monte Carlo integration - in Python; An overview of main ML algorithms you need to know in 2021; SQL vs NoSQL: 7 key takeaways; Generating beautiful neural network visualizations - how to; MuZero - may be the most important ML system ever created; and much more! Features * Monte Carlo integration in Python (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=f676e0d363&e=bfdfd73c17) * All Machine Learning Algorithms You Should Know in 2021 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b941cdd178&e=bfdfd73c17) * SQL vs NoSQL: 7 Key Takeaways (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b4d4c211eb&e=bfdfd73c17) * Generating Beautiful Neural Network Visualizations (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=3f16c36711&e=bfdfd73c17) * DeepMind's MuZero is One of the Most Important Deep Learning Systems Ever Created (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=11c224a928&e=bfdfd73c17) Tutorials, Overviews * Model Experiments, Tracking and Registration using MLflow on Databricks (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=67cd9293e4&e=bfdfd73c17) * Meet whale! The stupidly simple data discovery tool (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=a8b3cd1304&e=bfdfd73c17) * 15 Free Data Science, Machine Learning & Statistics eBooks for 2021 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=45c9db2d5a&e=bfdfd73c17) * Data Science as a Product - Why Is It So Hard? (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=1acf59d284&e=bfdfd73c17) * Key Data Science Algorithms Explained: From k-means to k-medoids clustering (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ea049cf894&e=bfdfd73c17) * Essential Math for Data Science: The Poisson Distribution (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=932635b860&e=bfdfd73c17) * 2020: A Year Full of Amazing AI Papers - A Review (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=8463680fdd&e=bfdfd73c17) * XGBoost: What it is, and when to use it (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e9d11e06c5&e=bfdfd73c17) Opinions * Where is Marketing Data Science Headed? (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=337d26c40b&e=bfdfd73c17) * How to Get a Job as a Data Engineer (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=75d3714903&e=bfdfd73c17) * Six Tips on Building a Data Science Team at a Small Company (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ac90d4515c&e=bfdfd73c17) * Data Catalogs Are Dead; Long Live Data Discovery (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c04c8a870a&e=bfdfd73c17) * How to easily check if your Machine Learning model is fair? (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=72310998e8&e=bfdfd73c17) * Can you trust AutoML? (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=700d42d1a1&e=bfdfd73c17) Top Stories, Tweets * Top Stories, Dec 21 - Jan 03: Monte Carlo integration in Python; 15 Free Data Science, Machine Learning & Statistics eBooks for 2021 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=df2acaa3de&e=bfdfd73c17) * Top Stories, Dec 14-20: Crack SQL Interviews; State of Data Science and Machine Learning 2020: 3 Key Findings (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=23a34fb5c3&e=bfdfd73c17) Jobs * See our recent jobs in AI, Analytics, Data Science, Machine Learning (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ea1b7b2c1c&e=bfdfd73c17) * You can post a free short entry on KDnuggets jobs page for an industry or academic job related to AI, Big Data, Data Science, or Machine Learning, email - see details at kdnuggets.com/jobs (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c1342fb04d&e=bfdfd73c17) Image of the week Monte Carlo integration in Python (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b06f58bb53&e=bfdfd73c17) See also KDnuggets Resources in Big Data, Data Mining, Data Science, Machine Learning, and Predictive Analytics, including Blog/News (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=7e85471bd6&e=bfdfd73c17) | Courses (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=1895c774a7&e=bfdfd73c17) | Education (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=f2b781150c&e=bfdfd73c17) | Jobs (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c50079e8ea&e=bfdfd73c17) | Meetings (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=648dbb48df&e=bfdfd73c17) | Software (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=336dc152b5&e=bfdfd73c17) | Webcasts (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=399510cfd0&e=bfdfd73c17) Copyright © 2021 KDnuggets. | About KDnuggets (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b9c985c2ad&e=bfdfd73c17) | Contact us (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=27a9a438e8&e=bfdfd73c17) | Follow KDnuggets on (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=101c78c7f8&e=bfdfd73c17) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=6068911ae2&e=bfdfd73c17 https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=829a5a7bfe&e=bfdfd73c17 This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? http://sps.northwestern.edu/info/data-science-masters.php?utm_source=KDNuggets_L&utm_medium=MSDSemail&utm_term=FY21&utm_content=MSDS&utm_campaign=MSDS_KDNuggets21&src=KDNuggets_MSDSemail_janFY21_L http://sps.northwestern.edu/info/data-science-masters.php?utm_source=KDNuggets_L&utm_medium=MSDSemail&utm_term=FY21&utm_content=MSDS&utm_campaign=MSDS_KDNuggets21&src=KDNuggets_MSDSemail_janFY21_L Advance your data science career with Northwestern The integration of data science and business strategy has created a demand for professionals who can make sense of big data. Build the essential technical, analytical, and leadership skills needed for careers in today's data-driven world in Northwestern's Master of Science in Data Science program. You'll learn from an accomplished faculty of leading industry experts. You can choose from a wide range of specializations and electives to suit your goals as you earn your Northwestern University master's degree entirely online. http://sps.northwestern.edu/info/data-science-masters.php?utm_source=KDNuggets_L&utm_medium=MSDSemail&utm_term=FY21&utm_content=MSDS&utm_campaign=MSDS_KDNuggets21&src=KDNuggets_MSDSemail_janFY21_L Summer Application Deadline April 15 cal-icon_43x46.png Fall Application Deadline July 15 http://sps.northwestern.edu/info/data-science-masters.php?utm_source=KDNuggets_L&utm_medium=MSDSemail&utm_term=FY21&utm_content=MSDS&utm_campaign=MSDS_KDNuggets21&src

content:

Hi there, Abacus.AI is a cutting-edge deep learning service that lets you easily create and deploy deep learning models in production We are offering all KDnuggets subscribers FREE compute to train your custom neural net using our powerful but intuitive user interface. Sign up here and take advantage of this offer - https://abacus.ai/app/signup?signupToken=KDNUGGETS Everyone from ML beginners to experts can use the service to train models using their own data or sample data that is provided. subject: Watch: Sessions from Cloud Data Lake Experts and Open-Source Leaders at Subsurface LIVE Winter
snippet: WATCH: Cloud Data Lake and Open-Source Leaders at Subsurface LIVE WATCH: Sessions from Cloud Data Lake Experts and Open-Source Leaders at Subsurface LIVE Winter Subsurface LIVE, the cloud data lake
content:
[

WATCH: Cloud Data Lake and Open-Source Leaders at Subsurface LIVE https://subsurfaceconf.com/winter2021?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=kd-nuggests-email-2020-12-17&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=2021-subsurface-winter Subsurface LIVE (https://subsurfaceconf.com/winter2021?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=kd-nuggests-email-2020-12-17&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=2021-subsurface-winter) , the cloud data lake conference, is back January 27-28 with two days of technical sessions from open source leaders and cloud data lake experts. This virtual event (https://subsurfaceconf.com/winter2021?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=kd-nuggests-email-2020-12-17&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=2021-subsurface-winter) is 100% LIVE and open to everyone, everywhere - at no cost. Hear about real-world use cases from tech leaders at Netflix, AWS, Adobe, Microsoft, and USAA who are already utilizing cloud data lakes at scale. Participate in open source community sessions with project creators and committers focused on architecting, building, and scaling modern cloud data lakes with Apache Iceberg, Amundsen, InfluxDB IOx, dbt, Apache Parquet, and more. SAVE YOUR SPOT (https://subsurfaceconf.com/winter2021?utm_medium=paid-media&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=kd-nuggests-email-2020-12-17&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=2021-subsurface-winter) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: MLOps 101: The Foundation for Your AI Strategy
snippet: MLOps 101: The Foundation for Your AI Strategy Access Guide Now Many organizations are dipping their toes into machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI). However, for most embarking on this
content:
[

Company Logo MLOps 101: The Foundation for Your AI Strategy (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/mlops-101-guide/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=MLOps101-KDN) Access Guide Now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/mlops-101-guide/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=MLOps101-KDN) Many organizations are dipping their toes into machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI). However, for most embarking on this transformational journey, the results remain to be seen. And for those who are already underway, scaling their results across their organizations is completely uncharted waters. Machine Learning Operations (MLOps) (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/mlops-101-guide/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=MLOps101-KDN) allows organizations to alleviate many of the issues on the path to AI with ROI by providing a technological backbone for managing the machine learning lifecycle through automation and scalability. Download this comprehensive guide to learn: checkmark What is MLOps? Why do AI-driven organizations need it? checkmark What are the core elements of an MLOps infrastructure? How can MLOps tools deliver trusted, scalable, and secure infrastructure for machine learning projects? checkmark How can MLOps help data science teams, business leaders, and IT professionals build a resilient and scalable foundation for their AI initiatives? https://www.datarobot.com/resources/mlops-101-guide/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=MLOps101-KDN WHITE PAPER/EBOOK MLOps 101: The Foundation for Your AI Strategy Access Guide Now (https://www.datarobot.com/resources/mlops-101-guide/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=MLOps101-KDN) https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright Â© 2012-2020 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? View this email in your browser (https://www.kdnuggets.com/em/2020/dsti-1214.html) https://bit.ly/3mpLe4A ** Upskilling can open better professional opportunities ------------------------------------------------------------ Discover our Masters' level programmes and RNCP-accredited by the French Government (Level 7), in Data Analytics (https://bit.ly/33thCfe) , Data Science (https://bit.ly/2VzLvX7) and Data Engineering (Big Data) (https://bit.ly/3lszSeK) to boost your skills and employability. ** Are you a job seeker? Looking to upgrade your skills? Why not study online for one of these most in-demand jobs? ------------------------------------------------------------ These three profiles are in high demand but still rare on the job market. The high technical level required to access these job positions requires intense and complete training. Choose to follow our Applied programmes 100% online, full time or at your own pace. This is the opportunity to work and study at the same time with complete flexibility. Apply today! (https://bit.ly/36w6FLR) DISCOVER THE SELF-PACED ONLINE COURSE MODE (https://bit.ly/3obF6xe) ** SAVE THE DATE! Webinar: Unlock your Career opportunities in Data ------------------------------------------------------------ For a clear understanding of the current status of the data-centric industry and how you can prepare yourself for the future, we are conducting a live webinar. It will focus mainly on the skills needed and career opportunities. Join us for an one-hour live panel discussion where we will cover: * Career opportunities in the Data field * Data Analyst vs Data Engineer vs Data Scientist * Success stories on changing career from DSTI alumni When? December 16th at 1:00 pm ET | 1 hour including Q&A REGISTER NOW (https://bit.ly/2VrFvPT) ** Our Master's Level Programmes ------------------------------------------------------------ ** EARLY BIRD ADMISSIONS. subject: 5 Big Data Predictions for 2021
snippet: Dremio Logo 5 Big Data Predictions for 2021 REGISTER NOW Wednesday, December 16, 2020 10:00 AM PT | 1:00 PM ET Speaker Tomer Shiran CPO and co-founder Dremio In 2020 we experienced unprecedented market
content:
[

https://www.dremio.com/ Webinar 5 Big Data Predictions for 2021 REGISTER NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/webinar-dremio-predictions-2021.html?utm_medium=online-ad&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=kd-nuggets-newsletter-2020-12-10&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=2020-12-webinar-predictions-2021) date Wednesday, December 16, 2020 time 10:00 AM PT | 1:00 PM ET Speaker Tomer Tomer Shiran CPO and co-founder Dremio In 2020 we experienced unprecedented market shifts that required data and analytics leaders to quickly adapt to the increasing velocity and scale of data. In 2021, many organizations will look beyond any short-term fixes to implement a modern data architecture that both accelerates and keeps costs under control. Join us for this webinar as Tomer Shiran, Dremio CPO and co-founder, discusses the five major trends he predicts will emerge in the new year that will make modern cloud data lakes the center of gravity for data architectures. You'll learn: bullet About a new architectural paradigm that fully leverages cloud infrastructure resources to put data at the center of the architecture bullet How emerging open source technologies such as Apache Iceberg and Project Nessie will enable data lakes to do what data warehouses do and much more bullet What security and governance trends will impact your data strategy bullet Why the increased need for cost control, security and data governance will result in a shift in power to centralized data teams REGISTER NOW (https://hello.dremio.com/webinar-dremio-predictions-2021.html?utm_medium=online-ad&utm_source=kd-nuggets&utm_term=kd-nuggets-newsletter-2020-12-10&utm_content=na&utm_campaign=2020-12-webinar-predictions-2021) ** Want to see Dremio in action? ------------------------------------------------------------ Dremio delivers lightning-fast queries and a self-service semantic layer directly on your data lake storage. No moving data to proprietary data warehouses, no cubes, no aggregation tables or extracts. Just flexibility and control for data architects, and self-service for data consumers. https://aws.amazon.com/marketplace/pp/B089DLQSH4?qid=1593548812512&sr=0-3&ref_=srh_res_product_title https://github.com/dremio https://www.facebook.com/dremio https://twitter.com/dremio https://www.linkedin.com/company/dremio/ https://www.dremio.com/ Â© 2020 Dremio. subject: Yours free: An Intro to Analytical Thinking
snippet: Yours free: An Intro to Analytical Thinking Report cover - Analytical Skills for AI and Data Science If there's one skill that makes or breaks AI and data analytics, it's the ability to
content:
[

Yours free: An Intro to Analytical Thinking https://get.oreilly.com/ind_analytical-skills-for-ai-and-data-science-ch2.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=kdnu&utm_campaign=awareness&utm_content=analytical+skills+for+ai+and+data+science+dedicated+email+20201209 If there's one skill that makes or breaks AI and data analytics, it's the ability to formulate the right questions from the very beginning. In "An Intro to Analytical Thinking," a free chapter from the new book Analytical Skills for AI and Data Science, you'll get a battle-tested method for translating business decisions into prescriptive solutions using data and AI. Start projects up to 10x faster by using one of over 250 off-the-shelf datasets (https://appen.com/off-the-shelf-datasets/?utm_source=Paid&utm_medium=KDN) . Browse our current catalog of speech and text datasets (https://appen.com/off-the-shelf-datasets/?utm_source=Paid&utm_medium=KDN) to see how fast we can help your projects get up and running. content:

subject: Use data to improve lives
snippet: Northwestern University School of Professional Studies Drive impactful healthcare insights from data Master of Science in Health Analytics Online Build in-depth data science expertise specifically for
content:
[

https://sps.northwestern.edu/info/health-analytics.php?utm_source=KDNuggets_A&utm_medium=MSHAemail&utm_term=FY21&utm_content=MSHA&utm_campaign=MSHA_KDNuggets21&src=KDNuggets_MSHAemail_decFY21_A https://sps.northwestern.edu/info/health-analytics.php?utm_source=KDNuggets_A&utm_medium=MSHAemail&utm_term=FY21&utm_content=MSHA&utm_campaign=MSHA_KDNuggets21&src=KDNuggets_MSHAemail_decFY21_A Master of Science in Health Analytics Online Build in-depth data science expertise specifically for healthcare that provides tools to address healthcare challenges in a range of settings. The program is ideal for those with clinical backgrounds and for those with quantitative experience. * Prepare for the growing demand for healthcare analytics professionals by building the skills needed to retrieve, analyze, and interpret a wide range of health-related data. * Learn from a faculty comprised of professionals from Northwestern's Feinberg School of Medicine, Northwestern Memorial HealthCare, and other leading healthcare and data science organizations. * Earn your Northwestern master's degree entirely online and connect with classmates and faculty — professionals like you — from around the country. https://sps.northwestern.edu/info/health-analytics.php?utm_source=KDNuggets_A&utm_medium=MSHAemail&utm_term=FY21&utm_content=MSHA&utm_campaign=MSHA_KDNuggets21&src=KDNuggets_MSHAemail_decFY21_A Spring Application Deadline January 15 cal-icon_43x46.png Summer Application Deadline April 15 https://sps.northwestern.edu/info/health-analytics.php?utm_source=KDNuggets_A&utm_medium=MSHAemail&utm_term=FY21&utm_content=MSHA&utm_campaign=MSHA_KDNuggets21&src=KDNuggets_MSHAemail_decFY21_A quote_37x26.png There are myriad opportunities to improve the way healthcare systems run, the way patients interact with the healthcare system, and how we can comprehend and make use of the massive amounts of data that are generated.” Andrew Naidech Faculty Director, MS in Health Analytics; subject: [Live workshop] Modern Data Engineering with Azure Databricks
snippet: Virtual Event December 8, 2020 9:00am PST Modern Data Engineering with Azure Databricks Hi there, Every organization wants to build and extend the wealth of data accumulated in their data lake for deep
content:
[

http://events.databricks.com/virtualworkshopmdewmsftwest?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000Tw5UAAS Date December 8, 2020 Time 9:00am PST Modern Data Engineering with Azure Databricks Hi there, Every organization wants to build and extend the wealth of data accumulated in their data lake for deep analytics insights. However, most organizations struggle with how to make that data analytics-ready, and how to automate data pipelines to leverage new data as data lakes are constantly updated. In this workshop, learn how you can leverage your data lake for powerful analytics insights. This workshop will give you the opportunity to: * Learn how to build highly scalable and reliable data pipelines for analytics * See how you can make your existing Azure Data Lake analytics-ready with open-source Delta Lake technology * Integrate that data with services such as Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure DevOps and Power BI as well as leveraging your Azure Active Directory security and roles without moving your data out of your account RESERVE YOUR SPOT (http://events.databricks.com/virtualworkshopmdewmsftwest?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000Tw5UAAS) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: How to build production data pipelines at scale
snippet: Databricks Inc. Virtual Hands-on Lab December 1, 2020 10:00am ET Virtual Hands-on Lab Hi there, Enterprises are making great strides in leveraging their data for advanced analytics, data science, and
content:
[

https://databricks.com/ https://events.databricks.com/deltalakevirtualhands-onlab?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000TvrNAAS Date December 1, 2020 Time 10:00am ET Virtual Hands-on Lab Hi there, Enterprises are making great strides in leveraging their data for advanced analytics, data science, and machine learning to drive business value. Yet, data professionals still face reliability challenges with their data pipelines. Join this virtual hands-on lab to learn how Delta Lake, the storage layer open-sourced by Databricks (founded by the original creators of Apache Sparkâ„¢), can help you build robust production data pipelines at scale. This event will give you the opportunity to: * Gain an understanding of Delta Lake, the open-source storage layer that makes data lakes reliable * Learn how to build highly scalable and reliable data pipelines using Delta Lake * See how other data professionals have benefitted from Delta Lake * See Delta Lake in action with a demo and hands-on walkthrough * Ask Databricks experts your most challenging data questions And you'll get a chance to interact with your peers - data engineers, data scientists and developers also interested in Delta Lake - using the chat feature throughout the virtual event. Register today! RESERVE YOUR SPOT (https://events.databricks.com/deltalakevirtualhands-onlab?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000TvrNAAS) https://twitter.com/databricks https://www.linkedin.com/company/databricks https://www.facebook.com/pages/Databricks/560203607379694 This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Join our launch event: The new Lakehouse Architecture
snippet: 2020%20Lakehouse.jpg December 8, 2020 10am PT Hi, What if you could simplify your data architecture by combining the advantages of data warehouses and data lakes? Join us on December 8 for a launch
content:
[

https://databricks.com/p/webinar/lakehouse-architecture-from-vision-to-reality?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000TvspAAC%20 Date December 8, 2020 Time 10am PT Hi, What if you could simplify your data architecture by combining the advantages of data warehouses and data lakes? Join us on December 8 for a launch event where you'll learn how the Lakehouse architecture delivers the best of both worlds - data warehouse performance with data lake economics - for SQL workloads. See how Delta Lake - the open standard for data reliability, quality and performance that simplifies data pipelines - now allows for traditional BI directly on your data lake. This live launch event covers: * A Keynote by CEO Ali Ghodsi introducing, explaining and diving into this new vision and the changing reality * A live demo for an under-the-hood look at how the Lakehouse works and why it's so effective * Partner talk with Tableau, Using Tableau to Analyze Your Data Lake * Q&A Conversation with Unilever and CEO Ali Ghosdi * Additional technical breakout sessions * Live Q&A throughout the event SAVE MY SPOT (https://databricks.com/p/webinar/lakehouse-architecture-from-vision-to-reality?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000TvspAAC) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Faster Insights Through Automated Clustering and Visualization
snippet: Learn how clustering and data visualization techniques can be used to automatically detect hidden patterns in data. Register now! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ View as a web page JMP | Statistical
content:
[

Learn how clustering and data visualization techniques can be used to automatically detect hidden patterns in data. Register now! (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/ondemand/technically-speaking/faster-insights-through-automated-clustering-and-visualization-a-case-study-using-mlb-data.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ts7013Z000002DnAHQA0&utm_content=thirdparty) ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ View as a web page (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/email/2020/q4/technically-speaking/75675.html) https://www.jmp.com?utm_source=headerlogo&utm_medium=email https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/ondemand/technically-speaking/faster-insights-through-automated-clustering-and-visualization-a-case-study-using-mlb-data.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ts7013Z000002DnAHQA0&utm_content=thirdparty Clustering is an unsupervised learning technique with many uses across life sciences, financial services, marketing and more. Examples of practical applications include fraud detection, customer segmentation, document analysis - and yes, baseball. Baseball, along with most other top-tier professional sports, has whole-heartedly embraced the promise of data analytics to gain an edge in areas such as scouting the competition, player evaluation and player development. In this 30-minute webinar, Sig Mejdal (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sig_Mejdal) , VP and Assistant General Manager for the Baltimore Orioles, analyzes some of the best pitchers in baseball and demonstrates how clustering and data visualization techniques can be used to automatically detect hidden patterns in data. Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/ondemand/technically-speaking/faster-insights-through-automated-clustering-and-visualization-a-case-study-using-mlb-data.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ts7013Z000002DnAHQA0&utm_content=thirdparty) https://www.facebook.com/JMPsoftware https://twitter.com/JMP_software https://www.linkedin.com/company/jmp https://www.youtube.com/user/JMPSoftwareFromSAS Don't miss JMP updates: Please add jmp.com and sas.com as domains to your safe sender (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/about/email-safe-sender.html?utm_source=footerlink&utm_medium=email) list. subject: Expert Roundtable | How to Craft a Winning AI Team
snippet: appen Why Organizational Structure Matters More Than You Think for AI Hint: It's more than just hiring data scientists Hi there, Listen in as our panel of experts discuss how machine learning
content:
[

https://appen.com/ Why Organizational Structure Matters More Than You Think for AI (https://visit.appen.com/Why_Org_Structure_Matters_Reg.html?utm_source=Paid&utm_medium=KDN) Hint: It's more than just hiring data scientists Hi there, Listen in as our panel of experts discuss how machine learning products are not developed just by a team of data scientists. It's a team effort and you need the right team to work for AI to work. It can impact speed, quality, and the scalability of AI programs. In part three of this four-part roundtable series on Launching AI in the Real World (https://appen.com/webinars/launching-ai-in-the-real-world/?utm_source=Paid&utm_medium=KDN) , we discuss the number one mistake companies make when kicking off their AI initiatives that nearly guarantees failure. It takes a whole organization to successfully bring AI into the core of a business. Join us for a live panel discussion where we will cover: * Why it isn't enough to just hire a bunch of data scientists * Building the right culture and understanding what KPIs truly matter * Real stories and ah-ha moments on the importance of cross functional teams A Team Effort: Why Organizational StructureMatters More Than You Think for AI (https://visit.appen.com/Why_Org_Structure_Matters_Reg.html?utm_source=Paid&utm_medium=KDN) Tuesday, November 17, 10:00am - 11:00am PST (https://visit.appen.com/Why_Org_Structure_Matters_Reg.html?utm_source=Paid&utm_medium=KDN) Register Now (https://visit.appen.com/Why_Org_Structure_Matters_Reg.html?utm_source=Paid&utm_medium=KDN) We hope to see you at this and the other Launching AI in the Real World roundtable discussions. Best Regards, The Appen Team When your goal is to launch world-class AI, Appen's reliable training data gives you the confidence to deploy. subject: What is fair when it comes to AI bias?
snippet: How to Stop Worrying and Start Tackling AI Bias November 12th, 2020 | 11.00 am EST - or register to view on-demand Register now The stories of bias in AI are everywhere: Amazon's recruiting tool,
content:
[

Company Logo How to Stop Worrying and Start Tackling AI Bias (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/start-tackling-ai-bias/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdPartyPromoter&utm_campaign=WAIBIAS20-KDN) November 12th, 2020 | 11.00 am EST - or register to view on-demand (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/start-tackling-ai-bias/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdPartyPromoter&utm_campaign=WAIBIAS20-KDN) Register now (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/start-tackling-ai-bias/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdPartyPromoter&utm_campaign=WAIBIAS20-KDN) The stories of bias in AI are everywhere: Amazon's recruiting tool, Apple's credit card limits, Google's facial recognition, and dozens more. The quick solution is just to blame the algorithm and its designers. But it's not a question of whether or not you have bias in your institution, but rather how you plan to handle it. We will explore the answers that question and many more in our webinar, How to Stop Worrying and Start Tackling AI Bias (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/start-tackling-ai-bias/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdPartyPromoter&utm_campaign=WAIBIAS20-KDN) , where we will cover: checkmark Reframing the conversation around AI and understanding it as the first step in building a more ethical, fairer system checkmark How machine learning can highlight the implicit bias of an institution and how AI is a new toolset to measure and change it checkmark A practical plan that you can implement to improve your AI development and increase trust in your AI Can't make the live webinar? Register today and we will send you the on-demand recording. https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/start-tackling-ai-bias/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdPartyPromoter&utm_campaign=WAIBIAS20-KDN Register now (https://www.datarobot.com/webinars/start-tackling-ai-bias/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdPartyPromoter&utm_campaign=WAIBIAS20-KDN) https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright Â© 2012-2020 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? snippet: KDnuggets News 20:n42, Nov 4, 2020 issue (read online) KDnuggets KDnuggets™ News 20:n42, Nov 4 Features | News | Tutorials | Opinions | Tops | Jobs | Submit a blog | Image of the week What can Data
content:
[

KDnuggets News 20:n42, Nov 4, 2020 issue (read online (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2020/n42.html) ) https://www.kdnuggets.com/index.html KDnuggets™ News 20:n42 (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2020/n42.html) , Nov 4 Features | News (#News) | Tutorials (#Tutorials) | Opinions (#Opinions) | Tops (#Tops) | Jobs (#Jobs) | Submit a blog (https://www.kdnuggets.com/news/submissions.html) | Image of the week (#Image) What can Data Scientists learn from the 2020 US Presidential Election? The outcome is still undecided, but it seems that the polls in several swing states have overestimated democratic vote, as they did in 2016. Precise prediction of human behavior is difficult, and small errors (eg 48% instead of 52%) that are acceptable in consumer analytics take on the outsize importance, when predicting election results in a swing state. Keep such possibilities in mind, examine prediction assumptions, and try to use different data sources to reduce error. Features * Top Python Libraries for Data Science, Data Visualization & Machine Learning (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2020/11/top-python-libraries-data-science-data-visualization-machine-learning.html) * Mastering Time Series Analysis with Help From the Experts (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2020/10/mastering-time-series-analysis-experts.html) * Explaining the Explainable AI: A 2-Stage Approach (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2020/10/explaining-explainable-ai.html) * The Missing Teams For Data Scientists (https://www.kdnuggets.com/2020/11/missing-teams-data-scientists.html) * Data scientist or machine learning engineer? subject: NYU Stern MS in Business Analytics: Advance Your Career With Data
snippet: header Learn how to use data to make strategic decisions and move your business forward. NYU Stern's MS in Business Analytics (MSBA) program provides experienced professionals with the ability to
content:
[

https://web-marketing.stern.nyu.edu/global-programs/business-analytics/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=eblast&utm_campaign=kdn102720&utm_term=oct27&utm_content=fy21 Learn how to use data to make strategic decisions and move your business forward. NYU Stern's MS in Business Analytics (MSBA) program (https://web-marketing.stern.nyu.edu/global-programs/business-analytics/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=eblast&utm_campaign=kdn102720&utm_term=oct27&utm_content=fy21) provides experienced professionals with the ability to transform data into a predictive strategic asset to drive better business results. The MSBA program is a 1-year, part-time program designed with executives who are working full-time in mind. The program is divided into 5 onsite modules at NYU Stern and in rotating global locations, with online, independent study in between sessions. Our next deadline for the MSBA Class of 2022, beginning May 2021, is January 15. Applicants will be asked to submit: * Two essays * Updated resume * Two recommendations * Official transcripts * Copy of front (photo) page of passport * Application fee Please note that the GMAT, GRE, and TOEFL are not required to apply to the MSBA program. Take the first step and submit an inquiry form today! subject: Machine Learning in November: All Virtual!
snippet: Predictive Analytics World for Business - Machine Learning in November: All Virtual! Join Predictive Analytics World Europe from your screen! Predictive Analytics World is the leading cross-vendor
content:
[

https://predictiveanalyticsworld.de/en/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtual Join Predictive Analytics World Europe from your screen! Predictive Analytics World is the leading cross-vendor conference series focused solely on the commercial deployment of machine learning. At PAW, you'll hear directly from the horse's mouth precisely how Fortune 500 analytics competitors and other companies of interest deploy machine learning, the techniques they apply, the actionable insights they've gained, and the business results they've achieved. Machine Learning in November Don't miss the most important players and leading heads of the worldwide machine learning scene at Predictive Analytics World Europe in November! Take a peek at this year's virtual programme with speakers from all over the world: Will Ethics Kill the Predictive Analytics Star? Governments worldwide are rushing to come up with ideas to regulate so-called Artificial Intelligence, automated and „autonomous“ systems, and predictive analytics applications. From the EU’s AI White Paper to the newly founded Partnership on Artificial Intelligence (GPAI), comprising 15 states (including the EU and the US), the question is how to deal with the powerful promises and high risks of optimisation technologies and probabilistic decision-support systems. Matthias Spielkamp, Executive Director at AlgorithmWatch. Scaling Data to All Sides of E-Commerce Business - The Journey of Chrono24 to a Data-Driven Company This talk will shed light on how Chrono24 became a more data driven company, from initiating the transformation over learning about data, to preparing our initiative for growth mode. At first there was a clear decision to become a data driven company from the C-Suite. Then we took some independent first steps to learn and made data one of our top priorities. This led to some very good insights and a lot of value in many cases, but also to dead ends in other cases. Dr. Tillmann Grupp, Director Data at Chrono24. >>> View full agenda here (https://predictiveanalyticsworld.de/en/agenda/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtual) Missing the one session that delivers the golden nugget is simply not possible All approved sessions will be recorded and will be made available to you after the event. This way you will be able to see every session and you don’t have to decide which track or session to see. But it gets better: You will not only get access to Predictive Analytics World sessions, but also to all content of the Marketing Analytics Summit (https://marketinganalyticssummit.de/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtual) . See the latest and most important developments in Data & Analytics and where leading companies are heading when it comes to Strategy & Governance, Technology & Tools, KPIs, Dashboard & Visual Analytics and Marketing Analytics & Applications. Get ready for a whole lot of networking with speakers, attendees and sponsors Networking will be possible within our platform, private or public - the choice is yours. Of course you can also ask your questions at the end of each session and participate in discussions forums. ------------------------------------------------------------ Use the code KDNUGGETS to save 15% on your Predictive Analytics World Europe ticket. ------------------------------------------------------------ * Predictive Analytics World Europe, Nov 16-17, 2020 (https://predictiveanalyticsworld.de/en/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtual) Virtual, Livestream - Register Now (https://predictiveanalyticsworld.de/en/register/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtual) * Machine Learning Week North America, May 24-28, 2021 (https://www.predictiveanalyticsworld.com/machinelearningweek/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtual) Virtual, Livestream - is currently accepting speaker submissions (https://www.predictiveanalyticsworld.com/call-for-speakers/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtual) ------------------------------------------------------------ 2020 marks the 11 year anniversary of the Predictive Analytics World conference series. In its mission to foster the commercial deployment of machine learning, PAW has delivered value to over 17,000 attendees across more than 75 industry-leading events that have included over 1,500 sessions, internationally. Click here (https://www.predictiveanalyticsworld.com/machinelearningtimes/a-brief-history-of-paw-on-its-10-year-anniversary/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtual) for a brief history of PAW. You will have access to both conferences: https://predictiveanalyticsworld.de/en/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtual https://marketinganalyticssummit.de/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=virtual Sponsors Mnemonic AI Datentreiber GmbH Amazon Advertising This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? content:

http://www.nvidia.com https://nvda.ws/2Cd4Bf1 Accelerating Apache Spark 3.X Leveraging NVIDIA GPUs to Power the Next Era of Analytics and AI Apache Spark is a powerful execution engine for large-scale parallel data processing across a cluster of machines, which enables rapid application development and high performance. With Spark 3.0, big improvements make it possible to use the massively parallel architecture of GPUs to further accelerate Spark data processing. subject: On-Demand Webinar: The Future of Human-Powered Data Annotation
snippet: Watch Webinar Innovation in AI is accelerating at a steep rate, and the tools and processes used to support such AI innovation are no exception. Data annotation is seeing advances, such as using AI and
content:
[

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=0963a9ac0f&e=bfdfd73c17 Innovation in AI is accelerating at a steep rate, and the tools and processes used to support such AI innovation are no exception. Data annotation is seeing advances, such as using AI and automation to pre-label data and conduct quality assurance, that seemingly promise to eliminate the need for human-powered labeling. In this panel, experts from Azavea, Dataloop and CloudFactory discuss: - The current and future state of humans-in-the-loop data annotation - The importance of human judgment and subject matter expertise in annotating nuanced training data sets - How technology will help us scale human annotation workforces Watch Now (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b1c3147b49&e=bfdfd73c17) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Predictive Analytics for Smarter Decision Making
snippet: How to make smarter decisions with well-constructed models ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Having trouble viewing this? View as a web page. JMP | Statistical Discovery. From SAS. Encore Presentation:
content:
[

How to make smarter decisions with well-constructed models ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Having trouble viewing this? View as a web page. (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/email/2020/q3/marketing-campaigns/77245.html) https://www.jmp.com?utm_source=headerlogo&utm_medium=email https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/ondemand/explorers/explorers-seminar-de-veaux-sep28-video.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=advertisement&utm_campaign=exo7011U0000009yTTQAY&utm_content=thirdparty We're sorry we can't meet together to share information and ideas. It's disappointing to not be able to offer our in-person seminars and workshops, but we hope this will be the next-best thing. Now available: a half-day on-demand workshop with Dick De Veaux, noted author, applied statistician, professor and data mining expert. He says that preparing your data for analysis is just as important as the analysis itself. Through a series of cross-industry case studies, De Veaux will demonstrate how to: * Figure out which data is relevant. * Identify trends that need further exploration with data visualization. * Eliminate missing values before they become problematic. * Sift through the extraneous information to pull only the most important variables into analysis. Register Now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/ondemand/explorers/explorers-seminar-de-veaux-sep28-video.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=advertisement&utm_campaign=exo7011U0000009yTTQAY&utm_content=thirdparty) https://www.facebook.com/JMPsoftware https://twitter.com/JMP_software https://www.linkedin.com/company/jmp https://www.youtube.com/user/JMPSoftwareFromSAS Don't miss JMP updates: Please add jmp.com and sas.com as domains to your safe sender (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/about/email-safe-sender.html?utm_source=footerlink&utm_medium=email) list. subject: The Untold Secrets of Deploying Machine Learning at Scale
snippet: The Last Mile to AI ROI While you have hired top-notch data scientists to build models and invested in data science tools, your AI projects still may not be getting off the ground. Research shows that
content:
[

https://www.datarobot.com/webinar/last-mile-to-ai-roi/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WAIROI20KDN While you have hired top-notch data scientists to build models and invested in data science tools, your AI projects still may not be getting off the ground. Research shows that the share of AI models deemed "production worthy" but never put into production is anywhere between 50 and 90%. Do you see yourself on that spectrum? So, what are leaders and teams actually missing? What can they do to finally gain value out of AI? The last mile for AI initiative success is the deployment and management of models in production that require new practices, skills, and technologies. This emerging area is called Machine Learning Operations, or MLOps, also referred to as ModelOps by leading analyst firms. MLOps solves precisely for this challenge by bridging the gap between data and IT Ops teams, providing the capabilities that both teams need to work together to deploy, monitor, manage, and govern machine learning models in production. In this webinar, we provide insights into what MLOps is and how any organization can adopt it to finally derive value from machine learning projects. During this session (https://www.datarobot.com/webinar/last-mile-to-ai-roi/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WAIROI20KDN) , you will learn: checkmark How to eliminate AI-related risks by adopting MLOps best practices checkmark The inherent challenges of production model deployment and how to overcome them checkmark Model monitoring best practices checkmark What production lifecycle management is and why it matters https://www.datarobot.com/webinar/last-mile-to-ai-roi/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WAIROI20KDN Register now (https://www.datarobot.com/webinar/last-mile-to-ai-roi/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=WAIROI20KDN) https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright Â© 2012-2020 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: [eBook] Building Humility and Trustworthiness into Your AI
snippet: Humility in AI systems AI is becoming ubiquitous. More and more critical decisions are automated through machine learning models, determining the future of a business or making life-altering decisions
content:
[

https://www.datarobot.com/resource/humility-in-ai/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=20HumilityKDN AI is becoming ubiquitous. More and more critical decisions are automated through machine learning models, determining the future of a business or making life-altering decisions for real people. With the rising stakes, AI systems must be built to be humble, just like humans. AI should know when it is not sure about the right answer to transfer the critical decision-making process back to people. In this eBook (https://www.datarobot.com/resource/humility-in-ai/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=20HumilityKDN) , we explore the concept of humility in AI systems and how it can be applied to existing solutions to ensure their trustworthiness, ethicality, and reliability in a fast-changing world. Download this ebook to learn: checkmark The basic concepts behind humility in AI checkmark What makes AI systems susceptible to performance and accuracy issues checkmark Real-life examples of issues with the underlying data used for predictions that may benefit from a humility framework checkmark How a humble AI system can improve tactical and strategic decisions https://www.datarobot.com/resource/humility-in-ai/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=20HumilityKDN WHITE PAPER/EBOOK Humility in AI: Building Trustworthy and Ethical AI Systems Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resource/humility-in-ai/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=20HumilityKDN) https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright Â© 2012-2020 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? content:
[

https://deltalakehandsonlabwest.splashthat.com/?utm_source=kdn&utm_medium=thirdparty&utm_campaign=7013f000000TupIAAS Date October 14, 2020 Time 9:00am PDT Building Reliable Data Lakes with Delta Lake Virtual Hands-on Lab Hi there, Enterprises are making great strides in leveraging their data for advanced analytics, data science and machine learning to drive business value. Yet, data professionals still face reliability challenges with their data pipelines. Join this hands-on lab to learn how Delta Lake, the storage layer open-sourced by Databricks, can help you build robust production data pipelines at scale. This event gives you the opportunity to: * Gain an understanding of Delta Lake * Learn how to build highly scalable and reliable data pipelines using Delta Lake * Discover how other data professionals benefit from Delta Lake * See Delta Lake in action with a demo and hands-on walk-through Space is limited so be sure to register today. subject: Data Drift - What It Is, Why It Happens, and How To Detect It
snippet: dataiku_main_logo.png Technical Insights nlp email A Primer on Data Drift & Drift Detection Techniques Monitoring model performance drift is a crucial step in production machine learning (ML);
content:
[

https://www.dataiku.com/ ** Technical Insights ------------------------------------------------------------ https://pages.dataiku.com/data-drift-detection-techniques?utm_campaign=CONTENT%20Data%20Drift%20Technical%20WP%202020&utm_source=emea-kdnuggets&utm_medium=paid-email ** A Primer on Data Drift & Drift Detection Techniques ------------------------------------------------------------ Monitoring model performance drift is a crucial step in production machine learning (ML); however, in practice, it proves challenging for many reasons, one of which is the delay in retrieving the labels of new data. Without ground truth labels, drift detection techniques based on the model's accuracy are off the table. In this Technical White Paper (https://pages.dataiku.com/data-drift-detection-techniques?utm_campaign=CONTENT%20Data%20Drift%20Technical%20WP%202020&utm_source=emea-kdnuggets&utm_medium=paid-email) you will: * Take a brief but deep dive into the underlying definitions and logic behind drift. * Explore a real-life use case presenting different scenarios that can cause models and data to drift. * Delve into two techniques (the domain classifier and the black-box shift detector) used to assess whether dataset drift is occurring. https://pages.dataiku.com/data-drift-detection-techniques?utm_campaign=CONTENT%20Data%20Drift%20Technical%20WP%202020&utm_source=emea-kdnuggets&utm_medium=paid-email Dataiku, 201-203 rue de Bercy, 75012 Paris, France This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: 2020 Global Top 100 Innovators in Data & Analytics
snippet: The Most Innovative Minds in Corinium's Global Network of Data and Analytics Leaders top 100 We are are thrilled to announce the launch of our '2020 Business of Data Top 100 Innovators in Data
content:
[

The Most Innovative Minds in Corinium's Global Network of Data and Analytics Leaders https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=80fdab94a9&e=bfdfd73c17 We are are thrilled to announce the launch of our '2020 Business of Data Top 100 Innovators in Data and Analytics Report (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=aeca318275&e=bfdfd73c17) ' - Corinium's list of the world's top 100 data and analytics leaders! We publish these lists every year to acknowledge the incredible work that's being done to advance the cause of data and analytics across the globe. But it also serves as an opportunity to highlight the achievements of some of the top minds in our global network of more than 250,000 business leaders. This year's list (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=29c8a82640&e=bfdfd73c17) features interviews with 25 members of our global 'top 100'. Conducted over several months, they explore these industry trailblazers' greatest achievements, responses to the COVID-19 pandemic and plans for the future. Key stats from this year's report * 100 global data and analytics leaders are featured in our annual list. * 64% of our data and analytics top 100 list sit within the C-suite title. * 44% of our top 100 list are female exceeding the 30% industry average. READ THE FULL LIST (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=6faa03e9d7&e=bfdfd73c17) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=27dc029173&e=bfdfd73c17 We hope you enjoy the insights this report contains. If you're a resident of Canada: You are receiving this because you opted in or attended a Corinium Global Intelligence event. We respect your right to privacy. Read our privacy policy. subject: [eBook] Building Humility and Trustworthiness into Your AI
snippet: Humility in AI systems AI is becoming ubiquitous. More and more critical decisions are automated through machine learning models, determining the future of a business or making life-altering decisions
content:
[

https://www.datarobot.com/resource/humility-in-ai/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=20Humility-KDN AI is becoming ubiquitous. More and more critical decisions are automated through machine learning models, determining the future of a business or making life-altering decisions for real people. With the rising stakes, AI systems must be built to be humble, just like humans. AI should know when it is not sure about the right answer to transfer the critical decision-making process back to people. In this eBook (https://www.datarobot.com/resource/humility-in-ai/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=20Humility-KDN) , we explore the concept of humility in AI systems and how it can be applied to existing solutions to ensure their trustworthiness, ethicality, and reliability in a fast-changing world. Download this ebook to learn: checkmark The basic concepts behind humility in AI checkmark What makes AI systems susceptible to performance and accuracy issues checkmark Real-life examples of issues with the underlying data used for predictions that may benefit from a humility framework checkmark How a humble AI system can improve tactical and strategic decisions https://www.datarobot.com/resource/humility-in-ai/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=20Humility-KDN WHITE PAPER/EBOOK Humility in AI: Building Trustworthy and Ethical AI Systems Download now (https://www.datarobot.com/resource/humility-in-ai/?utm_source=KDN&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=20Humility-KDN) https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright Â© 2012-2020 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Which platform "unifies the tools your data science teams want to use?" Find out in the just-released Forrester Wave
snippet: Don't take our word for it. Find out why we've got one of the best strategies on the market according to independent reviewers. Email Wave A (1) Forrester's research uncovered a market in
content:
[

Don't take our word for it. Find out why we've got one of the best strategies on the market according to independent reviewers. https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=facdb3babf&e=bfdfd73c17 Forrester's research uncovered a market in which Domino, Microsoft, Cloudera, Google, and MathWorks are Leaders. Seven other vendors were also included in The Forrester Waveâ„¢: Notebook-Based Predictive Analytics And Machine Learning, Q3 2020 (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e470fc1ba0&e=bfdfd73c17) . Only one Leader is built by data scientists, for data scientists. And, according to Forrester "tames the chaos, bringing all your different PAML tools together and binding them in a common, governed platform." That Leader is Domino. Arguably Domino invented the data science platform back in 2014 in order to make data science an integral part of how organizations operate all aspects of their business. Domino faced stiff competition in the Wave. Over 20% of the Fortune 100 leverage Domino as the data science management platform for their organizations. When you read the report (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=e984481f24&e=bfdfd73c17) consider if you want the best in class data science management platform that was custom-built for data science vs the disparate tools from the cloud providers. This crucial research is available to you for no cost, so you can pick the right platform for your data science needs. Key criteria evaluated included: modeling, collaboration, model evaluation, model ops, methods and algorithms, platform infrastructure as well as overall vendor strategy. https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=8744db4ed3&e=bfdfd73c17 This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: Watch Live: Demystifying Machine Learning and AI
snippet: Hear real-world examples about machine learning and AI from WL Gore, SAS and the author of Dark Data. Register now. Oct. 1 at 1:00 pm ET. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ View as a web page JMP | Statistical
content:
[

Hear real-world examples about machine learning and AI from W. L. Gore, SAS and the author of Dark Data. Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/oct-1/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z0000021wdYQAQ&utm_content=thirdparty) . Oct. 1 at 1:00 p.m. ET. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ View as a web page (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/email/2020/q4/statistically-speaking/75343.html) https://www.jmp.com?utm_source=headerlogo&utm_medium=email https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/oct-1/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z0000021wdYQAQ&utm_content=thirdparty ** Machine learning. Artificial intelligence. Big data. Industry 4.0. ------------------------------------------------------------ These buzzwords are everywhere - in newspapers, magazines, TV and podcasts. But what do they mean? Join us for a virtual event Oct. 1 to hear real-world examples from competitive, innovative organizations using analytics techniques that take advantage of greater data availability and tackle greater data complexity. Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/oct-1/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z0000021wdYQAQ&utm_content=thirdparty) ** Watch the Keynote ------------------------------------------------------------ David J. Hand, Imperial College London David Hand is a Fellow of the British Academy and a recipient of the Guy Medal of the Royal Statistical Society. He has served two terms as President of the Royal Statistical Society and is on the Board of the UK Statistics Authority. He is also the author of Dark Data and The Improbability Principle. Hand was made OBE for services to research and innovation in 2013. https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/oct-1/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z0000021wdYQAQ&utm_content=thirdparty ** Tune in to: ------------------------------------------------------------ * Review common ML techniques and models, and how they relate to empirical models. * Learn best practices for building predictive and explanatory models quickly. * Understand how to start ML initiatives or integrate them within existing programs. * And more. ** Watch the Panel ------------------------------------------------------------ Building useful models with data has always been mission-critical for companies striving to compete through innovation. Due to Industry 4.0, big data and digitalization initiatives, you now have more complex data than ever before. Hear a panel discussion with: https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/oct-1/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z0000021wdYQAQ&utm_content=thirdparty ** Jason Wiggins ------------------------------------------------------------ JMP Senior Systems Engineer, SAS https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/oct-1/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z0000021wdYQAQ&utm_content=thirdparty ** Sam Gardner ------------------------------------------------------------ Owner and Principal Consultant, Wildstat Consulting https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/oct-1/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z0000021wdYQAQ&utm_content=thirdparty ** Cameron Willden ------------------------------------------------------------ Statistician, W. L. Gore ** Who should attend? ------------------------------------------------------------ This event is for people who work for organizations with a lot of data and an interest in (or directive from management to implement) machine learning or artificial intelligence projects. ** Details ------------------------------------------------------------ Oct. 1 | 1:00 - 2:30 p.m. ET Register now (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/events/statistically-speaking/events/oct-1/live-stream.html?utm_source=kdnuggetseb&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=ss7013Z0000021wdYQAQ&utm_content=thirdparty) https://www.facebook.com/JMPsoftware https://twitter.com/JMP_software https://www.linkedin.com/company/jmp https://www.youtube.com/user/JMPSoftwareFromSAS Don't miss JMP updates: Please add jmp.com and sas.com as domains to your safe sender (https://www.jmp.com/en_us/about/email-safe-sender.html?utm_source=footerlink&utm_medium=email) list. About this email: If you do not wish to receive future emails, please modify your email preferences (https://www.jmp.com/optout?utm_source=footerlink&utm_medium=email) . To contact JMP via postal address: SAS Institute Inc., JMP Software, SAS Campus Drive, Cary, NC 27513 USA ATTN: Legal Division/Privacy Manager. SAS and all other SAS Institute Inc. product or service names are registered trademarks or trademarks of SAS Institute Inc. in the USA and other countries. ® indicates USA registration. subject: Free Guide: Image Annotation for Machine Learning
snippet: Download Guide Annotating visual data is tedious work. But it has to be done well for ML models to work correctly. What harm could a few incorrect pixels cause? Would you settle for potential
content:
[

https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=7c099d041f&e=bfdfd73c17 Annotating visual data is tedious work. But it has to be done well for ML models to work correctly. What harm could a few incorrect pixels cause? Would you settle for potential misdiagnosis in hospitals or accidents in autonomous vehicles? You wouldn't. Your success and speed to market depends on the techniques, tools, and workforce behind your annotated images. If image data is a big part of your AI project's dataset, you should read CloudFactory's guide to Image Annotation For Machine Learning (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=fd52dfad12&e=bfdfd73c17) . In this guide, you'll learn: - The basics of image annotation for computer vision using supervised learning - Techniques that are available for annotating visual data, including images and videos - Considerations for selecting the right labeling workforce - Key questions to ask a potential image annotation service provider Get Your Guide (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=a05958341a&e=bfdfd73c17) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? subject: [Ray Summit] See why Ray is the best framework for scaling ML & Python
snippet: View this email in your browser Ray has been growing—fast. Hundreds of companies are now using Ray for building distributed applications and libraries, backend infrastructures, ML platforms, and more.
content:
[

View this email in your browser (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=1b2f85aff3&e=bfdfd73c17) https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=ada8f458b7&e=bfdfd73c17 Ray has been growing—fast. Hundreds of companies are now using Ray for building distributed applications and libraries, backend infrastructures, ML platforms, and more. "Ray is the only flexible platform to provide simple, distributed Python execution—allowing our AI to orchestrate many parallel graph instances & scale from laptops to data centers." -Arimo The upcoming Ray Summit (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=c95ed4d006&e=bfdfd73c17) is the best way to connect with the Ray community and see how they're using it in production to scale Python and ML applications. Here's just a few highlights of the speaker lineup and what you'll learn: https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=67926ef930&e=bfdfd73c17 * Learn from leaders in ML &AI (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=b5450e1564&e=bfdfd73c17) like Michael Jordan, Oriol Vinyals, Ion Stoica, Manuela Veloso, and David Patterson * See companies like Microsoft, AWS, JP Morgan & Ant Financial use Ray for ML infrastructure, MLOps, deep learning, and financial apps * Learn about the ML libraries that leverage Ray—including RLlib, Tune, Serve, RaySGD, Horovod, spaCy, Hugging Face & Seldon * Learn the latest in serverless & cloud native from Adrian Cockroft (AWS VP Cloud Architecture) and Jonas Bonér (Lightbend CTO) Don't miss out—see for yourself why Ray is poised to be the dominant framework in distributed computing. Register now—it's free (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=5b1247f840&e=bfdfd73c17) Scalable machine learning and Python for everyone ============================================================ ** Twitter (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=d8784f0cb5&e=bfdfd73c17) ** Facebook (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=1e7fd03dcf&e=bfdfd73c17) ** Website (https://kdnuggets.us12.list-manage.com/track/click?u=4f2891ebb155b23f120ece0bd&id=6766d8a4e7&e=bfdfd73c17) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this? The Total Economic Impact™ Of DataRobot, a commissioned study conducted by Forrester Consulting on behalf of DataRobot (https://www.datarobot.com/lp/forrester-tei-study/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdPartyPromoter&utm_campaign=Forrester2020kdn) , describes exactly how customers are achieving those gains. Download the study to learn how our customers achieved real results, such as: * Total ROI of 514% and payback period of 3 months. * Cost savings from reduced seasonal over hiring in retail of $500,000 * $10 million in cost savings from reduced fraud * $50-$200 million increased revenue from improved demand forecasting in manufacturing * Salary and headcount savings by avoiding hiring a data science team 3X the size Start discovering the potential impact of DataRobot's Enterprise AI Platform on your organization by accessing the study today (https://www.datarobot.com/lp/forrester-tei-study/?utm_source=KDNuggets&utm_medium=3rdPartyPromoter&utm_campaign=Forrester2020kdn) or scheduling a personalized demo (https://www.datarobot.com/lp/request-a-demo/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdPartyPromoter&utm_campaign=Forrester2020d-kdn) . subject: BARC-Bericht: Mensch-Maschine-Interaktion in datenwissenschaftlichen Projekten
snippet: Company Logo BARC-Bericht: Mensch-Maschine-Interaktion in datenwissenschaftlichen Projekten Ein neues Whitepaper des Business Application Research Center (BARC) mit dem Titel " Mensch-Maschine-
content:
[

https://www.datarobot.com/ Background Image BARC-Bericht: Mensch-Maschine-Interaktion in datenwissenschaftlichen Projekten (https://www.datarobot.com/lp/barc-mensch-maschine-interaktion/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=BARC20G-KDN) Ein neues Whitepaper des Business Application Research Center (BARC) mit dem Titel " Mensch-Maschine-Interaktion in datenwissenschaftlichen Projekten (https://www.datarobot.com/lp/barc-mensch-maschine-interaktion/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=BARC20G-KDN) " untersucht die Rolle, die der Mensch auch in Zukunft im Rahmen maschineller Lernprozesse spielen wird. Es skizziert, wo Automatisierung in Ihren eigenen spezifischen datenwissenschaftlichen Projektabläufen implementiert werden kann und welche Schritte auch in unmittelbarer Zukunft noch vom menschlichen Input abhängen sein werden. Dazu gehören unter anderem folgende Faktoren: checkmark Menschliche Erkenntnisse und fundierte Erfahrungen sind erforderlich, um Anwendungsfälle je nach den spezifischen Bedürfnissen Ihres Unternehmens zu ermitteln. Zudem sind diese Faktoren für die Erstellung ethischer Bewertungen entscheidend. checkmark Auch wenn Datenprofile teilweise automatisiert werden können, werden Datenwissenschaftler weiterhin benötigt, um Daten aus verschiedenen Quellen zu identifizieren, zu sortieren und zu vereinheitlichen und um sicherzustellen, dass alle Anpassungen der Datensätze für die Endbenutzer transparent sind. checkmark Bestimmte Schritte, wie z. B. Phasen der Entwicklung und Modellierung von Funktionen sowie der Modellvalidierung, können besser automatisiert werden als andere. Lesen Sie diesen wichtigen Bericht (https://www.datarobot.com/lp/barc-mensch-maschine-interaktion/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=BARC20G-KDN) , um mehr darüber zu erfahren, wo Ihre besten Möglichkeiten für eine erfolgreiche Automatisierung zu finden sind. https://www.datarobot.com/lp/barc-mensch-maschine-interaktion/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=BARC20G-KDN Jetzt herunterladen (https://www.datarobot.com/lp/barc-mensch-maschine-interaktion/?utm_source=kdnuggets&utm_medium=3rdpartypromoter&utm_campaign=BARC20G-KDN) https://www.linkedin.com/company/datarobot/ https://www.facebook.com/datarobotinc/ https://twitter.com/DataRobot https://www.instagram.com/datarobot/ Copyright © 2012-2020 DataRobot, Inc. 225 Franklin Street, 13th Floor, Boston, MA 02110 DataRobot.com (https://www.datarobot.com/) Privacy Policy (https://www.datarobot.com/privacy/) Terms of Service (https://www.datarobot.com/terms-of-service/) This email was sent to Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com (mailto:Markus.mueller.ds@gmail.com) why did I get this?
